Subject: Réclamation consommateur - Reponse fournisseur [N° de reclamation=FR-2024-08138] du 27/05/2024 19:01:50
TextBody: Madame, Monsieur, Nous vous faisons parvenir ci-dessous les informations relatives à la réclamation d'un de nos clients. Réclamation : Catégorie : Produit\Réclamation produit\Santé - Allergie\Allergie alimentaire Motif : La cliente a acheté le 10 ou le 11 mai 2024 et est tombée malade jeudi dernier, elle a été voir son allergologue qui lui a dit qu'elle a fait une allergie alimentaire suite à la consommation de potatoes à l'huile de tournesol. Elle souhaiterait connaître la composition du produit pour savoir à quoi elle est allergique. Transfert médecin conseil : oui Traçabilité : Produit : 3256220516303, Potatoes au four U sachet 1 Kg Fournisseur : AGRISTO NV N° Lot/Série : D0324109 Heure de production : 05:47 DLC / DLUO : 17/04/2026 Code emballeur : Vous connaissez l'attention que nous apportons aux produits signés à notre marque . Elle reflète auprès de nos clients toute l'image qualité de l'enseigne. La qualité des produits à notre marque étant liée au respect des cahiers des charges, nous vous demandons donc de procéder à des recherches afin de déterminer l'origine de cet incident et de nous faire part des actions correctives qui seront mises en place afin qu'un tel incident ne se renouvelle pas. Vos éléments de réponse devront nous parvenir par mail sous 5 jours. Si toutefois, une analyse plus approfondie s'avère nécessaire, nous vous demandons de bien vouloir nous en aviser. Nous vous remercions de nous répondre PAR MAIL. Bien cordialement, Le service clients des Magasins U. Attention : Pour le bon traitement du dossier, merci de ne pas supprimer la référence de la réclamation en objet de votre message de réponse.

Subject: Complaint 00654411 - Foreign object
TextBody: Dear Regina, My apologies. I was on leave previous week and this complaint was overlooked by my colleagues. I have registered this complaint in our system with ref. 28033. This product was produced in our facility in Tilburg (The Netherlands) on 6/06/23 and packed 7/06/23. First of all we apologies for this complaint.bBased on the picture we identify this as a piece of leafage. This product was produced the 7th of June 2023. No remarks were made during the production. Leafage is normally removed with the following equipment or processes: 1)Washing –inline process 2)‘Stalk removal fingers’- inline process –this is a device similar to a rake which catches any stalk passing on the production line. 3)Optical sorters- these are designed to identify any foreign bodies, such as leafage. It is very rare to get a complaint of this nature, but a piece of leafage must have passed through the system. Our Technical Team have checked the process sheets on the day, and all equipment appears to have been working correctly, with no notification of breakdowns or issues. We consider this as an isolated case. I have completed the document you have sent me. Please find in attachment. Please do not hesitate to contact me, if you have more questions. Kr, Michelle Michelle Bevernage Technical Sales Officer P +32 496 38 91 92 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Chan, Regina [regina.chan@simplot.com] Sent: 20/05/2024 06:55 To: Michelle.Bevernage@agristo.com Cc: Phillip.Dwyer@simplot.com Subject: Complaint 00654411 - Foreign object Hi Michelle, Hope you are well. Consumer has reported a foreign object in the potato, which she believes is mouse’s tail, see complaint attached. Can you please investigate and respond with findings and corrective actions by 27/05/24, thanks. Subject: FW: WP
TextBody: Hi Rachel, Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. I have promptly registered it in our system under case number 28055. I am sorry to hear that your customer was not satisfied with the quality of this batch. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. Batch information: Lotcode : B02 24 099 12:32 Production day : 07/04/2024 As you know, all incoming potatoes are inspected for quality (including length). During the potato intake, the potatoes are graded. Also during the production process itself, the potatoes go over a grading plate. This is a metal plate with holes in it - depending on the lenght of the chips, they can travel over the plate, or fall through the holes in the plate (and are rejected). When the product comes out of the freezer and right before it is packed, it goes over a second grading plate. This allows us to meet the specifications which are set on lenght. In addition, every hour the packed product is sampled and tested for quality, including length and slivers. QC documents of these records are retained. Based on the batch code, I have conducted a thorough investigation into the quality documents for this specific batch. I see that at the time the product in question was packed, we were indeed very close to the maximum tolerance on short pieces (< 25 mm). This may indeed explain the feeling of your customer. I understand this is the third claim we have in a short period on the same product, but it has to be noted that this is another type of claim (lenght) than the two others we have recently received (product clumps). Nevertheless, viewing our excellent relationship, we are willing to compensate the 8 boxes of your customer. I have launched a credit note request in our system. It's important to note that there will always be variations in production throughout the year due to the inherent nature of potatoes as a natural product. From a technical standpoint, we always strive to offer you the best possible product. We apologize for any inconvenience that you may have suffered, but hope to have solved this complaint to your satisfaction. If you have any further concerns, please don't hesitate to contact me again.

Subject: [Request for confirmation] Claim Report 396986　[597:Agristo(ヘ゛ルキ゛ー)]
TextBody: Dear Hiroki san, Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. I have promptly registered it in our system under case number 27861. We are sorry to hear that you received three complaints about round hash browns that are mixed together wit the teddy bears in a bag of Kobe Bussan bear smile potatoes. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. Please note that I have escalted this case to the quality department of the production plant (Nazareth). I will get back to you with the answer to your questions as soon as I have received feedback from our quality department. We sincerely apologize for this mistake and will make sure this is thoroughly investigated.

Subject: Report of Difference Item -  INV: 90591509
TextBody: Dear Neviani san, Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. I have promptly registered it in our system under case number 27780. We are sorry to hear that you received a carton of Maestro shoestring fries on a pallet of Kobe Bussan shoestring fries (your article 13869) on your order S20240110-076002. Of course, this should not have happened and we sincerely apologize for this inconvenience! It is difficult to find out how this has happened, but I believe this must have happened at the loading place of the goods. Please allow me to further investigate this. In reply to your questions: Ingredient list of the samples: Potatoes (97.2%), palm oil (2.7%), E450i (= SAPP = Sodium Acid Pyrophosphate - 0.1%) Production flow chart = enclosed Pro forma invoice (no commercial value) = enclosed If you need anything else I can help you with, please do not hesitate to contact me.

I was on leave previous week and this complaint was overlooked by my colleagues. I have registered this complaint in our system with ref. 28033. This product was produced in our facility in Tilburg (The Netherlands) on 6/06/23 and packed 7/06/23. First of all we apologies for this complaint.bBased on the picture we identify this as a piece of leafage. This product was produced the 7th of June 2023. No remarks were made during the production. Leafage is normally removed with the following equipment or processes: 1)Washing –inline process 2)‘Stalk removal fingers’- inline process –this is a device similar to a rake which catches any stalk passing on the production line. 3)Optical sorters- these are designed to identify any foreign bodies, such as leafage. It is very rare to get a complaint of this nature, but a piece of leafage must have passed through the system. Our Technical Team have checked the process sheets on the day, and all equipment appears to have been working correctly, with no notification of breakdowns or issues. We consider this as an isolated case. I have completed the document you have sent me. Please find in attachment. Please do not hesitate to contact me, if you have more questions. Kr, Michelle [Image removed by sender. image] Michelle Bevernage Technical Sales Officer P +32 496 38 91 92 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Chan, Regina [regina.chan@simplot.com] Sent: 20/05/2024 06:55 To: Michelle.Bevernage@agristo.com Cc: Phillip.Dwyer@simplot.com Subject: Complaint 00654411 - Foreign object Hi Michelle, Hope you are well. Subject: Mercadona: Consumer Complaint (L-800)
TextBody: Hello Ricardo Thank you for informing us about the issue reported here below. We have well received your complaint and have registered it in our system as reference 28103. Based on the lotcode, we traced back the production day to the 3rd of April 2024. We are sorry to hear that El Jefe was not satisfied with the quality of this product. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. The description of his complaint refers to the presence of black spots and bruises on the Corte Fino. As you know, all incoming potatoes are inspected for quality and defects. Afterwards, the potatoes pass an optical sorter. A second very sophisticated optical sorter is in place after the potatoes are cut, which also removes black spots from the potato pieces. In addition, every hour the packaged product is sampled and tested for quality, including blemishes, peel, green. QC documents of these records are retained. I have checked the production and tasting records of the concerned production batch and no remarks about sprout on potatoes have been noted. We produced well within the predefined specifications during the whole production batch for all parameters, including defects. [cid:image001.png@01DAB1A6.90496EB0] It's important to note that there will always be variations in production throughout the year due to the inherent nature of potatoes as a natural product. Especially at the end of the season, when potatoes have been stored for a longer period of time, the risk for bruises and thus black and brown spots becomes bigger. From a technical standpoint, we always strive to offer you the best possible product. Please be assured that these black and brown spots do not pose any health risk. It is thus not harmful for a consumer to eat a potato with a black spot. If you have any further concerns, please don't hesitate to contact me.

Subject: Mercadona: Consumer Complaint  ( L-800)
TextBody: Hello Ricardo Thank you for informing us about the issue reported here below. We have well received your complaint and have registered it in our system as reference 28104. Based on the lotcode, we traced back the production day to the 07th of April 2024. Based on the video we have received, we can confirm this is a piece of sprout on the potato. Sprout can occur while the potatoes are being stored. Potatoes with sprout are still good for consumption, but the sprout should be removed. We notice that they tend to be more present on today as we are nearing the end of the potato season. I have checked the production and tasting records around the time of your complaint, and no remarks about sprout on potatoes have been noted. Normally this kind of defects should have been rejected by our optical sorters. But unfortunately no system can give us a 100% guarantee that all potatoes with sprout will be detected. We would like to apologize for the inconvenience and want to confirm that this is not harmful for human consumption. If you might have any other questions, do not hesitate to contact me.

TextBody: Goede morgen Marloes, Ik heb jullie melding hieronder goed ontvangen. Het lijkt er echter op dat verschillende gelijkaardige klachten worden doorgestuurd. Hieronder even een overzicht van de meldingen: Referentie Farmfrites Referentie Agristo Lotcode 235452 27871 L4 062 145 D03 2029 235451 27871 L4 062 145 D03 2029 235238 27182 L4 062 145 D03 xxxx 234854 26972 L4 062 145 D03 1330 234852 26971 L4 062 145 D03 2034 De klachten gemarkeerd in geel, hebben naast dezelfde lotcode, eveneens dezelfde detail foto , waarbij enkele misvormde kroketten op de hand worden getoond. Klacht 235238 had echter nog geen effectieve uurcode, de nieuw doorgestuurde klachten (235452+235451) hebben dit dan wel (en zijn identiek). Ik vermoed dus dat het hier om een aanvulling gaat van eerder gestuurde klacht 235238. Het is duidelijk dat er tijdens opstart van productie kortstondig iets is fout gegaan, zie mijn eerdere feedback van gisteren bij uw klacht 235238, waarvoor we ons nogmaals wensen te excuseren. Intussen werden deze klachten ook meegenomen tijdens het productieoverleg, om iedereen van de situatie op de hoogte te brengen. We hopen hiermee dergelijke incidenten in de toekomst te vermijden. Indien u alsnog verdere info zou wensen, dan horen wij het graag! Subject: Réclamation qualité Sysco France / Litige n° 24,2906 - 2629366
TextBody: Bonjour Quentin, Le contrôle de la coupe est effectué toutes les demi-heures. Le lot de plainte a été emballé à 20h40 et nous avons effectué un contrôle à 20h57 et à 20h30. Lors de ces contrôles, la coupe était bonne. Vers 17 heures, nous avons constaté une coteau cassé, mais la production à peu près au moment de la pause a été bloqué et détruit. D'après nos dossiers, la coupe du produit emballé à 20h40 devrait être conforme aux normes et nous n'avons aucune explication sur le fait qu'elle soit encore trop épaisse. Il s'agit peut-être d'une constatation du client (le client pense que le produit est trop épais alors qu'il est conforme aux normes). Si vous souhaitez obtenir de plus amples informations, nous vous prions de bien vouloir nous donner plus de détails : - existe-t-il des photos montrant que le produit est trop épais ? - Le client dispose-t-il d'un autre lot qui est manifestement moins épais ? Dans l'affirmative, veuillez également indiquer le code du lot. - quelle quantité est trop épaisse ? S'agit-il d'un sac complet, de plusieurs sacs ou d'un certain nombre de frites provenant d'un seul sac ? Merci d'avance, Cordiallement, Kathleen Samyn Technical Sales Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 44 --------------- Original Message ---------------

Subject: CMPL0047441 - Klacht - ART 22160 BONI aardappelkroketten oven 1kg
TextBody: CMPL0047441 - Klacht - ART 22160 BONI aardappelkroketten oven 1kg Beste leverancier, Op 29-05-2024 14:33:02 CEST ontvingen wij onderstaande klacht: Klachtinformatie: CLP-Aankoop Klachtnummer: CMPL0047441 Artikel: 22160 - BONI aardappelkroketten oven 1kg Lotcode: D02 24 082 15:33 Klacht: "Kroketten zien blauw." Wij vragen u om op basis van de doorgestuurde gegevens na te gaan welke oorzaken van uw kant mogelijks aan de basis liggen van deze klacht. Gelieve ook de preventieve maatregelen mee te geven die door u worden genomen om deze klacht in de toekomst te vermijden. Indien u meent dat er een risico bestaat voor de algemene (voedsel)veiligheid, vragen we u om meteen over te gaan tot een risicoanalyse en ons de besluiten ervan mee te delen. Op die manier kunnen ook wij direct de nodige maatregelen treffen en de betrokkenen correct informeren. Graag hadden wij een eerste reactie uiterlijk binnen de 48u ontvangen na ontvangst van deze klacht. Met vriendelijke groeten, Camille Muller Quality Officer Service Center Quality Product

Subject: Asda Straight Cut Chips - Nutrition Out of Spec
TextBody: Hi Marlies, As part of Asda’s routine due diligence testing a nutritional analysis has been completed on the Straight Cut Chips and the total fats have come back out of spec. The analysed results on fats have come back lower than the on-pack claims; total fats is 1.9g vs. pack claim of 3.29g, and this difference is greater than the tolerance allowed in legislation – the test certificate is attached for reference. Summary of the results is also below: [cid:image001.png@01DAB1D6.A4C5B8F0] Please can you investigate this OOS result and provide a comprehensive response using the attached SGS OOS follow-up template on what might have caused this variation along with all relevant production docs to support? The date code of the product that was tested is – BB 06/09/2025, G08 24 067 22:33. The last nutrition verification certificate that we hold on file for this product is dated August 2023. Do you have any of your own more recent ‘as consumed’ nutrition analysis for the product that you can send to support the BOP nutrition? Please can you provide your initial response on the above by 3pm on Tuesday 4th June. Let me know if you have any questions. Many thanks, Dan [cid:image085537.png@597E1F50.1B10F456] [Fullers Foods Facebook]<https://www.facebook.com/fullersfoods> [Fullers Foods Instagram]<https://www.instagram.com/fullersfoods/> [Fullers Foods LinkedIn]<https://www.linkedin.com/company/fullers-foods-plc/> Daniel Taylor​​​​ Senior Technical Manager [cid:image431687.png@D8DE5340.365A1F84] +44 7881 338652<tel:+44%207881%20338652> [cid:image467251.png@0F69246B.E5D4B9EB] +44 1134 579945<tel:+44%201134%20579945> [cid:image389958.png@138EF513.7228078F] https://fullersfoods.com<https://fullersfoodsplc.com/> [cid:image321972.png@12B5C5E3.37424CB4] daniel.taylor@fullersfoods.com<mailto:daniel.taylor@fullersfoods.com> MY EMAIL ADDRESS HAS CHANGED TO @fullersfoods.com 31 Westgate, Leeds, LS1 2RA, United Kingdom Note: This email has been sent from a member of Fullers Foods International Limited and is confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual to whom it is addressed. Please add this to your complaint system.

Subject: Claim 02903758 - Empty pack
TextBody: Dear Vinicius, We have registered it in our system under ticket number 00028274. You are correct, this complaint should not be possible due to our checkweigher. See below. Batch information: Lotcode : G03233471220 Packaging day : 13/12/2023 Our high-tech packaging lines are automatically controlled to ensure the precise net weight per bag, in accordance with EU standards. As part of the packaging process, each packaging line is equipped with two check weighers. One weigher checks the weight of each individual bag, while the other verifies the weight of each filled carton (trade unit). If a bag or carton is underweight, it is automatically rejected. Additionally, the packaging operators check the proper functioning of the check weigher during each shift. The average weight of the bags is also monitored for compliance, and all data from the packaging line (Garvens) is automatically recorded. We have conducted traceability checks, no remarks were made.We can confirm that the bags have been filled in accordance with EU standards, and any bags that did not meet these standards were removed from the production line. Can you please advise if the box contained 10 full bags and 1 empty one?This is the only explination I would have for this complaint. We apologize for any inconvenience that you may have suffered. If you have any further concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us again.

Subject: 40434583 Morrisons FB Complaint - Cheddar Cheese Hash Browns 550g 600531
TextBody: Hello, We have received a new complaint, please see the below details: Fullers Reference 600531 Customer Reference 40434583 Product Morrisons Cheddar Cheese Hash Browns 550g Date Code - Batch Code - Complaint Category FB Complaint Detail Looks like something has gone through the machine at the same time as the hash browns. Images requested. This is sent for information only. Please add this to your complaint system.

Subject: RE: 40313499 Morrisons FB Complaint - Roast Potatoes 800g 600477
TextBody: Hi Evelien, As I am sure Kathleen has made you aware Morrisons are very concerned about the number of defect complaints they are receiving for their roast potatoes. We had a similar issue last year for the product & the pattern is repeating. The product is the same as for ASDA & Tesco & I know they have had shared production runs, but these customers don’t have the same issue with complaints. Kathleen has made us aware of a project that is underway to improve the optical sorters to improve the rejections for defects on the roast potatoes we have made Morrisons aware that this is happening & have asked for further details of the scope & aim of this project when the person responsible is back from their holiday. Given the work on the optical sorter from what date code can we expect improved product to be seen by the Morrisons customer? Paul Montgomery would like to visit Tilburg as soon as possible given the numbers of complaints when this product is being produced. Please can you advise a suitable date for this visit?

Subject: Claim 02880438 - Sealing issue
TextBody: Dear Vinicius, Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. We have promptly registered it in our system under ticket number 00028225. We are sorry to hear that your customer was not satisfied with the quality of this batch. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. Batch information: Lotcode : D04233310829 Packaging day : 27/11/2023 I would like to reassure you that during the packing process, we conduct quality checks. Our team tests the seals of the bags on an hourly basis. A box is removed from the packaging line, and all bags are meticulously inspected to ensure that the seals are properly closed. These inspection results are recorded in our Quality documents. In light of the concerns you raised, we have conducted an investigation into the packaging checks for the particular batch. The bag was checked at 8h20. No remarks were made. This is wy we believe this is an isolated issue. We regret any inconvenience this issue may have caused you or your customer. We take this matter seriously and are committed to preventing such incidents in the future. Should you require any further information or assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us.

TextBody: Dear Vinicius, We have registered it in our system under ticket number 00028274. You are correct, this complaint should not be possible due to our checkweigher. See below. Batch information: Lotcode : G03233471220 Packaging day : 13/12/2023 Our high-tech packaging lines are automatically controlled to ensure the precise net weight per bag, in accordance with EU standards. As part of the packaging process, each packaging line is equipped with two check weighers. One weigher checks the weight of each individual bag, while the other verifies the weight of each filled carton (trade unit). If a bag or carton is underweight, it is automatically rejected. Additionally, the packaging operators check the proper functioning of the check weigher during each shift. The average weight of the bags is also monitored for compliance, and all data from the packaging line (Garvens) is automatically recorded. We have conducted traceability checks, no remarks were made.We can confirm that the bags have been filled in accordance with EU standards, and any bags that did not meet these standards were removed from the production line. Can you please advise if the box contained 10 full bags and 1 empty one?This is the only explination I would have for this complaint. We apologize for any inconvenience that you may have suffered. If you have any further concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us again.

Subject: Réclamation AC 361/2024
TextBody: Bonjour à vous, Merci pour votre retour. Pour faire suite à votre dernier mail, voici ci-joint les informations concernant la 3ème photo qui n’était pas lisible. Pourriez-vous l’attribuer comme les deux autres, afin que l’on puisse clôturer cette réclamation ? En vous remerciant pour votre retour, Cordialement, Mathilde FRIOUX Pour Marine CATHERIN Assistante Qualité Fournisseurs [cid:image003.png@01DAB1F2.883E30B0] [cid:image004.jpg@01DAB1F2.883E30B0] SVELTIC - ZA bout de lande - 35890 Laillé Téléphone : 02 99 42 32 22 De : Agristo Claims <claims@agristo.com<mailto:claims@agristo.com>> Envoyé : vendredi 19 avril 2024 10:00 À : Marine CATHERIN <marine.catherin@mousquetaires.com<mailto:marine.catherin@mousquetaires.com>> Cc : Francois TRANNOY <francois.trannoy@mousquetaires.com<mailto:francois.trannoy@mousquetaires.com>>; Delphine.Heyse@agristo.com<mailto:Delphine.Heyse@agristo.com>; Melanie JEULAND-VALLEE <melanie.jeuland-vallee@mousquetaires.com<mailto:melanie.jeuland-vallee@mousquetaires.com>> Objet : RE: Réclamation AC 361/2024 Bonjour Marine Françoise profite de vacances bien méritées. En attendant, je me ferai un plaisir de vous aider à identifier les éléments. Dans la pièce jointe, vous trouverez un aperçu, sur la base des photos, j'ai pu attribuer 2 unités en vrac. La 3ème photo n'est pas lisible, l'étiquette semble également OK. Si vous avez une meilleure photo de l'étiquette, je peux probablement l'attribuer également. Je pense que la cause semble être pendant le transport. Bien à vous, Wouter [image] Wouter Claerhout Technical Sales Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 44 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Marine CATHERIN [marine.catherin@mousquetaires.com] Sent: 18/04/2024 16:44 To: Delphine.Heyse@agristo.com<mailto:Delphine.Heyse@agristo.com>; Francoise.DeVrieze@agristo.com<mailto:Francoise.DeVrieze@agristo.com> Cc: melanie.jeuland-vallee@mousquetaires.com<mailto:melanie.jeuland-vallee@mousquetaires.com>; francois.trannoy@mousquetaires.com<mailto:francois.trannoy@mousquetaires.com> Subject: Réclamation AC 361/2024 Bonjour, Veuillez trouver ci-joint une fiche de réclamation fournisseur ainsi que les photos correspondantes. Subject: 000200085305  - Incident sur le produit Rosty - 60
TextBody: Cher/Chère Edouard Cailette, Nous vous remercions de nous avoir informé de ce sujet, que nous avons immédiatement enregistré dans notre système sous le numéro de ticket 00027816. Nous sommes désolés d'apprendre que votre client n'était pas satisfait de la qualité de cette série. La qualité de nos produits est d'une importance capitale pour nous, et nous sommes déterminés à résoudre cette question. Informations sur le batch: Code de lot : D0324107 Jour d'emballage : 16/04/2024 Je tiens à vous assurer que lors du processus d'emballage, nous effectuons des contrôles de qualité. Notre équipe teste les fermetures des sacs toutes les heures. Un carton est retiré de la ligne d’emballage, et tous les sacs sont minutieusement inspectés pour garantir que les emballages sont correctement fermés. Les résultats de ces inspections sont consignés dans nos documents de qualité. Conformément aux préoccupations que vous avez soulevées, nous avons mené une enquête sur les contrôles d'emballage de cette série en particulier. Nous regrettons tout désagrément que cette situation a pu causer à vous ou à votre client. Nous prenons cette question au sérieux et nous nous engageons à prévenir tels incidents à l'avenir. Si vous avez besoin de plus d'informations ou d'assistance supplémentaire, n'hésitez pas à nous contacter.

Subject: 000200085909  - Incident sur le produit Croquettes
TextBody: Cher / Chère Edouard Cailette , Nous vous remercions de nous avoir informé de ce sujet, que nous avons immédiatement enregistré dans notre système sous le numéro de ticket 00027986. Nous sommes désolés d'apprendre que votre client n'était pas satisfait de la qualité de cette série. La qualité de nos produits est d'une importance capitale pour nous, et nous sommes déterminés à résoudre cette question. Informations sur le batch: Lotcode : D012410418 Date de Production: Compte tenu de notre processus de production, qui comprend des laveuses de pommes de terre, de l'eau de traitement, des blanchisseuses, des friteuses, et plus encore, il est très improbable que cet insecte ait pu parcourir l'ensemble de notre processus de production sans être détecté et retiré. Nous sommes convaincus qu'une contamination de cette nature aurait été identifiée à plusieurs étapes de la production. Par conséquent, nous soupçonnons que la contamination a pu se produire après la phase de friture. Il est possible qu'un insecte soit entré dans notre environnement de production et se soit involontairement attaché aux frites avant l'emballage. Il est important de noter que nous disposons d'un système rigoureux de lutte antiparasitaire pour empêcher l'entrée d'insectes et de rongeurs dans l'usine. Toutes les portes doivent impérativement rester fermées en permanence, et nous effectuons une surveillance constante de ces contrôles. J'ai déjà entamé le processus d'acquisition d'informations sur la lutte antiparasitaire autour de la date de production, . Actuellement, nos résultats en matière de contrôle qualité ne révèlent rien d'anormal. Malheureusement, il semble que, malgré nos efforts, nous n'ayons pas réussi à prévenir la contamination dans ce cas, et nous tenons à nous en excuser. Si vous ou votre client avez besoin de plus d'informations, n'hésitez pas à nous contacter. Si vous avez besoin de plus d'infos, merci de me fournir la photo concernée. Cordialement, Sarah Sarah Detailleur Customer Experience Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 65 M + 0498 74 13 14 --------------- Original Message ---------------

Subject: Your Sainsbury's Product Related Customer Complaints - Daily Email 29.05.2024
TextBody: Dear Supplier, These are all the customer complaints for your product that we received in store, were logged via our Careline or were allocated to you by our Oscar Trading Team yesterday 29.05.2024. These complaints may be in a status of approved (approved for charging), rejected (rejected from charging) or pending review (awaiting review by the Oscar Trading Team). This report should be used as an ‘early warning’ of any issues relating to your products. This report may not list all the complaints for your products or all those that you will be charged for at the end of the period. This is because cases are still being checked by the system at the time that the report is generated and these cases, once checked and assigned, will report either in the next weekly report, or the period end report. The period end report will be the full and final list of all trading cases generated and allocated to your supplier number for this financial period. ***Please note, upon opening the attachment you may be presented with a popup stating that the file is corrupt or unsafe. This popup appears as a precaution because this email is generated automatically, however you can trust that the attachment is neither corrupt nor unsafe. To dismiss the popup and open the file, click ‘Yes’ on the popup.*** Please note that this mailbox (Trading.service) is not manned; please do not respond to it. If you have any queries, please contact Oscar.Trading@sainsburys.co.uk, quoting the Trading Case Number as soon as possible after receipt of this email.

Subject: PO 755808 - Missing empty boxes
TextBody: Thank you, Sarah. We appreciate the team’s immediate attention to this. I’m sharing some additional pictures from this morning’s delivery. Please also see picture with the open case with 3 sleeves of HB missing. The case was loaded like that. How could that have happened? @Sonja <mailto:Sonja.Deleersnijder@agristo.com> thank you for your call earlier today. As discussed, the customer would be looking for answers on the following. We should be prepared with answers to this tomorrow morning please. * Does the expedition team have authorization/capability to reject pallets upon loading? (considering a zero tolerance policy for damaged cases/pallets) * And where would the rejected pallets go? Do the loading docks have a dedicated area for repacking/restacking/reworking? (temp controlled space) * OR do they have capability to pick new pallet(s)? How long would it take to pick new missing pallet(s)? 10-20 min or 2hr? Is it reasonable to assume the haulier can wait? * Who does the expedition team communicate with when they see physical damages? Is it escalated to supervisor? Is there a supervisor walking the loading dock at all times? At the end of the day, customer believes we need to tighten up oversight of the expedition team. The proposed corrective measures might do the trick. Thank you for checking feasibility. * Supervisors on the floor for frequent spot checks * Agristo Customer service team drop in for random spot checks * Have haulier spot check (DBS/RCL) – important we inspect along the way during container loading, not just before doors are closed, as damages are not typically at the doors, but in the middle pallets * Declare empty boxes on PL & Invoice * Ensure capability to reject and pick new pallets Thank you <https://protect.checkpoint.com/v2/___http://www.ardovlm.com/___.YzJlOmFncmlzdG86YzpvOjY5MWRlMTU0NmE5NjNiOGZmNGVhNzVhNmY3OGFhYzFjOjY6Zjk4Yjo2ZTA4NWEyMjg1YTA4YzhmNzBkNjg5ZDMzNzIwNzA1MGE2MWE5MmU2OGMwNTIwOTg4NzhlMWU4YzRmZjg4NzM4Omg6Rg> Kayla Karabachian Business Unit Manager – Industry/Food Service 1675 Blvd. Saint-Regis, Dollard-des-ormeaux, QC, H9B 3H7 T: (514) 825-9346 | F: (514) 426-5977 From: Sarah Detailleur <Sarah.Detailleur@agristo.com> Sent: Wednesday, May 29, 2024 12:13 PM To: Kayla Karabachian <kayla.karabachian@ardo.com>; Sophie François <Sophie.Francois@agristo.com>; Sophie Rondou <Sophie.Rondou@agristo.com> Cc: Louise Regnier <Louise.Regnier@agristo.com>; Jeff Preston <Jeff.Preston@ardo.com>; Julia Melnyk <Julia.Melnyk@ardo.com> Subject: RE: Reddy Raw PO 755808 (VF3314) CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. Hi Kayla, I’m sorry to see/hear another complaint. This is not acceptable. Sonja and myself have just spoken to our supply chain manager in Tilburg. She will take the beneath complaint back to Tilburg and come back with a plan of action. We will keep you posted tomorrow. KR, Sarah Sarah​​​​ Detailleur Customer Service Specialist T +32 56 54 11 65 <tel:+32%2056%2054%2011%2065> • M +32 498 74 13 14 <tel:+32%20498%2074%2013%2014> Ridder de Ghellinckstraat 9 • 8710 Wielsbeke • Belgium • www.agristo.com <https://protect.checkpoint.com/v2/___https://eu.content.exclaimer.net?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.agristo.com%2F&tenantid=R5mU58TWEe6F-gAiSH-K5g&templateid=443634af22d2ee1185fa0022487f8ae6&excomponentid=E_Xg2xpZEE7COvcAHBDP1EjLNrmijgfYCtnikvl0Y9o&excomponenttype=Link&signature=iFzMwqF297Gnrm9dssB9y6ZrUX6ui-gbIW3mmKrmZFU0fKOdCY7CBRtJiGe_Spn4dNtCSo7Dz3SqIjt40FOTSKqvA4CSyfr_2rdEcKiywYfk52eQDa3TP0yee1aLPqWhlT2-VWyiSjlwfPeFC2XwjArwx6eH8DXqSxKsPDk9zRTDisnzduRzC5ojXNfUDKcsXK30zIlw0nO2bRD_7benWToceZV3s_7YbFbU3vGih3dwe7J_ewazTQT4GtDl-pg3BF4NpNhrrDUxkkXgyyy9lKCK6ZoEagBoNlU-jxW4a96QCUEXG9ZPC0VjWmDRcOTQgLwZs2UYlVAA1eRt3wY-fw&v=1___.YzJlOmFncmlzdG86YzpvOjY5MWRlMTU0NmE5NjNiOGZmNGVhNzVhNmY3OGFhYzFjOjY6N2YyZjpkNDkxZGM5M2MzMDQzNDEyNzFhZmY4MjcxOWU3ZDJkMGRmZTVkYWE3NTFjM2I2YjRiN2NhYzljMWRjZDAxODNkOmg6Rg> <https://protect.checkpoint.com/v2/___https://eu.content.exclaimer.net/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.agristo.com%2F&tenantid=R5mU58TWEe6F-gAiSH-K5g&templateid=443634af22d2ee1185fa0022487f8ae6&excomponentid=0FtwO6H728rcYRqVjUeXx_KJWv-RPvCRW1zd8woKpSo&excomponenttype=Image&signature=iFzMwqF297Gnrm9dssB9y6ZrUX6ui-gbIW3mmKrmZFU0fKOdCY7CBRtJiGe_Spn4dNtCSo7Dz3SqIjt40FOTSKqvA4CSyfr_2rdEcKiywYfk52eQDa3TP0yee1aLPqWhlT2-VWyiSjlwfPeFC2XwjArwx6eH8DXqSxKsPDk9zRTDisnzduRzC5ojXNfUDKcsXK30zIlw0nO2bRD_7benWToceZV3s_7YbFbU3vGih3dwe7J_ewazTQT4GtDl-pg3BF4NpNhrrDUxkkXgyyy9lKCK6ZoEagBoNlU-jxW4a96QCUEXG9ZPC0VjWmDRcOTQgLwZs2UYlVAA1eRt3wY-fw&v=1___.YzJlOmFncmlzdG86YzpvOjY5MWRlMTU0NmE5NjNiOGZmNGVhNzVhNmY3OGFhYzFjOjY6YTU1ZDoyMjE1NDA3NzhmNTczZTVhM2E4ZjkyODM1MDNkZTlkYjcyZmMzM2JiYzZiZjJhMWJmNzRiZDg5NDY1MjBiY2YzOmg6Rg>

Subject: RE: 40313499 Morrisons FB Complaint - Roast Potatoes 800g 600477
TextBody: Good morning Clare, We received the following answer by our production planners: This week we have the last run of the HNA F with the old crop. The next run will only be again with the new harvest probably in week 30 or week 32. I dare not say for sure yet because it is not yet known when new harvest starts. Maybe we can set up a teams meeting to discuss this with Mr Montgomery as a visit during production of this article is currently impossible? Next week we will send you more information when we have asked our product engineer for more feedback as he is on holiday this week. We will keep you posted.

TextBody: Hallo Anja, Credit nota is inderdaad aangevraagd, na goedkeuring stuur ik u deze op. Groetjes, Marlies Marlies De Ketele Technical Sales Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 63 --------------- Original Message ---------------

Subject: Ref: 324042TH Customer Enquiry
TextBody: Dear Samantha Thank you for your email. I am concerned to hear about your recent purchase. We strive to ensure that all products supplied to us are of a standard and quality you would expect from Farmfoods. I have today forwarded your comments to the supplier of this product for them to look into further. If you do still have the original packaging and can let me know the batch code, I can also pass that on to help with their investigation. In the meantime, please accept my sincere apologies for the distress and inconvenience this must have caused. I would like to send you, with our compliments, a Farmfoods voucher as a gesture of goodwill. I would also like to enclose a self-addressed envelope for safe return of the mentioned object. Once received, I will forward this to the supplier to further aid their investigation. I will send this in today’s post to the address provided in your email. I do hope that you will continue to shop at Farmfoods as we do value your custom.

Subject: CMPL0047441 - Klacht - ART 22160 BONI aardappelkroketten oven 1kg
TextBody: Geachte, Bedankt dat u deze kwestie onder onze aandacht heeft gebracht. We hebben het onmiddellijk in ons systeem geregistreerd onder ticketnummer 00028258. Het spijt ons te horen dat uw klant niet tevreden was over de kwaliteit van onze producten. De kwaliteit van onze producten is voor ons van het allergrootste belang en wij doen er alles aan om deze kwestie op te lossen. Badinformatie: Lotcode: D02240821533 Inpakdag: 22/03/2024 Op basis van de lotcode hebben wij onze productiegegevens en kwaliteitsdocumenten voor deze specifieke batch grondig onderzocht. Er is geen melding gemaakt over vreemde blauwe stukjes in het product. Vermoedelijk gaat het hier over transportband of blauwe liner stukjes. Voor verder onderzoek, heb ik de foto's doorgestuurd naar onze kwaliteitsmanager om achter te halen wat de oorzaak hiervan zou zijn. Eenmaal ik haar feedback heb, zal ik u verder inlichten over het onderzoek. In tussentijd, indien u verder vragen hebt, contacteer mij gerust. Met vriendelijke groeten Sandrine Van Bockstael Technical Sales Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 44 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: CSMGT [customer.servicemanagement@colruytgroup.com] Sent: 29/05/2024 16:02 To: sarah.segers1@colruyt.be; wouter.claerhout@agristo.com; claims@agristo.com; veerle.vanhecke@colruytgroup.com Cc: servicenow.confidential@colruytgroup.com Subject: CMPL0047441 - Klacht - ART 22160 BONI aardappelkroketten oven 1kg CMPL0047441 - Klacht - ART 22160 BONI aardappelkroketten oven 1kg Beste leverancier, Op 29-05-2024 14:33:02 CEST ontvingen wij onderstaande klacht: Klachtinformatie: CLP-Aankoop Klachtnummer: CMPL0047441 Artikel: 22160 - BONI aardappelkroketten oven 1kg Lotcode: D02 24 082 15:33 Klacht: "Kroketten zien blauw." Wij vragen u om op basis van de doorgestuurde gegevens na te gaan welke oorzaken van uw kant mogelijks aan de basis liggen van deze klacht. Gelieve ook de preventieve maatregelen mee te geven die door u worden genomen om deze klacht in de toekomst te vermijden. Indien u meent dat er een risico bestaat voor de algemene (voedsel)veiligheid, vragen we u om meteen over te gaan tot een risicoanalyse en ons de besluiten ervan mee te delen. Op die manier kunnen ook wij direct de nodige maatregelen treffen en de betrokkenen correct informeren. Graag hadden wij een eerste reactie uiterlijk binnen de 48u ontvangen na ontvangst van deze klacht. Met vriendelijke groeten, Camille Muller Quality Officer Service Center Quality Product camille.muller@colruytgroup.com T +32 (0)2 363 55 45 Edingensesteenweg 196 - 1500 Halle www.colruytgroup.com LinkedIn Twitter Ref:MSG28560049_J274r255nobuCmMMEko

Subject: Réclamation consommateur - Reponse fournisseur [N° de reclamation=FR-2024-08138] du 27/05/2024 19:01:50
TextBody: Cher , Nous vous remercions de nous avoir informé de ce sujet, que nous avons immédiatement enregistré dans notre système sous le numéro de ticket 00028045. Nous sommes désolés d'apprendre que votre client n'était pas satisfait de la qualité de cette production. La qualité de nos produits est d'une importance capitale pour nous, et nous sommes déterminés à résoudre cette question. Informations du lot: Date de Production: 18/04/2024 En annexe je vous envoie notre document sur les allergens du site de production. Les sulphites sont présents sur le site mais seulement sur nos flocons de pommes de terre et non sur les produits comme les frites et les potatoes. il n'y a pas de risque de cross contimination. Les potatoes contiennent les ingrédients: Pommes de terre (93,9%), Huile de tournesol (3,5%), Farine de riz, Sel, Dextrine, Fécule de pomme de terre, Ail, Poivre noir, Paprika en poudre, Granulés d’oignon, Arôme naturel, Chili en poudre Cordialement, Sandrine Sandrine Van Bockstael Technical Sales Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 44 --------------- Original Message ---------------

Subject: Indemnités logistiques ITM - avril 2024 - 82006 - AGRISTO N-V - 76
TextBody: Bonjour, A la suite des différentes commandes livrées au cours du mois de avril 2024, nous avons constaté, sur la base du contrat logistique qui nous unit, des défauts de performances logistiques de votre part. Afin de démontrer ces manquements, vous trouverez en pièce jointe, à titre de preuve, une extraction du logiciel de gestion. Conformément au paragraphe D de la Foire Aux Questions portant sur les lignes directrices en matière de pénalités logistiques, « une photographie, une capture écran du logiciel » font partie des preuves matérialisant le manquement. Le préjudice lié à ces défauts de performance logistique est détaillé dans les pièces jointes. Le respect des niveaux de performance convenus dans notre contrat logistique permet d'assurer un taux de service optimal de livraison auprès de nos Points de Vente, permettant ainsi d’éviter tout manquement engendrant un manque à gagner à la revente en raison de l’indisponibilité de la marchandise en temps et heure. Nous vous rappelons que vous disposez d'un délai de 30 jours à compter de la réception de cet avis de pénalités pour en contrôler le bien-fondé et nous transmettre vos remarques. Merci de nous retourner vos analyses contradictoires associées à cette extraction. Au retour de vos remarques, lors d’échanges contradictoires, nous prendrons en compte les éléments justifiés et documentés que vous mentionneriez afin d’obtenir un accord avant établissement d’une facturation. Nous restons à votre disposition pour toute question et pour étudier avec vous des moyens spécifiques afin d'améliorer votre performance logistique pour nos prochaines commandes. Nous vous remercions de bien vouloir adresser vos retours à l'adresse mail : itmlai_negociations_logistiques@mousquetaires.com et à votre négociateur de dossier : - Fatyne BOUFOUS - fatyne.boufous@mousquetaires.com : Frais non laitier (volailles, œuf, traiteur, charcuterie, traiteur de la mer, viandes) - Priscillia LUZOLO - priscillia.luzolo@mousquetaires.com : DPH (Parfumerie, entretien et Hygiène) & Epicerie Salée - Marylise GOBIN - marylise.gobin@mousquetaires.com : Epicerie Sucrée / PPI & Animaux - Chloé MAYALA - chloe.mayala@mousquetaires.com : Vins & Champagnes, BNA, Bière, Alcools & Gel - Faustine BOSIO - faustine.bosio@mousquetaires.com : Frais Laitier - Carine GALLETTE - carine.gallette@mousquetaires.com : Maison/Textile Cordialement, Equipe Négociation / Logistique ITM LAI ----------------------------- Disclaimer ------------------------------ --- Ce message ainsi que les éventuelles pièces jointes constituent une correspondance privée et confidentielle à l'attention exclusive du destinataire désigné ci-dessus. Si vous n'êtes pas le destinataire du présent message ou une personne susceptible de pouvoir le lui délivrer, il vous est signifié que toute divulgation, distribution ou copie, totale ou partielle, sur un quelconque support de cette transmission est strictement interdite. Si vous avez recu ce message par erreur, nous vous remercions d'en informer l'expéditeur par téléphone ou de lui retourner le présent message, puis d'effacer immédiatement ce message de votre systeme. Tout message électronique est susceptible d'altération. Le "groupement des Mousquetaires" décline toute responsabilité au titre de ce message s'il a été altéré, déformé ou falsifié.--- --- This e-mail and any attachments is a confidential correspondence intended only for use of the individual or entity named above. If you are not the intended recipient or the agent responsible for delivering the message to the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any disclosure, distribution or copying, either whole or partial, in any medium of this communication is strictly prohibited. If you have received this communication by mistake, please notify the sender by phone or by replying this message, and then delete this message from your system. E-mails are susceptible of alteration. The "Mousquetaires' group" shall not therefore be liable for the message if altered, changed or falsified.--- -----------------------------------------------------------------------

Subject: CMPL0046734 - Klacht - ART 22160 BONI aardappelkroketten oven 1kg 05569 AGRISTO NV
TextBody: Geachte, Batchinformatie: Lotcode: D02240821533 Productiedag: 22/03/2024 Er is een compleet kwaliteitsborgingssysteem aanwezig en de principes van HACCP worden toegepast. Dit omvat een volledig monitoringsysteem op de productielijn. De eindproducten zelf worden elke 60 minuten bemonsterd en onderzocht op kwaliteit, inclusief smaak. Van deze en alle andere controles worden volledige gegevens bijgehouden. Op basis van de lotcode hebben wij voor deze specifieke partij een grondig onderzoek gedaan naar onze productieregistraties en kwaliteitsdocumenten. De kroketten waren geproduceerd volgens onze vooraf gedefinieerde specificaties en er waren geen opmerkingen over de smaak van de kroketten. Dit recept is zorgvuldig afgetoetst geweest met Colruyt. De klant zal inderdaad opgemerkt hebben dat dit een nieuwe lancering is binnen onze samenwerking. Met vriendelijke groeten Sandrine Van Bockstael Technical Sales Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 44 --------------- Original Message ---------------

Subject: CMPL0046381 - Klacht - ART 22160 BONI aardappelkroketten oven 1kg 05569 AGRISTO NV
TextBody: Geachte, Bedankt dat u deze kwestie onder onze aandacht heeft gebracht. We hebben het onmiddellijk in ons systeem geregistreerd onder ticketnummer 00026998. Het spijt ons te horen dat uw klant niet tevreden was over de kwaliteit van onze producten. De kwaliteit van onze producten is voor ons van het allergrootste belang en wij doen er alles aan om deze kwestie op te lossen. Batchinformatie: Lotcode: D02240822041 Inpakdag: 22/03/2024 Deze klacht is gerelateerd aan jullie klacht CMPL0047441. Hierbij loopt er verder onderzoek door onze kwaliteitsmanager. Het gaat hier vermoedelijk over blauw plastiek uit onze productie. Op basis van de foto's zal er verder onderzoek lopen, over wat precies de oorzaak is van dit blauw plastiek. Hierbij wil ik de klant geruststellen dat er geen gevolgen zullen zijn door het eten hiervan. Wel zullen wel onze uiterste best doen om de oorzaak te achterhalen en gepaste maatregelen te nemen. In tussentijd, indien u verder vragen hebt, contacteer mij gerust. Nogmaals onze excuses voor het ongemak. Met vriendelijke groeten Sandrine Van Bockstael Technical Sales Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 44 --------------- Original Message ---------------

Subject: PO 755808 - Missing empty boxes
TextBody: Good Day Agristo Team, Please note the following deductions the customer is taking on for this load. $1, 000 USD for the wrong boxes shipped, restacking charge of $375 USD and a reboxing charge of $140 USD (35cs @ $4 USD/each). Thank you, <https://protect.checkpoint.com/v2/___http://www.ardovlm.com/___.YzJlOmFncmlzdG86YzpvOmMxNjIxNTA2NzUzZmEzNzk1NjBlNjM5OTdkNDNmM2UxOjY6MWQwNjo4NGUzYmRkMDliN2RmYmM4ZDA4YmMzZWY1YTk2YTkyZDg0MTQ5ZGY1ODgxNjA4YmQxZmI2ZTRhM2QwYjk3NjJlOmg6Rg> Julia Melnyk Senior Customer Account Specialist 1675 Blvd.Saint-Regis, Dollard-des-Ormeaux, QC, H9B 3H7 T: (514) 426-4100 Ext. 250 From: Kayla Karabachian <kayla.karabachian@ardo.com> Sent: Wednesday, May 29, 2024 3:10 PM To: Sarah Detailleur <Sarah.Detailleur@agristo.com>; Sophie François <Sophie.Francois@agristo.com>; Sophie Rondou <Sophie.Rondou@agristo.com>; Sonja Deleersnijder <Sonja.Deleersnijder@agristo.com> Cc: Louise Regnier <Louise.Regnier@agristo.com>; Jeff Preston <Jeff.Preston@ardo.com>; Julia Melnyk <Julia.Melnyk@ardo.com> Subject: RE: Reddy Raw PO 755808 (VF3314) Thank you, Sarah. We appreciate the team’s immediate attention to this. I’m sharing some additional pictures from this morning’s delivery. Please also see picture with the open case with 3 sleeves of HB missing. The case was loaded like that. How could that have happened? @Sonja <mailto:Sonja.Deleersnijder@agristo.com> thank you for your call earlier today. As discussed, the customer would be looking for answers on the following. We should be prepared with answers to this tomorrow morning please. * Does the expedition team have authorization/capability to reject pallets upon loading? (considering a zero tolerance policy for damaged cases/pallets) * And where would the rejected pallets go? Do the loading docks have a dedicated area for repacking/restacking/reworking? (temp controlled space) * OR do they have capability to pick new pallet(s)? How long would it take to pick new missing pallet(s)? 10-20 min or 2hr? Is it reasonable to assume the haulier can wait? * Who does the expedition team communicate with when they see physical damages? Is it escalated to supervisor? Is there a supervisor walking the loading dock at all times? At the end of the day, customer believes we need to tighten up oversight of the expedition team. The proposed corrective measures might do the trick. Thank you for checking feasibility. * Supervisors on the floor for frequent spot checks * Agristo Customer service team drop in for random spot checks * Have haulier spot check (DBS/RCL) – important we inspect along the way during container loading, not just before doors are closed, as damages are not typically at the doors, but in the middle pallets * Declare empty boxes on PL & Invoice * Ensure capability to reject and pick new pallets Thank you <https://protect.checkpoint.com/v2/___http://www.ardovlm.com/___.YzJlOmFncmlzdG86YzpvOmMxNjIxNTA2NzUzZmEzNzk1NjBlNjM5OTdkNDNmM2UxOjY6M2IwZjozMjM1ODk3YWZmMmQzM2Q5ZmY5NzY3OTFkYTc5MTMzNmVmNzU5YjkwMmE5MjYzMGJlZjIxM2UwY2E0MTM0MTA2Omg6Rg> Kayla Karabachian Business Unit Manager – Industry/Food Service 1675 Blvd. Saint-Regis, Dollard-des-ormeaux, QC, H9B 3H7 T: (514) 825-9346 | F: (514) 426-5977 From: Sarah Detailleur <Sarah.Detailleur@agristo.com <mailto:Sarah.Detailleur@agristo.com> > Sent: Wednesday, May 29, 2024 12:13 PM To: Kayla Karabachian <kayla.karabachian@ardo.com <mailto:kayla.karabachian@ardo.com> >; Sophie François <Sophie.Francois@agristo.com <mailto:Sophie.Francois@agristo.com> >; Sophie Rondou <Sophie.Rondou@agristo.com <mailto:Sophie.Rondou@agristo.com> > Cc: Louise Regnier <Louise.Regnier@agristo.com <mailto:Louise.Regnier@agristo.com> >; Jeff Preston <Jeff.Preston@ardo.com <mailto:Jeff.Preston@ardo.com> >; Julia Melnyk <Julia.Melnyk@ardo.com <mailto:Julia.Melnyk@ardo.com> > Subject: RE: Reddy Raw PO 755808 (VF3314) CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. Hi Kayla, I’m sorry to see/hear another complaint. This is not acceptable. Sonja and myself have just spoken to our supply chain manager in Tilburg. She will take the beneath complaint back to Tilburg and come back with a plan of action. We will keep you posted tomorrow. Subject: NCF 19324 Pomme noisette 2,5KGx4 / 10KG PPF AGRISTO
TextBody: Bonjour, Je m'excuse pour le retard. Nous avons registré ce non-confirmité sous la référence 00028487. Concernant la matière sèche des pommes noisettes, j'ai eu la réponse qu'il ne peuvent pas adapter le taux de matière sèche pendant la production. Tout dépend du premix qui est livré et celui ci contrôle le taux de matière sèche. Sachez que la matière sèche n’est pas un taux fix et peut varier dans la saison ou par batch de pommes de terre. Le taux matière sèche est un paramètre inférieur chez les spécialités de pommes de terre. La matière sèche n’a pas un grand impact sur le texture d’une pomme noisette. Chez Agristo, le service qualité teste toutes les heures les paramètres organoleptiques et le lendemain il y a un panel qui aussi goûte les pommes noisettes après une production. Cordialement, Regine --------------- Original Message --------------- From: RAPY Solène [s.rapy@groupe-pomona.fr] Sent: 22/05/2024 16:38 To: Regine.Legein@agristo.com Subject: NCF 19324 Pomme noisette 2,5KGx4 / 10KG PPF AGRISTO Bonjour, Dans le cadre de notre plan de contrôle annuel nous avons analysé la référence suivante : PRODUIT : 19324 Pomme noisette 2,5KGx4 / 10KG PPF DLC/DLUO : 28/01/2026 LOT : F124 029 10:35 Vous trouverez ci-joint le bulletin d'analyse présentant une non-conformité : Matières grasses totales non conforme au tolérance et calcul extrait sec non conforme Merci de nous envoyer : les résultats des autres contrôles associés à la date de fabrication du produit objet de la non-conformité Cordialement, ______________________________________________ Solène RAPY Ingénieur Qualité Filières Direction Qualité et Responsabilité Sociétale de l'Entreprise 3 avenue du Docteur Ténine - 92184 - ANTONY Cedex Tél : 01 55 59 64 47 s.rapy@groupe-pomona.fr https://protect.checkpoint.com/v2/___www.groupe-pomona.fr___.YzJlOmFncmlzdG86YzpvOjM1ZTNkNjdmMmUzZThkYTgxOGU2NWM3OGU2MGUyODI2OjY6YjhmMTo3Njg1OTkzZmJjZjc3YmI4MGIzY2E4YmUxN2U1ZmFiODgxMjM3OTU3ZGMwMTEzMDJkYTFhZGM1NDUzM2M5OTUzOnQ6VA

Subject: [Request for confirmation] Claim Report 396716　[597:Agristo(ヘ゛ルキ゛ー)]◆
TextBody: Dear Yuga san, Enclosed you can find an overview of the goods that have been produced, including the batch code, expiry date, order number and invoice number. As this was evident on the pictures you kindly shared, we are sure that this kind of perforation has been used on packing line D05. As you can see on the overview, however, 3 pallets were also packed on packing line D07 on this day. Unfortunately, as we do not have reference samples from this packing line, we can't tell if this kind of perforation has been used on this packing line D07 as well or not. Once again our sincere apologies for this. I have escalated this matter internally. If you need any further information, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Subject: RE: CLAIM QA-0524241 - case strength issue #53206 IQF Prefried Potato Cones 4/5.5lb
TextBody: Hi Melanie, I reviewed the pictures. This also surprises me. First, I can confirm that the strength of the outer cases did not change. My first question would be if there were already this kind of issues in the past. But I see you already confirmed this is not the case. A possibility can be that the outer case was more exposed to humidity then normal. However, it is strange that it only concerns one case then. For the moment it is difficult to supply a root cause or corrective action since this has never happened in the past. I would assume this is an isolated case. I see that the bags inside are still ok. If this would not be the case, you can sent us a note for affected bags due to this issue. Please let us know if you would receive more claims of this sort in the future! In the future you can sent all your claims to claims@agristo.com <mailto:claims@agristo.com> . When I am on leave these kinds of complaints are then easily picked up by my colleagues! Thank you for your understanding. Subject: Melding PLUS Consumentenservice - 240526-000042 - Friet met schil bevatte 2 stukken aardappelsmurrie
TextBody: Let op!: U kunt niet middels reply (Re) op deze e-mail reageren. Klik op de onderstaande link om te reageren. Beste leverancier, Wij ontvingen een melding over een PLUS product dat door u wordt geproduceerd. Om onze klant van een volledig antwoord te kunnen voorzien, hebben wij uw input nodig. Indien er geen monsters en/of codes in het dossier staan, zijn deze helaas niet (meer) beschikbaar. Omschrijving van ons verzoek: Wij ontvingen een klacht over onderstaande PLUS product dat door u wordt geproduceerd. PLUS Friet met schil Zakje 1000 GR Kort samengevat is de klacht als volgt: Friet met schil bevatte 2 stukken aardappelsmurrie, zie de foto's De volledige artikelgegevens, zoals de EAN-code, productiecode en THT (indien van toepassing) zijn beschikbaar via onderstaande link. Graag vernemen wij de mogelijke oorzaak en de wijze van kwaliteitscontrole van het product. Wij verzoeken u om uw reactie binnen 5 werkdagen door te geven middels de onderstaande link in deze e-mail. Indien er geen monsters en/of codes aanwezig zijn, zijn deze helaas niet (meer) beschikbaar. Mocht u meer tijd nodig hebben, wilt u ons dan zo snel mogelijk informeren? Deze klacht wordt door ons naar de consument afgehandeld en wij verzoeken u dan ook geen rechtstreeks contact met de consument op te nemen, tenzij na overleg met ons. Klik hier voor het dossier en om te reageren.<https://plus-consumentenservice.custhelp.com/cgi-bin/plus_consumentenservice.cfg/php/custom/sme_receipt.php?ref_no=240526-000042&p_acc_id=101769&p_userid=&p_lva=&p_sp=&p_li=&p_c_mail=&p_mail_from=&sec_key=Dhqdvhmoiv4SE5XwDuuo26a1JlJfes0h&> Please click on the following link for further information.<https://plus-consumentenservice.custhelp.com/cgi-bin/plus_consumentenservice.cfg/php/custom/sme_receipt.php?ref_no=240526-000042&p_acc_id=101769&p_userid=&p_lva=&p_sp=&p_li=&p_c_mail=&p_mail_from=&sec_key=Dhqdvhmoiv4SE5XwDuuo26a1JlJfes0h&> Bitte benutzen Sie den folgenden Link.<https://plus-consumentenservice.custhelp.com/cgi-bin/plus_consumentenservice.cfg/php/custom/sme_receipt.php?ref_no=240526-000042&p_acc_id=101769&p_userid=&p_lva=&p_sp=&p_li=&p_c_mail=&p_mail_from=&sec_key=Dhqdvhmoiv4SE5XwDuuo26a1JlJfes0h&> Uw antwoord zal door de PLUS Consumentenservice worden gebruikt om het antwoord richting de klant te formuleren. Subject: SERIOUS 2503002 Tesco FB Complaint - Spicy Potato Wedges 750g 600413
TextBody: Hi Ciara, Our production engineer has come back to me on your below questions. Was the optical sorter functioning correctly during production? The optical sorters (Triplus, Veryx and Pulsar) operated correctly (no failures or other anomalies reported in the production log). Would the residue on the FB prevent the optical sorter from detecting it? Since the material is not recognised, it is in all likelihood from a potato delivery. Such material is normally emitted by the Triplus. We will test this again with the received material. Please find the quality analyses report for the finisched product attached. I have requested the other report to the production responsibles, as soon as I get more information on this, I will send it through.

Subject: CMPL0047441 - Klacht - ART 22160 BONI aardappelkroketten oven 1kg
TextBody: Geachte, Mijn collega meldde dat u geprobeerd heeft om Agristo te contacteren in verband met deze klacht en u doorverwezen werd naar de kwaliteitsdienst van Nazareth. In tussentijd heb ik de kwaliteitsmanager gehoord. Ze heeft de status van haar onderzoek doorgegeven. Zoals gemeld, de kwaliteitsrapporten hebben geen melding gegeven van vreemde blauwe stukjes in het product tijdens deze batch. Tijdens de betreffende productiedag hebben we ook geen incidenten gehad met gebroken transportbanden of andere downtimes en hebben we geen product geblokkeerd omwille van vreemde stukjes. Voorlopig kunnen we de oorsprong van deze stukjes niet achterhalen. Voor verder onderzoek zijn we onze retentiestalen aan het uithalen. Deze zullen we uitvoerig onderzoeken om te bekijken of we hetzelfde beeld zien als jullie klanten. Heeft de klant vermeld of het over harde of zachte stukjes gaat? Zou er mogelijkheid zijn om deze stukjes terug te verkrijgen zodat we deze kunnen analyseren? Van zodra ik de documenten heb van het onderzoek, stuur ik deze door naar u, samen met de foto's van onderzoek van de retentiestalen. Had u graag een call ingepland om deze klacht te bespreken? Ik geef u alvast mijn mobiele telefoonnummer, voor verder contact: +32 498 60 12 06. Ik sta tot uw beschikking voor verder vragen. Met vriendelijke groeten Sandrine Van Bockstael Technical Sales Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 44 --------------- Original Message ---------------

TextBody: Dear Supplier, These are all the customer complaints for your product that we received in store, were logged via our Careline or were allocated to you by our Oscar Trading Team yesterday 30.05.2024. These complaints may be in a status of approved (approved for charging), rejected (rejected from charging) or pending review (awaiting review by the Oscar Trading Team). This report should be used as an ‘early warning’ of any issues relating to your products. This report may not list all the complaints for your products or all those that you will be charged for at the end of the period. This is because cases are still being checked by the system at the time that the report is generated and these cases, once checked and assigned, will report either in the next weekly report, or the period end report. The period end report will be the full and final list of all trading cases generated and allocated to your supplier number for this financial period. ***Please note, upon opening the attachment you may be presented with a popup stating that the file is corrupt or unsafe. Subject: CMPL0047441 - Klacht - ART 22160 BONI aardappelkroketten oven 1kg
TextBody: Beste, Wij hebben de eerste klacht met nummer CMPL0046381 ook ontvangen via het Federaal Voedselagentschap. Op basis van foto's en beschrijving van de 2 klachten die wij ontvangen hebben via de consumenten kunnen wij ervan uitgaan dat deze klachten inderdaad gelinkt zijn aan elkaar. Jullie geven mee dat het vermoedelijk gaat over blauwe plastiek uit jullie productie. Is dit harde of zachte plastiek? Kan het scherpe randjes hebben en dus zou er een gevaar kunnen zijn voor de consument? Volgende lotcodes werden meegegeven in de klachten: "D02240822041" + "D0224082 15:33" Wij vermoeden dat dit lot D0224082 is en het uur van productie betreft, dus 15:33 en 20:41. Klopt dit? Zoja, dan gaat dit niet over een korte tijdspanne maar is het probleem vermoedelijk groter? Op basis van deze info hebben wij de paletten die geleverd werden in onze DC met THT 21-03-2026 geblokkeerd. Deze paletten hebben verschillende leverdata bij ons, nl. 22/05/2024, 27/05/2024 en 30/05/2024. Op welke datum werden de paletten met lot D0224082 geleverd bij ons in DC? Of hebben deze paletten ook allemaal dezelfde lotcode? Actie: op basis van deze klachten zijn wij genoodzaakt om de betrokken THT 21-06-2026 die reeds in ons winkels aanwezig is uit verkoop te nemen. Gelieve ons zo spoedig mogelijk om de hoogte te brengen indien jullie info hebben die het mogelijk maken om de uitverkoopname te beperken. Kunnen jullie ons feedback bezorgen of jullie de paletten die in onze DC geblokkeerd werden retour wensen te nemen? Alvast bedankt voor jullie spoedige reactie. Met vriendelijke groeten - Sincères salutations -

Subject: Country Range Roast Potatoes in Duck Fat
TextBody: Hello Ashleigh Thank you for informing us about the issue reported here below. I have registered internally in our system with reference 28927. Based on the lotcode mentioned on the outer case label I was able to trace back the production date to 14/08/2023. Our packaging process is fully automated and our packaging line operators perform different hourly checks related to the packaging. I refer to an overview of the checks performed during the concerned packaging run. There were no deviations or remarks registered. Plant WorkCenter QualityType Quality Standard Description Quality Specification Value Classification Laatst Ingevuld Laatst Ingevuld Door Material - Key Material Order Agristo nv (Tilburg) AT1 - Line 03 - Case PVA Start operatie 04 Zak: lotcode label (PVA) Zak: lotcode label (PVA) 1 OK 14-08-23 17:32:01 Mohamed Asrihi 312992 BLA HPCD 2,5 1 L90CRA 2117601 Agristo nv (Tilburg) AT1 - Line 03 - Case PVA Start operatie 05 Zak: productie-/THT (PVA) Zak: productie-/THT (PVA) 1 OK 14-08-23 17:32:02 Mohamed Asrihi 312992 BLA HPCD 2,5 1 L90CRA 2117601 Agristo nv (Tilburg) AT1 - Line 03 - Case # Start operatie 06 Zak: controle tekst / layout Zak: controle tekst / layout 1 OK 14-08-23 17:32:04 Mohamed Asrihi 312992 BLA HPCD 2,5 1 L90CRA 2117601 Agristo nv (Tilburg) AT1 - Line 03 - Case # Start operatie 14 Zak: controle EAN-code (scannen of NVT) Zak: controle EAN-code (scannen of NVT) 5023616502053 OK 14-08-23 17:32:58 Mohamed Asrihi 312992 BLA HPCD 2,5 1 L90CRA 2117601 Agristo nv (Tilburg) AT1 - Line 03 - Case PVA Z: Lotcode label (PVA) Zak: lotcode label (PVA) Zak: lotcode label (PVA) 1 OK 14-08-23 18:10:24 AT1 Labo 312992 BLA HPCD 2,5 1 L90CRA 2117601 Agristo nv (Tilburg) AT1 - Line 03 - Case # Z: Controle tekst / layout Zak: controle tekst / layout Zak: controle tekst / layout 1 OK 14-08-23 18:10:26 AT1 Labo 312992 BLA HPCD 2,5 1 L90CRA 2117601 Agristo nv (Tilburg) AT1 - Line 03 - Case # Z: EAN-code controle op juistheid Zak: EAN-code controle op juistheid Zak: EAN-code controle op juistheid 5023616502053 OK 14-08-23 18:10:27 AT1 Labo 312992 BLA HPCD 2,5 1 L90CRA 2117601 I have asked our quality department in Tilburg to perform a further investigation regarding this matter as the bag stamp should indeed be as the one added in attachment. I will get back to you with more information as soon as I receive an update. In the meantime I remain at your disposal in case of questions.

Subject: credit request
TextBody: Good morning Sam, Please find included the mails we have sent to Phil and David regarding this claim. This was a claim that was indeed filed with our insurance company in 2021 but it was declined because the goods were destroyed before our insurance company could check them. Phil asked me in april for a proof of destroying to close the issue. Therefore we weren't expecting a request for a creditnote on this issue anymore. Can you check internally please and confirm that we can close this claim as well? Thanks for your help.

Subject: CMPL0047441 - Klacht - ART 22160 BONI aardappelkroketten oven 1kg
TextBody: Geachte, Deze ochtend hebben we een meeting met onze groep kwaliteitsmanager en de plant kwaliteitsmanager over deze claims. Hierbij zullen we de retracering doen van de paletten. Ik stuur u daarna een excel door met de betrokken paletten en SSCC codes en de daarbij horende order- en leveringsdetails. In tussentijd worden de retentiestalen ontdooid van het betrokken bakorder; zodat we deze volledig kunnen ontleden om te zien of we blauwe deeltjes opmerken. Zoals eerder gemeld, heeft onze kwaliteitsmedewerker tijdens de uurlijkse staalafnames op de desbetreffende productiedag geen problemen opgemerkt, en kunnen we niet afleiden wat de oorzaak is en als het over een wijdverspreid probleem gaat. Voor alsnog kunnen we niet bepalen indien het over hard of zacht plastiek gaat. Hiervoor hadden we graag verder onderzoek gedaan. Daarom hadden we graag bekeken of Colruyt of de eindconsument of FAVV deze stukjes in het bezit heeft en indien we deze met een dringende koerier kunnen ophalen. Zou u dit kunnen navragen aub? Bel mij gerust op bij verder vragen op het nummer 0498 60 12 06. Met vriendelijke groeten Sandrine Van Bockstael Technical Sales Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 44 --------------- Original Message ---------------

Subject: Complaint, battered spicy jacket potato 750 g
TextBody: Good morning, We received a complaint from market about the product Crispy seasoned wedges 750 g, in which the consumer states that he found a foreign body in the product (photos attached). Through inspection of the traceability, it was established that the product of the complianed lot was delivered to Frikom in deliveries that were made on March 4th 2024/March 8th 2024/March 22nd 2024/March 25th 2024., supplier Agristo, best before 02.2026. lot number L G 31 24 035. Please give us an explanation about this compliant and information about the corrective measures they will take. Thank you in advance. Srdačan pozdrav

Subject: CMPL0047441 - Klacht - ART 22160 BONI aardappelkroketten oven 1kg
TextBody: Geachte, Deze ochtend hebben we een meeting met onze groep kwaliteitsmanager en de plant kwaliteitsmanager over deze claims. Hierbij zullen we de retracering doen van de paletten. Ik stuur u daarna een excel door met de betrokken paletten en SSCC codes en de daarbij horende order- en leveringsdetails. In tussentijd worden de retentiestalen ontdooid van het betrokken bakorder; zodat we deze volledig kunnen ontleden om te zien of we blauwe deeltjes opmerken. Zoals eerder gemeld, heeft onze kwaliteitsmedewerker tijdens de uurlijkse staalafnames op de desbetreffende productiedag geen problemen opgemerkt, en kunnen we niet afleiden wat de oorzaak is en als het over een wijdverspreid probleem gaat. Voor alsnog kunnen we niet bepalen indien het over hard of zacht plastiek gaat. Hiervoor hadden we graag verder onderzoek gedaan. Daarom hadden we graag bekeken of Colruyt of de eindconsument of FAVV deze stukjes in het bezit heeft en indien we deze met een dringende koerier kunnen ophalen. Zou u dit kunnen navragen aub? Bel mij gerust op bij verder vragen op het nummer 0498 60 12 06. Met vriendelijke groeten [image] Sandrine Van Bockstael Technical Sales Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 44 --------------- Original Message ---------------

Subject: Indemnités logistiques ITM - avril 2024 - 82006 - AGRISTO N-V - 76
TextBody: Madame, Monsieur, Nous avons trouvé un accord définissant les principes et les conditions logistiques et techniques qui s’appliquent entre nos deux sociétés. La loi n° 2023-221 du 30 mars 2023 poursuit les objectifs déjà présents dans la loi EGALIM 1 et 2. Cette loi, souvent désignée EGALIM 3, a été publiée au Journal officiel du 31 mars 2023. A ce titre, nous vous prions de trouver les datas indemnités logistiques retard et qualité de avril 2024, joints au présent courrier, lequel fait suite à nos différents échanges. Ce qui a pour objet de lancer la période d’échanges contradictoires en perspectives de trouver un accord sur le montant de réparation du préjudice. Nous vous rappelons que vous disposez d'un délai de 30 jours à compter de la réception de cet avis de pénalités pour en contrôler le bien-fondé et nous transmettre vos remarques. Merci de nous retourner vos analyses contradictoires associées à cette extraction. Au retour de vos remarques, lors d’échanges contradictoires, nous prendrons en compte les éléments justifiés et documentés que vous mentionneriez afin d’obtenir un accord avant établissement d’une facturation. Nous restons à votre disposition pour toute question et pour étudier avec vous des moyens spécifiques afin d'améliorer votre performance logistique pour nos prochaines commandes. Nous vous remercions de bien vouloir adresser vos retours à l'adresse mail : itmlai_negociations_logistiques@mousquetaires.com et à votre négociateur de dossier : - Fatyne BOUFOUS - fatyne.boufous@mousquetaires.com : Frais non laitier (volailles, œuf, traiteur, charcuterie, traiteur de la mer, viandes) - Priscillia LUZOLO - priscillia.luzolo@mousquetaires.com : DPH (Parfumerie, entretien et Hygiène) & Epicerie Salée - Marylise GOBIN - marylise.gobin@mousquetaires.com : Epicerie Sucrée / PPI & Animaux - Chloé MAYALA - chloe.mayala@mousquetaires.com : Vins & Champagnes, BNA, Bière, Alcools & Gel - Faustine BOSIO - faustine.bosio@mousquetaires.com : Frais Laitier - Carine GALLETTE - carine.gallette@mousquetaires.com : Maison/Textile Nous vous prions de croire, Madame, Monsieur, à l’expression de notre considération distinguée. Cordialement, Equipe Négociation / Logistique ITM LAI ----------------------------- Disclaimer ------------------------------ --- Ce message ainsi que les éventuelles pièces jointes constituent une correspondance privée et confidentielle à l'attention exclusive du destinataire désigné ci-dessus. Subject: RE: [Ticket: 124753] Claim:503
TextBody: Dear Mya san, Following our telephone conversation, I have talked to one of our process engineers. Please note that for foreign bodies and product clumps, we do not adjust the settings of the optical sorter. These settings have been determined in close collaboration with the company that installs the optical sorters and has extensive knowledge about the machine, and are not changed. In most of the cases, these settings are working fine and will reject the product clumps. As also mentioned over the phone, however, it is always possible that one of these product clumps is not rejected. There can be several reasons for this: The product clump is under a "pile" of fries and is not detected. The product clump is detected, but is not properly rejected and is "shot" back in the "good" product flow, instead of being rejected to the "bad" product flow. That being said, for defects (black, brown, green or blue spots on the product), we can and do adjust the settings of the optical sorter in between runs (depending of the recipe we are producing) and during the run if this is deemed necessary (for example when our Quality Control staff notices that we are high in defects, we can adjust the settings of the optical sorter and make it "stricter"). Our production team knows the standard, minimum and maximum values they can set. I hope to have informed you sufficiently, and remain at your disposal for any further information.

Subject: CMPL0047441 - Klacht - ART 22160 BONI aardappelkroketten oven 1kg
TextBody: Allen, Hierbij het voorlopig verslag met de bevindingen tot nu, zoals daarnet besproken. Ik kreeg ondertussen nog bevestiging dat de controle van de retentiestalen afgelopen is en er geen blauw plastic werd gevonden. Ik vulde nog de uitgeleverde hoeveelheden per inpakorder aan in het verslag alsook hoeveel er van elke run nog op stock staat (en dus intern werd geblokkeerd): tabel laatste pag. Inpakorder 1302135523 (waarvan er nog een kleine hoeveelheid op stock staat) werd geproduceerd op 28/05 en 29/05 (productieorder 1301038823) en is dus NIET betrokken. Als bijlage ook het overzicht van de betrokken geproduceerde paletten. De aanduiding met X betekent dat ze nog op stock staan. De ship to en sold to staat tevens vermeld in de excel. De lotcodes in de excel verwijzen naar de lotcodes van de pallet. Alle tussenliggende uurcodes zijn dus ook betrokken. Subject: Supplier Non Conformance CMS 235451.xlsx Farm Frites
TextBody: Goede middag, Het gaat niet echt om blokkeren van het product, er wordt slechts effectief geblokkeerd wanneer meer dan 10% daadwerkelijk defects heeft/niet conform is. Op het moment van opstart wordt de machine - indien nodig bijgestuurd - en is er dus steeds een visuele controle. Bij opstart kan men er dan ook voor kiezen om een gedeelte rechtstreeks naar de afvalbak te sturen. Daarna baseren we ons verder op de controles die we elk uur uitvoeren, waarbij alle parameters van het product volgens vooropgestelde specificatie worden gecontroleerd. Helaas is het hierbij dus mogelijk dat enkele misvormde kroketten aan ons monitoringssysteem ontsnappen. Met vriendelijke groeten, Michèle Vandenbroucke Technical Sales Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 44 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: CustomerCare [customercare@farmfrites.com] Sent: 30/05/2024 15:18 To: claims@agristo.com Cc: customercare@farmfrites.com Subject: RE: Supplier Non Conformance CMS 235451.xlsx Farm Frites Hoi Michelle, Bedankt voor je terug koppeling. Wij hebben alleen nog de volgende vraag: Wat is de correctieve actie om te voorkomen dat de nog niet goede krokketen niet in de verpakking terecht komen nadat de stand van de parameters juist is bevonden? Hoor graag alvast bedankt! With

Subject: Ref: 324042TH Customer Enquiry
TextBody: Dear Terek Hazell , Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. We have promptly registered it in our system under ticket number 00028362. We are sorry to hear that your customer was not satisfied with the quality of this batch. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. Bath information: Production day : After reviewing the picture and description, it appears that the foreign body in question is a clump of fat from the oven. We want to assure you that we have a regular visual inspection of the oven every hour. If excessive accumulation is observed, our team takes immediate action to clean the oven. Based on the lotcode, we have conducted an investigation into our production records and quality documents for this specific batch. There were no remarks registered in the quality control sheets. We are confident that this complaint is an isolated incident and not widespread. To prevent such occurrences, we will hold discussions with our production team to enhance their focus on the visual inspection of the oven. We apologize for any inconvenience that you may have suffered. If you have any further concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us again.
