Subject: Réclamations soudures sachets rosty 600g Pom'Lisse
TextBody: Bonjour Alexis, Merci de votre email. Je suis désolée que vous ayez reçu des plaintes récurrentes. J'ai demandé à notre service de packaging de revenir vers moi aussi vite que possible avec une analyse approfondie et actions correctives - comme énumérées dans votre email ci-dessous. Je vous tiens au courant demain. Cdt, Sarah Sarah Detailleur Customer Experience Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 65 M + 0498 74 13 14 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Alexis CAJDLER [alexis.cajdler@scamark.leclerc] Sent: 10/06/2024 10:06 To: service@agristo.com Cc: ludovic.noel@scamark.fr; sarapic.eang@scamark.leclerc; marlies.deketele@agristo.com Subject: Fwd: Réclamations soudures sachets rosty 600g Pom'Lisse Bonjour, Je me permets de vous relancer à ce sujet concernant mon mail de la semaine dernière, nous avons reçu 3 nouvelles réclamations (voir PJ) Merci de revenir très rapidement vers moi avec les éléments demandés. Cela pourrait découler d'une demande de retrait de notre part si la situation perdure. En attente de votre retour. Cordialement, Alexis CAJDLER Chef de projets Emballages Frais et Surgelés Tel : 01 49 87 59 56 ---------- Forwarded message --------- De : Alexis CAJDLER <alexis.cajdler@scamark.leclerc> Date: lun. 3 juin 2024 à 18:06 Subject: Réclamations soudures sachets rosty 600g Pom'Lisse To: <service@agristo.com> Cc: Marlies De Ketele <Marlies.DeKetele@agristo.com> Bonjour, Je vous contacte suite à la réception d'une réclamation emballage concernant la référence de Rosty 600g Pom'Lisse pour un problème de mauvaise soudure du sachet. Ci joint dans l'excel le détail des réclamations. Dans ce contexte, pourriez-vous me communiquer les éléments suivants : 1°/ TRAÇABILITE - La traçabilité à envoyer sous format Excel : les centrales livrées (dont les plates-formes étrangères), les quantités livrées par centrale de destination avec les dates de livraison, n°SSCC palettes, numéro de commande client, numéro de lot et DLC/DLUO correspondantes. 2°/ ANALYSE DES CAUSES - La copie des contrôles réalisés en cours de conditionnement pour les lots en question. Est-ce que l’ensemble des lots est concerné par ce problème? - Vos analyses sur le produit fini concerné. Est-ce que votre échantillothèque présente ce défaut? Si oui, pourriez-vous nous envoyer des photos? - Votre interprétation quant à cette non-conformité et le risque résiduel que d’autres numéros de lots présentent cette problématique. 3°/ ACTION CORRECTIVE Suite à cette non-conformité, merci de nous indiquer les actions correctives mises en place pour éviter que ce type de non-conformité ne se renouvelle. Merci par avance pour votre retour avant le 10/06. Belle journée à vous, Alexis CAJDLER Chef de projets Emballages Frais et Surgelés Tel : 01 49 87 59 56

Subject: Agristo / Cial / Technical claim: bags without inkjet
TextBody: Dear Hanne, Thank you very much for all the information. I told them that the people in the line will be more alert to the "tails"/end of the run as well... I hope it's OK. It's true that the hourly check can cover all that's produced in between the start and the last check, but this leaves room for loose ends at the last part of the run if unchecked. Customers don't like to know we have loose ends ;) Thanks again and also thank you so much for helping us with the CN!

Subject: FW: RES: Copacol / 00416/24 00201/24 / Docuemnts
TextBody: Hello Elynn, Unfortunately, we can not propose this to the customer, this is not the correct way to deal with it. All taxes are calculated with the Invoice amount basis. So they would pay more taxes than they should pay. To solve this we have 2 options, amend the Invoice to the correct amount, or to give a dredit note with the price difference + the taxes difference, so this would not affect the final cost of the product. The most pratical and easy fro everybody would be to amend the Invoice to the correct price. Thank you, [cid:image003.jpg@01DABBED.E3244820] De: DELTA <delta@jaoliveira.com.br> Enviada em: terça-feira, 11 de junho de 2024 09:54 Para: 'Agristo Claims' <claims@agristo.com>; flv@jaoliveira.com.br; cacilda.jaoliveira@gmail.com Cc: bram.tuytens@agristo.com Assunto: RES: RES: FW: RES: Copacol / 00416/24 00201/24 / Docuemnts Hi Elynn, Thank you! @flv@jaoliveira.com.br<mailto:flv@jaoliveira.com.br> @cacilda.jaoliveira@gmail.com<mailto:cacilda.jaoliveira@gmail.com> Can you please check?

Subject: TOYOTA COMPLAINT FOR FRY WITH SUBSTANCES LOOKS MOLD
TextBody: Dear Marlies , Thank you for the report. Toyota did analysis to specify the black substance. The result of black substance was that a mixture of iron-based metal powders and animal fats and oils I attached analysis and translation. First , can you please investigate IF there is any similar iron powder generating areas in the factory OR any similar substances to the black spot analysis results in the inspection results in the machinery and equipment in the factory? Toyota is asking us to do the investigation and answer them asap. Can you please do investigation and answer me please ? Thank you very much in advance. Hagino

Subject: Your Sainsbury's Product Related Customer Complaints - Daily Email 11.06.2024
TextBody: Dear Supplier, These are all the customer complaints for your product that we received in store, were logged via our Careline or were allocated to you by our Oscar Trading Team yesterday 11.06.2024. These complaints may be in a status of approved (approved for charging), rejected (rejected from charging) or pending review (awaiting review by the Oscar Trading Team). This report should be used as an ‘early warning’ of any issues relating to your products. This report may not list all the complaints for your products or all those that you will be charged for at the end of the period. This is because cases are still being checked by the system at the time that the report is generated and these cases, once checked and assigned, will report either in the next weekly report, or the period end report. The period end report will be the full and final list of all trading cases generated and allocated to your supplier number for this financial period. ***Please note, upon opening the attachment you may be presented with a popup stating that the file is corrupt or unsafe. This popup appears as a precaution because this email is generated automatically, however you can trust that the attachment is neither corrupt nor unsafe. To dismiss the popup and open the file, click ‘Yes’ on the popup.*** Please note that this mailbox (Trading.service) is not manned; please do not respond to it. If you have any queries, please contact Oscar.Trading@sainsburys.co.uk, quoting the Trading Case Number as soon as possible after receipt of this email.

Subject: Réclamations soudures sachets rosty 600g Pom'Lisse
TextBody: Beste, Hoe ik ook zoek op salesforce, slaag ik er niet in om foto’s van de betreffende zakken te vinden. Deze zijn noodzakelijk om ook maar iets zinnig te kunnen vertellen. In verband met lijn 3 kan ik nu wel aan meegeven dat sinds 14 maart een nieuw type vulpijp in gebruik is op lijn 3 waarbij het gemakkelijker moet zijn om voldoende overlap te maken om langsnaad vlot te kunnen vormen. MAAR indien de overlap op de verkeerde plaats gevormd wordt en men wil lassen op de bedrukte zone van de folie, dan zal de langsnaad mogelijk zeer zwak zijn. Hiervoor zijn voorbeelden nodig van de slechte zakken. Verklaring voor de klachten van lijn 5 zijn in principe niet te linken met de nieuwe vulpijp. Subject: Referenz #GeVo2003604126: Issue: 2003596106, [ Beschwerde ] EDEKA, EDEKA Dicke Fritte 750g, Agristo NV27.4.26, G24 24120 05:42
TextBody: EDEKA Kunden- und Ernährungsservice 2003604126 Dear madam or sir, we have received a customer’s enquiry regarding the following issue: Reason for enquiry: Beschwerde Product: GTIN: 4311501057476 Article: EDEKA Dicke Fritte 750g Brand: EDEKA Supplier: Agristo NV Supplier code: 0005181091 BBD: 27.4.26 Lot: G24 24120 05:42 Issue: Dear Sir or Madam, I have been eating your pommes for 2 years and prepare them in a hot air fryer, so far always without any problems. On Saturday, however, this happened as shown in the photos. I have not weighed the waste, but it is not in proportion and I think that too much coating was used and potatoes were saved. This is all the more annoying as your product is one of the higher priced products. Please let me know whether you have changed anything here and whether this is the normal situation. ________________________________ We kindly await your feedback within two days after receiving this mail. Please send your feedback solely by email, maintaining the original subject to reklamation@edeka.de<mailto:reklamation@edeka.de> and the whole mailing list of this email. Should you not be able to revert within the given timeframe, please inform us accordingly. Should you require any further information, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Subject: Melding PLUS Consumentenservice - 240531-000388 - Aardappelpartjes Zakje PLUS bevatte een steen, lijkt op lavasteen
TextBody: Let op!: U kunt niet middels reply (Re) op deze e-mail reageren. Klik op de onderstaande link om te reageren. Beste leverancier, Wij ontvingen een melding over een PLUS product dat door u wordt geproduceerd. Om onze klant van een volledig antwoord te kunnen voorzien, hebben wij uw input nodig. Indien er geen monsters en/of codes in het dossier staan, zijn deze helaas niet (meer) beschikbaar. Omschrijving van ons verzoek: Beste, Wij ontvingen een klacht over onderstaande PLUS product dat door u wordt geproduceerd. PLUS Aardappelpartjes Zakje 750 GR Kort samengevat is de klacht als volgt: De aardappelpartjes bevatte een steen, lijkt op een lavasteen De volledige artikelgegevens, zoals de EAN-code, productiecode en THT (indien van toepassing) zijn beschikbaar via onderstaande link. Graag vernemen wij de mogelijke oorzaak en de wijze van kwaliteitscontrole van het product. Wij verzoeken u om uw reactie zo snel mogelijk doch, uiterlijk binnen 3 werkdagen door te geven middels de onderstaande link in deze e-mail. Indien langer onderzoek noodzakelijk is, ontvangen we graag de inmiddels genomen acties en controles binnen uw bedrijf. Indien er geen monsters en/of codes aanwezig zijn, zijn deze helaas niet (meer) beschikbaar. Mocht u meer tijd nodig hebben, wilt u ons dan zo snel mogelijk informeren? Deze klacht wordt door ons naar de consument afgehandeld en wij verzoeken u dan ook geen rechtstreeks contact met de consument op te nemen, tenzij na overleg met ons. Klik hier voor het dossier en om te reageren.<https://plus-consumentenservice.custhelp.com/cgi-bin/plus_consumentenservice.cfg/php/custom/sme_receipt.php?ref_no=240531-000388&p_acc_id=138159&p_userid=&p_lva=&p_sp=&p_li=&p_c_mail=&p_mail_from=&sec_key=UCRq5D6f6RI01Uyu5IaSXywGCXGSsd3Y&> Please click on the following link for further information.<https://plus-consumentenservice.custhelp.com/cgi-bin/plus_consumentenservice.cfg/php/custom/sme_receipt.php?ref_no=240531-000388&p_acc_id=138159&p_userid=&p_lva=&p_sp=&p_li=&p_c_mail=&p_mail_from=&sec_key=UCRq5D6f6RI01Uyu5IaSXywGCXGSsd3Y&> Bitte benutzen Sie den folgenden Link.<https://plus-consumentenservice.custhelp.com/cgi-bin/plus_consumentenservice.cfg/php/custom/sme_receipt.php?ref_no=240531-000388&p_acc_id=138159&p_userid=&p_lva=&p_sp=&p_li=&p_c_mail=&p_mail_from=&sec_key=UCRq5D6f6RI01Uyu5IaSXywGCXGSsd3Y&> Uw antwoord zal door de PLUS Consumentenservice worden gebruikt om het antwoord richting de klant te formuleren. Daarom is het van belang een compleet en volledig antwoord te geven. Mocht u vragen of opmerkingen hebben betreffende de melding, neem dan gerust contact met ons op via telefoonnummer 0800-222 44 43. Met vriendelijke groet, Edwin Lennaerts PLUS Consumentenservice

Subject: Ref: 324651JC Customer Enquiry
TextBody: Dear James Curran , Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. We have promptly registered it in our system under ticket number 00030384. We are sorry to hear that your customer was not satisfied with the quality of this batch. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. Bath information: Lotcode : G22240601650 Production day : 29/02/2024 In all our production plants we have very stringent hygiene rules and measurements. All visitors, operators or working personnel have to wear hair nets and protective clothing. Also men with beards have to wear a beard net. We also have a procedure for how we have to put these on: first the hair and beard net have to be put on, afterwards the protective clothing, this is to avoid having hair on the protective clothing We apologize for any inconvenience that you may have suffered. If you have any further concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us again.

Subject: Melding PLUS Consumentenservice - 240531-000388 - Aardappelpartjes Zakje PLUS bevatte een steen, lijkt op lavasteen
TextBody: Beste lezer, Op het verzoek van PLUS Consumentenservice met referentienummer 240531-000388 heeft u zojuist de volgende reactie verstuurd: 12/6/2024 11:00 - Evelien Cremers Beste, Wij mochten onderstaande consumentenklacht met betrekking het vinden van een vreemd voorwerp in de PLUS Aardappelpartjes in goede orde ontvangen. Het spijt ons te vernemen dat uw consument een negatieve ervaring had met een door Agristo geproduceerd artikel. Wij hechten immers het grootste belang aan de kwaliteit van onze producten en verpakkingen. Wij hebben deze melding in ons systeem geregistreerd onder ticket 31018. Aan de hand van de lotcode ( G0924127 17:45) en de vervaldatum (05/05/2026) hebben wij kunnen achterhalen dat dit een productie betreft van 06/05/2024. We hebben de productiebladen en de kwaliteitscontroles van deze batch gecontroleerd – er werden geen anomalieën genoteerd. De volledige productie was conform. Het productieproces bevat veel fysieke en optische eliminatiestappen voor vreemde voorwerpen. Agristo probeert ook te investeren in alle nieuwe best practice technische oplossingen om vreemde voorwerpen te vermijden. Bij het binnenkomen van de aardappelen in ons bedrijf, wordt eerst het metaal verwijderd door middel van een magneet. Daarna gaan de aardappelen door een steensteenverwijderaar. De steenverwijderaar werkt op middelpuntvliedende krachten en verwijdert alle voorwerpen die zwaarder zijn dan aardappelen. Na de steenverwijderaar gaan ze door een waterbad om alle drijvende delen te verwijderen en door een egelband om het loof te verwijderen. Het loof plakt aan de pinnen die uit de band komen en wordt op die manier verwijderd. Nadat de aardappelen zijn geschild en gewassen, gaan ze door een optische sorteerder om vreemde voorwerpen te verwijderen. Door middel van een kleurencamera worden vreemde voorwerpen, groene aardappelen en aardappelen met zware gebreken en ziekten door een mechanisch systeem afgestoten. Daarna worden de aardappelen naar de productielijn gepompt waar ze worden versneden en door een tweede optische sorteerder worden gecontroleerd op zwarte delen - de defecten worden met perslucht verwijderd. Ook kleine donkergekleurde vreemde lichamen worden gedetecteerd en afgewezen. Daar u spreekt van een soort lava steen zou ik vermoeden dat het gaat om een vetklomp die is losgekomen uit de bakoven. Mocht u ons kunnen voorzien van een foto of het vreemde voorwerp kunnen opsturen kunnen wij dit beter onderzoeken wat de mogelijke oorzaak zou kunnen zijn. Alvast onze oprechte excuses voor dit voorval. Met vriendelijke groet, Evelien Cremers Uw antwoord zal, indien van toepassing, door PLUS Consumentenservice worden gebruikt om een antwoord richting de klant te formuleren. Mocht u nog vragen of opmerkingen hebben, neem dan gerust contact op met ons via 0800-222 44 43. Met vriendelijke groet, PLUS Consumentenservice

Si vostè no és el destinatari previst, no pot usar, divulgar, distribuir, copiar o imprimir aquest e-mail Aquest missatge electrònic està dirigit únicament a la(es) direcció(ns) indicades anteriorment; el caracter confidencial, personal i intransferible del mateix està protegit legalment. Qualsevol revelació, ús o reenviament no autoritzat, complet o en part, està prohibit. Si ha rebut aquest missatge per equivocació, notifiqui-ho immediatament a la persona que ho ha enviat i esborri el missatge original juntament amb els seus fitxers annexos sense llegir-lo ni gravar-lo, total o parcialment. Gràcies. "Este e-mail contiene información privada y el contenido del mismo puede estar legalmente protegido. Si usted no es el destinatario previsto, no puede usar, divulgar, distribuir, copiar o imprimir este e-mail. Este mensaje electrónico está dirigido únicamente a la(s) dirección(es) indicadas anteriormente; el carácter confidencial, personal e intransferible del mismo está protegido legalmente. Cualquier revelación, uso o reenvío no autorizado, completo o parcial, está prohibido. Gracias." Subject: Iceland Customer Product Complaint 03369820

Subject: Iceland Customer Product Complaint 03369820
TextBody: Dear Supplier, Please see details below of a customer complaint received by Iceland. A SAE has been sent to customer to return the Foreign Body and Packaging. The Foreign Body will be sent to you when Iceland receives it. Please start an initial investigation in the interim and send all reports and documents to sgsashby.icelandcomms@sgs.com <mailto:sgsashby.icelandcomms@sgs.com> The customer has provided photographs of the material which are attached. Please provide ALL the below – 1. Full investigation report, detailing how your full investigation was carried out and your findings with supporting documents, as attachment 2. In addition - Please answer the key points below in the table – The below should NOT be used as your full investigation report, it is a key points table in addition of you investigation report IMPORTANT: Iceland requires ALL Glass complaints to have external analysis carried out Product Name: CREAMY CHEESE & POTATO GRATIN Product Codes: PLU 58316 Best Before or Use By date: 12/02/2026 Batch Code/Lot code: D13 24 045 07:39 A Summary of complaint: Piece of hard white plastic wound inside the gratin Key points– if included in full investigation report; add comment ‘included in report’ Supplier Comments How many packs were produced? Line number Date of production Were any issues or non-conformances recorded for this production; including foreign body controls and monitoring equipment? Please outline the controls in place to prevent foreign material entering products Have you reviewed retained samples / taste panel records - any deviation to specification? Are complaints recorded and monitored for Trending purposes? How are complaints communicated to Staff / Senior Team? Could the root cause be identified? Outline Corrective Actions Provide copies as attachment to support investigation of any relevant records (as below- not limited too) * Glass & Plastic Checks * Production Records * Foreign body detection checks (Metal detector, X-Ray, Filters, optical sorts) * QC Checks * Taste Panel /Retained Samples * External Independent Laboratory Analysis Report – Iceland requirement for ALL glass complaints Please note that any documents that are not in English – Key Points will be required to be translated (this can be handwritten onto the document for ease). Please confirm receipt of the complaint and provide a response within 48 hours. If you have any issues or queries, please do not hesitate to contact me. Please ensure you complete all sections of the blue table that are blank, attach all relevant documents together with a final report, otherwise it will be rejected back to you for completion.

Subject: EMART TR - customer complaint about foreign material from Hashbrown
TextBody: Hi Olive, We've received a mail from Fedex with the below information. "Your package has been sent and is on its way to you. However, our Clearance team needs some more information from you before your goods can clear Customs and be delivered. The information on the commercial invoice is not sufficient for clearance by the authorities. Please provide a full goods description, to include what it is, what it is made from, what it will be used for and any tariff code to be used. Please reply today with the information requested by responding directly to this email, or by calling us on 0032 27527575 . When you contact us, please ensure you quote your Air Way Bill number (in the subject of this email)." Can you have a closer look to this please.

Subject: Your Sainsbury's Product Related Customer Complaints - Daily Email 12.06.2024
TextBody: Dear Supplier, These are all the customer complaints for your product that we received in store, were logged via our Careline or were allocated to you by our Oscar Trading Team yesterday 12.06.2024. These complaints may be in a status of approved (approved for charging), rejected (rejected from charging) or pending review (awaiting review by the Oscar Trading Team). This report should be used as an ‘early warning’ of any issues relating to your products. This report may not list all the complaints for your products or all those that you will be charged for at the end of the period. This is because cases are still being checked by the system at the time that the report is generated and these cases, once checked and assigned, will report either in the next weekly report, or the period end report. The period end report will be the full and final list of all trading cases generated and allocated to your supplier number for this financial period. ***Please note, upon opening the attachment you may be presented with a popup stating that the file is corrupt or unsafe. This popup appears as a precaution because this email is generated automatically, however you can trust that the attachment is neither corrupt nor unsafe. To dismiss the popup and open the file, click ‘Yes’ on the popup.*** Please note that this mailbox (Trading.service) is not manned; please do not respond to it. If you have any queries, please contact Oscar.Trading@sainsburys.co.uk, quoting the Trading Case Number as soon as possible after receipt of this email.

Subject: dark color, broken - item 308955 (P 12/02/2024)
TextBody: Dear Jack Lo, We are very sorry to hear you have reason to complaint. Based on the given lot code D05 24 043 1643, I could trace back production date and I could check our quality and production records. According to our QC log files and production files, there were no issues reported. The colour was within spec and we did not struggle with broken product. We check the product after it has been packed in bags. If a lot of waffles would get broken during packaging, we definitely would have noticed. As our QC results are within spec, we believe that this will be related to some individual waffes (we assume that one or some indiviudal waffle was/were blocked in the oven, with a darker colour as result and some individual may have broken during packaging (but will not be widespread) or during transport. How many dark waffles has your customer found till now and how many broken waffles has your customer found till now? And shortage in cartons: do you mean bags were missing in cartons? Please inform me how many bags were missing and how many cartons. We have a carton weight checker and if bags are missing, the boxes must be rejected. My what's App number is 0032 473 5572 29

Subject: FW: ATTENTION REQUIRED: Unknown Item Found Inside Maestro Hashbrown
TextBody: Hello Daniel Li, We have received your complaint and logged it in our system. I want to inform you that I have forwarded this complaint to our quality manager for further investigation. Although the customer describes it as hair, it am not 100% sure this is a human hair. I am waiting for the opinion of our quality department. But in case it would be human hair I can inform you that in all our production plants we have very stringent hygiene rules and measurements. All visitors, operators or working personnel have to wear hair nets and protective clothing. Also men with beards have to wear a beard net. We also have a procedure for how we have to put these on: first the hair and beard net have to be put on, afterwards the protective clothing, this is to avoid having hair on the protective clothing. Despite our best efforts, this can still occur exceptionally. I checked our quality records, but there were no issues reported that can explain this. We haven’t received other similar complaints on this batch. I will keep you informed as soon as I have heard more from our quality department.

Subject: 13573045 The Co-operative Quality Complaint - Hot Counter Hash Browns 600579
TextBody: Dear Ciara, Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. We have promptly registered it in our system under ticket number 00030679. We are sorry to hear that your customer was not satisfied with the quality of this batch. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. There is a complete Quality Assurance system in place and the principles of HACCP are applied. This includes a full monitoring system on the production line. The finished products themselves are sampled every 60 minutes and examined for quality, including odeur and taste. Full records of these and all the other checks are maintained. Unfortunately we don't have a lotcode, so we cannot conduct a thorough investigation. We apologize for any inconvenience that you may have suffered. If you have any further concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us again.

Subject: FW: KM3 SH24/95_Incoming issue_RM24/271_Dehydrated potato flake 3mm (008) _Agristo (Belgium)_High black spot count in 100g sample
TextBody: Dag Françoise Daarmee dat we Mamee hebben stopgezet vanuit Europa, gezien we hun target van 15 defects/100gr niet kunnen behalen. Ik heb nu wel geen zin om 12 pallets te laten vernietigen in Maleisië en hiervoor de kosten te dragen. Schrijf nu in eerste instantie dat we dat niet zien in onze retentie stalen, dat deze voldoen aan de 15 defects/100gr. We zien dan wel hoe sterk ze gaan terug pushen. Mvg

Subject: P O NO 621
TextBody: Dear partners Yesterday, Wednesday, 6/12/2024, order No. 621 was received in Aqaba, which consists of 4 containers of Euro Gold S C 10*10 and two containers of Crinkle 12*12. When the containers were inspected by Jordanian customs employees in Aqaba, they found that the two containers sent from the Netherlands (the 12*12 crinkle) did not contain any evidence that they were made by the Netherlands in any way, unlike the goods sent from Belgium, which were marked on the Euro Gold potato 9*9. You can check the attached files to confirm. We tried to contact Mr. Martin and sent pictures to him via WhatsApp, but until now no one from you has contacted us to find out what is happening with us. Accordingly, customs in Aqaba decided to reserve the entire statement and required us to write a pledge not to sell until a report from the General Food and Drug Administration arrives to express its opinion on the matter. We ask you to follow up on the matter seriously and inform us of any information indicating that The crinkle 12*12 has any marking indicating that it was manufactured in the Netherlands. We will provide you with all the measures that will be taken by the Food and Drug Administration. B R SALIM AL WAHSH

Subject: Wedge claim in 60's chicken // FW: 유로골드 클레임 내용 공유 件
TextBody: Hello Hyunjin Based on the lotcode we were able to trace back the production date to 06/10/2023. Since we have the full lotcode available we could look to the exact time this product was packed : 21h43. This time is indeed not indicated in the results here below, but we can look at the hourly quality control checks which are performed most close to this time (21h03 and 22h05) There we see that the Agtron values are lower than average and therefore the wedges tend to be more dark. Hope to have informed you sufficiently.

Subject: P O NO 621
TextBody: Dear, Thank you for informing us about this case. Not all generic SKU's of Agristo have the origin on the bag/carton. I have looked into the history and I've seen that we have shipped this product already from 2022 without remarks. (the labels haven't changed) Any idea why the FDA are now looking into this? Can you please help me with the law instructions of Jordanië, so we can make sure we comply for the future shipments? In the meanwhile can we help with a statement for these containers, with declaration of origin and the explination that it concerns a human error? Our apologies if this has caused some inconvenience. Please help us understand what is required on the labels for Aqaba, so we can ship conform product.

Subject: FW: ATTENTION REQUIRED: Unknown Item Found Inside Maestro Hashbrown
TextBody: Hello Daniel Li, I have received some more feedback from our quality department. Based on the photo, it is difficult to say if this is human hair, or a synthetic fiber (coming from textile for instance). But, they do not recognize it as something coming from our process/installation (like a cutting blade). Like explained below we have several measures in place to avoid human hair. Everyone in production has to wear special working clothes which are cleaned daily and quality of the clothes is inspected. Despite our best efforts, it is not possible to prevent this with 100% certainty. Of course our sincere apologies.

Subject: 600538 - Eden Farms Complaint on Farmer Jacks Crinkle Cut Chips 750g
TextBody: Hello Melissa, So sorry for the delay in answering your claim. We have well received your complaint and have registered it in our system as REF 00028877. We are very sorry to learn that you had a complaint about open sealing. Based on your lotcode, we have traced back the packaging day to 08/11/2023. Every hour the seals of the bags are tested. We checked the packaging and quality records of that day and no remarks were made. Both our quality and packaging personnel have not registered an anomaly. I also cannot relate the complaint to a reel change or any break downs. We suppose this is an isolated case. We hope that this letter has reassured you as to the precautions that we take with our products and to the good general quality of our products. We thank you for bringing this to our attention so that we may redouble our efforts. Please do not hesitate to contact me in case of further questions.

Subject: Quality claim 301143-MAO BNA
TextBody: Hi David, Thank you for below e-mail. We are sorry to hear that the customer was not completely satisfied with the product. This complaint has been registered as case n° 00031488. I have inspected the quality records for the overall production, and then more specifically for these hours of production. We admit that this production did not get one of the best quality scores. Part of this production has been blocked, as too many critical defects were present, at this point, the veryx machines (optical sorters) were finetuned and set with narrower margins. This improved the number of defects and the product was again within the limits of the specifications. The batches received by this customer are from these approved batches. Do note that we work with a natural product, and variations in quality, especially towards the end of the season, are normal. We do set our machines as good as we can to catch these variations.

Subject: Réclamations soudures sachets rosty 600g Pom'Lisse
TextBody: Bonjour Alexis, Je vous tiens informé que le service de qualité et de packaging est en train de faire une investigation profonde et les plaintes sont escalées dans l'organisation. Ils vont examiner les échantillons de rétention et revenir vers moi dans les plus brefs délais. Merci de votre patience. Cdt, Sarah Sarah Detailleur Customer Experience Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 65 M + 0498 74 13 14 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Agristo Claims [claims@agristo.com] Sent: 11/06/2024 17:04 To: alexis.cajdler@scamark.leclerc Cc: sarapic.eang@scamark.leclerc; ludovic.noel@scamark.fr; sophie.rondou@agristo.com Subject: RE: Fwd: Réclamations soudures sachets rosty 600g Pom'Lisse Bonjour Alexis, Merci de votre email. Je suis désolée que vous ayez reçu des plaintes récurrentes. J'ai demandé à notre service de packaging de revenir vers moi aussi vite que possible avec une analyse approfondie et actions correctives - comme énumérées dans votre email ci-dessous. Je vous tiens au courant demain. Cdt, Sarah Sarah Detailleur Customer Experience Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 65 M + 0498 74 13 14 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Alexis CAJDLER [alexis.cajdler@scamark.leclerc] Sent: 10/06/2024 10:06 To: service@agristo.com Cc: ludovic.noel@scamark.fr; sarapic.eang@scamark.leclerc; marlies.deketele@agristo.com Subject: Fwd: Réclamations soudures sachets rosty 600g Pom'Lisse Bonjour, Je me permets de vous relancer à ce sujet concernant mon mail de la semaine dernière, nous avons reçu 3 nouvelles réclamations (voir PJ) Merci de revenir très rapidement vers moi avec les éléments demandés. Cela pourrait découler d'une demande de retrait de notre part si la situation perdure. En attente de votre retour. Cordialement, Alexis CAJDLER Chef de projets Emballages Frais et Surgelés Tel : 01 49 87 59 56 ---------- Forwarded message --------- De : Alexis CAJDLER <alexis.cajdler@scamark.leclerc> Date: lun. 3 juin 2024 à 18:06 Subject: Réclamations soudures sachets rosty 600g Pom'Lisse To: <service@agristo.com> Cc: Marlies De Ketele <Marlies.DeKetele@agristo.com> Bonjour, Je vous contacte suite à la réception d'une réclamation emballage concernant la référence de Rosty 600g Pom'Lisse pour un problème de mauvaise soudure du sachet. Ci joint dans l'excel le détail des réclamations. Dans ce contexte, pourriez-vous me communiquer les éléments suivants : 1°/ TRAÇABILITE - La traçabilité à envoyer sous format Excel : les centrales livrées (dont les plates-formes étrangères), les quantités livrées par centrale de destination avec les dates de livraison, n°SSCC palettes, numéro de commande client, numéro de lot et DLC/DLUO correspondantes. 2°/ ANALYSE DES CAUSES - La copie des contrôles réalisés en cours de conditionnement pour les lots en question. Est-ce que l’ensemble des lots est concerné par ce problème? - Vos analyses sur le produit fini concerné. Est-ce que votre échantillothèque présente ce défaut? Si oui, pourriez-vous nous envoyer des photos? - Votre interprétation quant à cette non-conformité et le risque résiduel que d’autres numéros de lots présentent cette problématique. 3°/ ACTION CORRECTIVE Suite à cette non-conformité, merci de nous indiquer les actions correctives mises en place pour éviter que ce type de non-conformité ne se renouvelle. Merci par avance pour votre retour avant le 10/06. Belle journée à vous, Alexis CAJDLER Chef de projets Emballages Frais et Surgelés Tel : 01 49 87 59 56

Subject: FW: Asda French Fries - Out of Spec Nutrition
TextBody: Hi Marlies, Please see attached completed investigation report into this OOS result. I have used the final report from the Crinkle Cut OOS and amended with the relevant details for this product. I have adapted slightly as on this one there was also a fibre OOS value, whereas on Crinkle Cut it was carbs and fat. On this one the moisture content in the SGS samples was also higher which may have also contributed to the lower fat result in addition to the analysis methodology, so this is also referenced within this report. Please can you review and confirm you’re happy for me to submit to Asda? Many thanks, Dan [cid:image859972.png@112D0CDA.CCC63B5B] [Fullers Foods Facebook]<https://www.facebook.com/fullersfoods> [Fullers Foods Instagram]<https://www.instagram.com/fullersfoods/> [Fullers Foods LinkedIn]<https://www.linkedin.com/company/fullers-foods-plc/> Daniel Taylor​​​​ Senior Technical Manager [cid:image518948.png@8034DFEC.51B2C68F] +44 7881 338652<tel:+44%207881%20338652> [cid:image432337.png@5F9B5A77.552F6390] +44 1134 579945<tel:+44%201134%20579945> [cid:image106860.png@F28CAE6A.6F0B38B7] https://fullersfoods.com<https://fullersfoodsplc.com/> [cid:image031264.png@6511A69E.8F2D7550] daniel.taylor@fullersfoods.com<mailto:daniel.taylor@fullersfoods.com> MY EMAIL ADDRESS HAS CHANGED TO @fullersfoods.com 31 Westgate, Leeds, LS1 2RA, United Kingdom Note: This email has been sent from a member of Fullers Foods International Limited and is confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual to whom it is addressed. From: Agristo Claims <claims@agristo.com> Sent: Thursday, May 16, 2024 3:53 PM To: Melissa Watson <melissa.watson@fullersfoods.com> Cc: Daniel Taylor <daniel.taylor@fullersfoods.com>; Bethany Hopkin <bethany.hopkin@fullersfoods.com>; Alice Toop <alice.toop@fullersfoods.com> Subject: RE: FW: Asda French Fries - Out of Spec Nutrition *** Please note the message below originated on the Internet. Please use caution when replying or opening links or attachments. *** Hi Melissa, hope you are well. we have well received your below Non conformance and have registered it in our system as ticket 26058. I'm surprised to see your values, as our values (see attached) are well withing the tolerances. * Fat: 7.5g/100g * Fibre: 4g/100g Same remark as we had with the previous mail of Daniel (Crinkle cut chips) I believe something must be off with the method used by the SGS lab. These are strange results. Are you able to verify this internally with the lab? Or send some samples to a different lab to doublecheck?

Subject: TOYOTA COMPLAINT FOR DISCOLORATIO AND SPROUTING ON NATURAL CUT
TextBody: Dear Hagino, Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. We have promptly registered it in our system under case number 30351. We are sorry to hear that Toyota's customer was not satisfied with the quality of the Grand Farm natural cut potatoes. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. Based on the provided pictures I have received, I can confirm this is a piece of sprout on the potato. Sprout can occur while the potatoes are being stored. Potatoes with sprout are still good for consumption, but the sprout should be removed. I have sent you a document with detailed information and explantion about sprout some months ago, after Toyota's visit. You can find it again enclosed. Sprout is normally removed by the hedgehog conveyor in potato reception, or by our optical sorters It appears that, despite our best efforts, some foreign material may have escaped our monitoring systems. Unfortunately, the batch code is not available, so I cannot conduct an investigation in the production records and quality documents for the batch in question. We are confident, however, that this complaint will not widespread. We apologize for any inconvenience that you may have suffered. If you have any further concerns, please don't hesitate to contact me again.

Subject: Iceland Customer Product Complaint 03369820
TextBody: Hi Michelle, Please find in annex the requested documents. Below the first investigation. Key points– if included in full investigation report; add comment ‘included in report’ Supplier Comments How many packs were produced? 5880 CAR (49 pallets) Line number Packagingline 13 (boxes) part A Productionline 6: gratin Date of production Packaging batch 1302126831 from 13/02/24-14/02/24 Related to production batch 1301033988 from 13/02/24 Were any issues or non-conformances recorded for this production; including foreign body controls and monitoring equipment? No product blocked on packaging order. No product blocked on production order. No notifications of Quality incidents on this packaging/production line on 13/02-14/02 (foreign bodies, glass incidents, metal incidents…) No irrigularities during Q-checks. Please outline the controls in place to prevent foreign material entering products -Approved suppliers of raw materials -Closed system for mixing potato slices and sauce -Manual packaging (= extra visual inspection) -Glass/plastic control measures. see annex. Have you reviewed retained samples / taste panel records - any deviation to specification? No, based on the photo, this does not come from our site. Item is intact so no reason to think that this is widespread. Are complaints recorded and monitored for Trending purposes? Yes, KPI-OPEX How are complaints communicated to Staff / Senior Team? Various ways: KPI meetings, TV screens, chef meetings… Could the root cause be identified? No Outline Corrective Actions No corrective actions: the piece does not match anything in our site. Based on the picture of the costumer we believe its a piece of like a coffee mug, where you have to push the lip away. We do not have this in our factory. We're hoping we can receive the piece of plastic from the costumer.

Subject: TOYOTA COMPLAINT FOR SHOESTRING WITH SPROUT
TextBody: Dear Hagino, Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. We have promptly registered it in our system under case number 31432. We are sorry to hear that Toyota's customer was not satisfied with the quality of the Grand Farm shoestring fries. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. Actually I can reconfirm what I have just sent you for the natural cut potatoes: Based on the provided pictures I have received, I can confirm this is a piece of sprout on the potato. Sprout can occur while the potatoes are being stored. Potatoes with sprout are still good for consumption, but the sprout should be removed. I have sent you a document with detailed information and explantion about sprout some months ago, after Toyota's visit. You can find it again enclosed. Sprout is normally removed by the hedgehog conveyor in potato reception, or by our optical sorters It appears that, despite our best efforts, some foreign material may have escaped our monitoring systems. Based on the batch codes I have received, I have done an investigation in the production records and quality documents for the batches in question. I can confirm that no remarks were noted on the production sheets. The production was thus done according to normal procedure. Moreover, no remarks about sprout were made during the hourly quality controls. We are therfore confident that this complaint will not be widespread. We apologize for any inconvenience that you may have suffered. If you have any further concerns, please don't hesitate to contact me again.

Subject: 2491214 Tesco FB Complaint - Hash Browns 750g 600404
TextBody: Hi Ciara, Our quality department has received the FB and tested it. The particle was not recognised as coming from our factory. If the particle was really in the hashbrown, it must have already entered it at the beginning of our process from potato reception to moulding machine. here are several steps present to avoid foreign bodies. Possibly it came from the field and got into the product despite all our efforts? The process on this production line is fully automated with minimal manual handling. Since we have no lotcode, it is difficult to trace if there were non - conformities during the period of production.

Subject: Asda Straight Cut Chips - Nutrition Out of Spec
TextBody: Hi Marlies, Please can you come back on this one also? Appreciate the response will be similar to the others, but if you could provide any recent nutrition testing data you have that would be great. Subject: Claim PIf Paf - seal problem RNC 24-054
TextBody: Hello Françoise, We received a complaint from the client Rio Branco, reporting a sealing problem on 51 packages of 400g and 1,05kg . Here's their comments: "We have received complaints from Ticket customers (120267,120217,120360,120597,120422,120535), reporting faulty sealing on the 1.05kg and 400g potato packages. Report follows: 120267 Customer Hilton contacted us to complain that he bought 2 boxes of PIFPAF PALITO POTATO 1,05KG 10,5KG - AG and when he opened one of the boxes, 8 units of the potato were poorly sealed. 120217 Customer Mrs. Simone, contacted us complaining about the product PIFPAF PALITO POTATO 1,05KG 10,5KG - AG because the packaging was poorly sealed. The customer noticed the problem when he went to open the box and display it on the sales floor, noting that the bottom packages were opening at the top of the package. 120360 Customer contacted us to complain that he bought a box of PIFPAF PALITO POTATOES 1,05KG 10,5KG - AG and the packages came all open, poorly sealed. There was no sign of tampering on the box, everything was normal. Only the bags were open. The customer weighed the box and the weight was normal. 120422 Customer Mr. Eder, contacted us complaining about the product BATATA PALITO PIFPAF 400G 10KG - AG because there were 3 poorly sealed packages. The customer noticed the problem when he opened the box to put it on the sales floor. 120535 RCA Elisson contacted us on behalf of the customer, complaining about the product PIFPAF PALITO POTATO 400G 10KG - AG because it is poorly sealed on the back of the package. The customer noticed the problem when he went to replace the goods. 120597 Customer contacted us to complain that 5 packs of PIFPAF PALITO POTATOES 1,05KG 10,5KG - AG were open in the box. The problem was verified as soon as the customer opened the box. We request an immediate investigation into the causes of the non-conformity and the corrective actions that will be taken." [cid:image002.png@01DABDAD.AEC48EC0] [cid:image003.png@01DABDAD.AEC48EC0] [cid:image005.jpg@01DABDAF.AF2BF130] [cid:image006.png@01DABDAD.AEC48EC0] [cid:image007.png@01DABDAD.AEC48EC0] [cid:image008.png@01DABDAD.AEC48EC0] There're more images attached. We ask you to please inform us which investigation was carried out for each item. Await your comments!

TextBody: Dear Supplier, These are all the customer complaints for your product that we received in store, were logged via our Careline or were allocated to you by our Oscar Trading Team yesterday 13.06.2024. These complaints may be in a status of approved (approved for charging), rejected (rejected from charging) or pending review (awaiting review by the Oscar Trading Team). This report should be used as an ‘early warning’ of any issues relating to your products. This report may not list all the complaints for your products or all those that you will be charged for at the end of the period. This is because cases are still being checked by the system at the time that the report is generated and these cases, once checked and assigned, will report either in the next weekly report, or the period end report. The period end report will be the full and final list of all trading cases generated and allocated to your supplier number for this financial period. ***Please note, upon opening the attachment you may be presented with a popup stating that the file is corrupt or unsafe. This popup appears as a precaution because this email is generated automatically, however you can trust that the attachment is neither corrupt nor unsafe. To dismiss the popup and open the file, click ‘Yes’ on the popup.*** Please note that this mailbox (Trading.service) is not manned; please do not respond to it. If you have any queries, please contact Oscar.Trading@sainsburys.co.uk, quoting the Trading Case Number as soon as possible after receipt of this email.

TextBody: Sorry, adding Steve... The @ does not add contacts automatically in SalesForce, it's a great piece of software... Jeroen Vandroemme Customer Service Officer Export Agristo nv P +32 56 54 10 66 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Agristo Claims [claims@agristo.com] Sent: 14/06/2024 09:22 To: grace.keogh@orange-and-green.com Cc: craig.munro@orange-and-green.com; sam.vandervlies@orange-and-green.com; robyn.enriquez@orange-and-green.com; melissa.samyn@agristo.com Subject: Re: Documents Aldi DAN572162 - dairy to follow Hi Grace, There must be a miscommunication somewhere about the new price for the Surf Fries. According to an email from Steve to Melissa on 23/05, the new price should become 1,02 EUR/KG (price Agristo to O&G) to move through the stock, Melissa agreed to this (even though Aldi has not ordered their requested volume for this SKU). So for all orders places since 1st of May, I changed the rate to 1,02 EUR/KG and gave a credit note for order DAN572162 which was invoiced at the old rate (so to explain the CN amount: 1.40 to 1.02 EUR/KG, so I gave a credit of 0.38 euro/kg for 324 cases). If I calculate your new box rate (12,48 EUR/UNIT) to KG, then your new price would result in 1.30 EUR/KG instead of 1,02 EUR/KG. So there is a discrepancy in the prices we are using... Because we are communicating in different units (boxes vs kg) I have added the conversion below for your reference: EUR (1cs = 9,6kg) Old New Kg 1,40 1,02 Unit (cs) 13,44 9,792 @Melissa, @Steve: what is the correct rate please?

Subject: TOYOTA COMPLAINT FOR A STAPLE IN BAG OF SHOESTRINGS
TextBody: Dear Hagino, I have well received the claim below about a staple that was found inside a bag of Grand Farm shoestring fries. Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. I have promptly registered it in our system under case number 30356. We are veru sorry to hear that this situotion occured and that your customer was not satisfied with the quality of this product. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. Batch information: Lotcode : A0323 298 03:23 Packaging day : 2023.10.25 To eliminate the presence of metal, there is a metal detector installed on each packaging line. This in-line metal detector is positioned after the product is packed. When metal is detected, the product is automatically rejected and falls into a closed container. The detection of metal is carefully recorded and analyzed. We investigate the cause and origin of potential contamination and take the necessary corrective actions. The functioning of these metal detectors is tested every hour using test bars with sizes Ø2mm Fe, Ø 2mm Non Fe and Ø 3.5mm Stainless steel. We have a detailed metal detection procedure in place, and our packaging operators undergo annual training. A bag is taken out of a box after passing through the metal detector to insure there is no metal inside. The Ø 2mm Fe test bar is attached with tape to the bag and placed on the conveyor before the metal detector. When the bag is detected, this is repeated for Non Fe and Stainless steel. If the bag is not rejected, the packaging line is stopped and the packed products are blocked until the last positive control. These blocked bags are then rechecked using a properly functioning metal detector. Based on the batch code, I have conducted an investigation into our production records and quality documents for this particular batch. Enclosed you can find the results. As you can see, we can confirm the metal detector on the packing line in question (A03) was working correctly. I have highlighted the results of the tests that were done right before the bag in question was packed in green. I will ask our quality department to do a test on the packing line in question to see if the metal detector is able to detect a staple when it is inside a bag. I will come back to you with the results of the tests promptly. Please note that, if the staple would have come into our factory with the potatoes, it seems to be impossible that it would be able to go through the entire production flow without being rejected / detected. It would fall through the holes of the graders (of the potatoes and of the fries) for example. I will also get back to you with the answer to your other questions soon. We apologize for any inconvenience that you may have suffered.

Subject: 2491214 Tesco FB Complaint - Hash Browns 750g 600404
TextBody: Hello, The colour of the FB suggests it has originated in a factory environment, and not from the field. Please could you respond to the below queries: 1. The FB is approximately 3mm x 5mm – is it possible due to the size it evaded your FB removal processes? 2. Have you conducted a walk of the production line with the FB for comparison? Are there similar materials present? 3. Have you conducted integrity checks on blue machinery parts on the line and is there any damage? 4. Have you shared the FB with your raw material suppliers and investigated with them? 5. Have you received any complaints of a similar nature in the last three months across all customers?

Subject: Price SEP SDCRST
TextBody: Hi Grace, There must be a miscommunication somewhere about the new price for the Surf Fries. According to an email from Steve to Melissa on 23/05, the new price should become 1,02 EUR/KG (price Agristo to O&G) to move through the stock, Melissa agreed to this (even though Aldi has not ordered their requested volume for this SKU). So for all orders places since 1st of May, I changed the rate to 1,02 EUR/KG and gave a credit note for order DAN572162 which was invoiced at the old rate (so to explain the CN amount: 1.40 to 1.02 EUR/KG, so I gave a credit of 0.38 euro/kg for 324 cases). If I calculate your new box rate (12,48 EUR/UNIT) to KG, then your new price would result in 1.30 EUR/KG instead of 1,02 EUR/KG. So there is a discrepancy in the prices we are using... Because we are communicating in different units (boxes vs kg) I have added the conversion below for your reference: EUR (1cs = 9,6kg) Old New Kg 1,40 1,02 Unit (cs) 13,44 9,792 @Melissa, @Steve: what is the correct rate please?

Subject: Réclamations soudures sachets rosty 600g Pom'Lisse
TextBody: Bonjour Alexis, Veuillez trouver ci-dessous l'analyse de notre service de qualité/packaging: Dans vos plaintes, il s'agit principalement de 2 codes de lot: D03 24 107 - D05 24 12. En analysant les codes horaires que nous avons reçus jusqu'à présent pour ces codes de lot (pour D03 24 107: 5h45 - 6h44 - 6h57 et pour D05 24 121: 21h40 - 21h38), ils semblent tous assez proches les uns des autres (dans 1 jour de production). A première vue, on constate alors que pas tout le cycle de production a été affecté. Ils ont ensuite vérifié les échantillons de rétention internes des deux code de lot. Ci-dessous vous trouvez les détails des échantillons et les codes de lot correspondants. Batch Code de lot 1302130864 D03241070321 1302130864 D03241070501 1302130864 D03241071312 1302132763 D05241210613 1302132763 D05241211307 1302132763 D05241212103 1302132763 D05241220503 Aucun des échantillons ne présentait de soudure ouverte. Cela confirme donc nos soupçons que le problème n'est pas généralisé pour tout le cycle de production. Nous comprenons la gravité des plaintes, mais nous espérons qu’avec les informations ci-dessus, nous vous avons rassuré de ne pas faire de retraite. Quant à la cause, on n'a pas encore eu des nouvelles de notre service de packaging. Evidemment, je vous tiens au courant si j'ai des nouvelles. Cdt, Sarah Sarah Detailleur Customer Experience Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 65 M + 0498 74 13 14 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Agristo Claims [claims@agristo.com] Sent: 13/06/2024 14:25 To: alexis.cajdler@scamark.leclerc Cc: sarapic.eang@scamark.leclerc; ludovic.noel@scamark.fr; sophie.rondou@agristo.com Subject: RE: Fwd: Réclamations soudures sachets rosty 600g Pom'Lisse Bonjour Alexis, Je vous tiens informé que le service de qualité et de packaging est en train de faire une investigation profonde et les plaintes sont escalées dans l'organisation. Ils vont examiner les échantillons de rétention et revenir vers moi dans les plus brefs délais. Merci de votre patience. Cdt, Sarah Sarah Detailleur Customer Experience Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 65 M + 0498 74 13 14 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Agristo Claims [claims@agristo.com] Sent: 11/06/2024 17:04 To: alexis.cajdler@scamark.leclerc Cc: sarapic.eang@scamark.leclerc; ludovic.noel@scamark.fr; sophie.rondou@agristo.com Subject: RE: Fwd: Réclamations soudures sachets rosty 600g Pom'Lisse Bonjour Alexis, Merci de votre email. Je suis désolée que vous ayez reçu des plaintes récurrentes. J'ai demandé à notre service de packaging de revenir vers moi aussi vite que possible avec une analyse approfondie et actions correctives - comme énumérées dans votre email ci-dessous. Je vous tiens au courant demain. Cdt, Sarah Sarah Detailleur Customer Experience Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 65 M + 0498 74 13 14 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Alexis CAJDLER [alexis.cajdler@scamark.leclerc] Sent: 10/06/2024 10:06 To: service@agristo.com Cc: ludovic.noel@scamark.fr; sarapic.eang@scamark.leclerc; marlies.deketele@agristo.com Subject: Fwd: Réclamations soudures sachets rosty 600g Pom'Lisse Bonjour, Je me permets de vous relancer à ce sujet concernant mon mail de la semaine dernière, nous avons reçu 3 nouvelles réclamations (voir PJ) Merci de revenir très rapidement vers moi avec les éléments demandés. Cela pourrait découler d'une demande de retrait de notre part si la situation perdure. En attente de votre retour. Cordialement, Alexis CAJDLER Chef de projets Emballages Frais et Surgelés Tel : 01 49 87 59 56 ---------- Forwarded message --------- De : Alexis CAJDLER <alexis.cajdler@scamark.leclerc> Date: lun. 3 juin 2024 à 18:06 Subject: Réclamations soudures sachets rosty 600g Pom'Lisse To: <service@agristo.com> Cc: Marlies De Ketele <Marlies.DeKetele@agristo.com> Bonjour, Je vous contacte suite à la réception d'une réclamation emballage concernant la référence de Rosty 600g Pom'Lisse pour un problème de mauvaise soudure du sachet. Ci joint dans l'excel le détail des réclamations. Dans ce contexte, pourriez-vous me communiquer les éléments suivants : 1°/ TRAÇABILITE - La traçabilité à envoyer sous format Excel : les centrales livrées (dont les plates-formes étrangères), les quantités livrées par centrale de destination avec les dates de livraison, n°SSCC palettes, numéro de commande client, numéro de lot et DLC/DLUO correspondantes. 2°/ ANALYSE DES CAUSES - La copie des contrôles réalisés en cours de conditionnement pour les lots en question. Est-ce que l’ensemble des lots est concerné par ce problème? - Vos analyses sur le produit fini concerné. Est-ce que votre échantillothèque présente ce défaut? Si oui, pourriez-vous nous envoyer des photos? - Votre interprétation quant à cette non-conformité et le risque résiduel que d’autres numéros de lots présentent cette problématique. 3°/ ACTION CORRECTIVE Suite à cette non-conformité, merci de nous indiquer les actions correctives mises en place pour éviter que ce type de non-conformité ne se renouvelle. Merci par avance pour votre retour avant le 10/06. Belle journée à vous, Alexis CAJDLER Chef de projets Emballages Frais et Surgelés Tel : 01 49 87 59 56

Subject: Referenz #GeVo2003604126: Issue: 2003596106, [ Beschwerde ] EDEKA, EDEKA Dicke Fritte 750g, Agristo NV27.4.26, G24 24120 05:42
TextBody: Dear Sir or Madam, Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. I have promptly registered it in our system under case number 30979. We are sorry to hear that your customer was not satisfied with the quality of the EDEKA Dicke Fritte. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. Batch information: Batch code: G24 24 120 05:42 Production day: 29/04/2024 After reviewing the picture/description, it appears that indeed, this is some product / batter crum. It is likely that some build-up of product/batter (coating) has occurred on a part of the production equipment. This must then have become dislodged during the production. Normally this kind of crum is removed by the optical sorter after freezing. It appears that, despite our best efforts, some foreign material may have escaped our monitoring system Based on the batch code, I have conducted an investigation into our production records and quality documents for this specific batch. I can confirm that our records do not show any anomaly during production or any remarks in this regard on the QC documents. Therefore, we are confident that this complaint is not widespread. We apologize for any inconvenience that you may have suffered. If you have any further concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us again.

Subject: Claim PIf Paf - seal problem RNC 24-054
TextBody: Dear Isadora, Thank you for sending this complaint. I have registered it in our internal quality assurance system. Based on your excel file, it seemed that 2 packaging runs were impacted. Therefore we made 2 ticketreferences in our internal quality system ticket 31599 (referring to packaging date 22/03/2024) and ticket (reffering to packaging date 04/03/2024). I would like to reassure you that during the packaging process, we conduct quality checks. Our team tests the seals of the bags on an hourly basis. A box is removed form the packaging line and all bags are meticulously inspected to ensure that the seals are properly closed. Therefore we would think that this would be isolated cases. We will send you the credit notes for these complaints shortly. We will make one with reference 60066803 for packaging date 22/03/2024 for 30 bags and one with reference 60066802 for packaging date 04/03/2024 for 23 bags. We apolagize for the inconvenience that this moght have caused you.

Subject: Customer complaint- Foreign body
TextBody: Dear Aswin, we have investigated this case, and can confirm you with certainty that this foreign object cannot have ended up in our product. The flakes line has an optical sorter at intake, which is equipeed with cameras. Depending on the settings and the detected defect, the unwanted materials/potatoes are removed from the product stream using mechanical valves. The valves then remove the materials/potatoes to exit 1, which is 'foreign objects'. In the entire production process, 7 sieves are installed, through which large objects such as the one in your picture, cannot end up in the flakes (maximum allowed size is 5mm). packing of the flakes is a closed process in which foreign objects from outside of our plant cannot end up. we checked with our technical service, who keep lists of all elements used in our machine park and in the factory, and, based on this picture, we can confirm that this yellow plastic/polyester-like object is not used in our factory. I hope this information reassures you that this foreign object is not coming from our factory.

Subject: RE: Setup Gelcampo brand - Labels NOK
TextBody: Hi Felien, We were taking photos of the samples we received at Gelcampo and noted that the labels are NOK. In the label printed at the bags, the table of nutritional information is not complied with the label approved. Somes lines of the table disappear and, in the Brazilian legislation, it’s mandatory have the lines and with specific format (bolt or not). We need you to check if it was only in some boxes or if the problem is with all the production. As we are planning the loading for the next week, we need your prompt answer to decide what to do. Thank you. Atentamente /

Subject: [Coupang] Tator tots damaged qty for GS-009143 (61box)
TextBody: Dear Agristo team For HLCUANR240229822_GS-009143 , which arrived Busan on 1st/June, we found out 61 boxes of package damaged tator tots again as attached picture. Early this year, we requested you to resolve packaging issue, and you guys informed us that it already used thicker 55um film. If there is no other way to improve package, tight QA process will be needed before loading. Please check internally and let us know your best action plan to avoid this issue again. 1. Package damage: 61Box = 244EA 2. No print of expiry date : 3ea 3. Black dirt: 3ea Thanks and B.regards SAEBOM Coupang cares about shared prosperity between our businesses and we're committed to following all of the fair trade-related laws. If you experience anything that you think may be a violation of law in your dealings with Coupang, please report it at ethics@coupang.com <mailto:ethics@coupang.com> . Coupang will do its best to keep all reports confidential and to ensure that you do not experience disadvantages because of reporting. 쿠팡은 파트너사와의 공동 성장 및 발전과 함께 공정거래 관계 법령의 준수를 위해 많은 노력을 하고 있습니다. 혹시라도 쿠팡과의 거래에 있어 공정거래 관계 법령에 저촉 될 수 있는 사례를 겪으시게 되는 경우 "ethics@coupang.com <mailto:ethics@coupang.com> " 로 제보 부탁드립니다. 쿠팡은 제보 관련 사항에 대한 비밀 유지 및 제보로 인한 불이익 방지에 최선을 다하겠습니다. 쿠팡은 공정거래 관련 법령을 준수하며, 귀사와의 상호 존중을 바탕으로 함께 발전하고자 노력하고 있습니다. 본 이메일은 귀사 및 귀사의 비즈니스에 대한 존중을 바탕으로 양 사가 함께 발전하기 위하여 신의성실에 기반하여 이루어지는 자유로운 협상 과정의 일환입니다. 본 이메일에는 공정거래 법령을 위반하는 내용이 포함되어 있지 않으며, 본 이메일의 어떠한 내용도 관련 법령을 위반하는 내용으로 해석될 수 없음을 알려 드립니다. 쿠팡의 모든 임직원은 공정거래 법령을 준수할 의무가 있고, 쿠팡은 이에 반하는 행위를 용인하지 않습니다. 본 이메일은 이메일의 발신인이 작성한 것이며, 본 이메일에 포함된 내용에 대해서는 이메일의 작성자에게 책임이 있습니다. 쿠팡 임직원의 불공정 행위를 목격하거나, 기타 건의하실 사항이 있으면 ethics.coupang.com로 문의 부탁드립니다. Subject: FW: Information frites 2.5 kg code 12585
TextBody: Bonjour, Nous validons ce lot sous réserve des réclamations clients. Nous avons recontrôler d’autres sachets et nous sommes toujours en limite haute de nos tolérances. Nous avons l’horaire 12h24 pour lequel nous avons 7 pièces critiques sur le sachets de 2.5kg soit 2.8 / 1kg : Nous reviendrons vers vous sur le décompte des taches et leur définition afin de nous mettre d’accord. Cordialement. Sandrine GLADIEUX Technicienne qualité 5-7 rue des palis 77140 Nemours T +33 1 64 45 14 88 www.picard.fr <https://protect.checkpoint.com/v2/___https://www.picard.fr/___.YzJlOmFncmlzdG86YzpvOjk4OGIyNDc0MjhmOWZiNzg2YmVmZTcyYWEzMzU3NWU1OjY6MGEzYjozNzU4NzU0YjNhNzNhOGExMjIwMjU3NjhhZTJhNWZlOGRjMzcwMDBmZGUzOTE0MTNjM2I1MzU5MWJmOTM4MmFlOmg6VA> De : Michèle Vandenbroucke <Michele.Vandenbroucke@agristo.com> Envoyé : mardi 11 juin 2024 16:27 À : GLADIEUX Sandrine <Sandrine_GLADIEUX@picard.fr> Cc : LUCET Magalie <magalie_lucet@picard.fr>; CZUYKA Kelly <Kelly_CZUYKA@picard.fr>; DOS SANTOS Andréa <Andrea_DOSSANTOS@picard.fr>; DALLOT Laura <Laura_DALLOT@picard.fr> Objet : [EXTERNE] RE: Information frites 2.5 kg code 12585 Vous ne recevez pas souvent de courriers de la part de michele.vandenbroucke@agristo.com <mailto:michele.vandenbroucke@agristo.com> . Découvrez pourquoi cela est important <https://protect.checkpoint.com/v2/___https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification___.YzJlOmFncmlzdG86YzpvOjk4OGIyNDc0MjhmOWZiNzg2YmVmZTcyYWEzMzU3NWU1OjY6NjQ4OTpiOWRhNTliNTcwNjM0MzA4ZDA2NzU0MmFiODQwMjYxNTEyOWZmMzIyOGU4YzcxYTdlYzYwMTYwZmM4OWVkOTM2Omg6VA> Avertissement Sécurité: Ce message provient d'une source extérieure à Picard. Soyez vigilant, veuillez ne pas cliquer sur les liens ou ouvrir les pièces jointes à moins de connaître l'expéditeur et d'être certain du contenu du message. Bonjour, Nous avons bien reçu votre notification ci-dessous, qui a été enregistrée sous la reference 30908 Sur la bas du code lot, nous confirmerons que les frites ont été produits le 15 décembre 2023. * Lot: G 23 349 14h50 * Batch: 1033424 * Date: 15/12/2023 Tout d’abord, je voudrais vous informer que nous avons un système d’assurance qualité en place, dans lequel le produit final est soumis à un contrôle approfondi toutes les heures. Lors de ces contrôles, le nombre de défauts est également mesuré. Pour m’assurer que nous nous comrenons, j'aimerais savoir comment vous enregistrez les défauts ? Dans nos contrôles, les défauts sont comptés par nombre/1000g. Les valeurs dont vous parlez s'écartent également légèrement de nos valeurs prédéterminées. Veuillez voir nos commentaires dans le document ci-joint. En examinant les contrôles en détail, nous constatons qu'ils sont conformes à la spécification, mais qu'ils tendent parfois vers la limite. À titre d'action, nous avons déjà extrait des échantillons de rétention du code de lot en question à des fins de vérification. Comme vous pouvez le voir sur la photo ci-jointe, ils ne présentent pas de défauts excessifs. Bien entendu, nous nous efforçons toujours d'éliminer le plus de défauts possible de notre processus de production et d'ajuster les trieurs optiques avec précision. Cependant, nous travaillons avec un produit naturel, et nous nous efforçons toujours d'obtenir la meilleure qualité possible. Nous espérons pouvoir vous aider et restons à votre disposition pour toute question supplémentaire. Bien à vous, Michèle​​​​ Vandenbroucke Technical Sales Officer T +32 56 54 09 64 <tel:+32%2056%2054%2009%2064> • M +32 486 90 32 72 <tel:+32%20486%2090%2032%2072> Ridder de Ghellinckstraat 9 • 8710 Wielsbeke • Belgium • www.agristo.com <https://protect.checkpoint.com/v2/___https://eu.content.exclaimer.net/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.agristo.com%2F&tenantid=R5mU58TWEe6F-gAiSH-K5g&templateid=30f946889221ef1186d20022488063c9&excomponentid=E_Xg2xpZEE7COvcAHBDP1EjLNrmijgfYCtnikvl0Y9o&excomponenttype=Link&signature=iFzMwqF297Gnrm9dssB9y6ZrUX6ui-gbIW3mmKrmZFU0fKOdCY7CBRtJiGe_Spn4dNtCSo7Dz3SqIjt40FOTSKqvA4CSyfr_2rdEcKiywYfk52eQDa3TP0yee1aLPqWhlT2-VWyiSjlwfPeFC2XwjArwx6eH8DXqSxKsPDk9zRTDisnzduRzC5ojXNfUDKcsXK30zIlw0nO2bRD_7benWToceZV3s_7YbFbU3vGih3dwe7J_ewazTQT4GtDl-pg3BF4NpNhrrDUxkkXgyyy9lKCK6ZoEagBoNlU-jxW4a96QCUEXG9ZPC0VjWmDRcOTQgLwZs2UYlVAA1eRt3wY-fw&v=1___.YzJlOmFncmlzdG86YzpvOjk4OGIyNDc0MjhmOWZiNzg2YmVmZTcyYWEzMzU3NWU1OjY6MzU1MDo2ZjVmYzdhMTk3Y2NiY2Y5ZmFiNDEzYjZiMTFkNjU4Yjk3OWFiYzI4MjNiNzY4NDY5MDZhMDYzNmRjZWEzYzA0Omg6VA> <https://protect.checkpoint.com/v2/___https://eu.content.exclaimer.net/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fagristo.com%2Fconcepts%2Fconvenient-quality-cuisine-in-the-frozen-aisle&tenantid=R5mU58TWEe6F-gAiSH-K5g&templateid=30f946889221ef1186d20022488063c9&excomponentid=NLdhjXj_SLJw__-bAGoE_fBc1ViVpDvg-s7wZtdGh0E&excomponenttype=Image&signature=UeR6st7n94zMMt34vuiUdvPhxvPwtCq2GervaBJw6HuD-QDIwRL39aIQuZccNWILU_sL2KbpoLZygRxq4b5rEFbgJLR0rausEefiFHtm5cXGQmnO32mbAWGATbmRovOQsaigoJ-Xi71xziibGDRt0GiF_D9Gs06y0MXcdZ9gvVS8OvENMA0bb48b3iQvvwwlbMXQ2hxf0uXtwvwuh-WO4uBrYtGcqdWJsAOtW7e3_SfEqT5gOqH5yruEOQVxkKuUYI1FUwUq8WxGP1W-vddvKkSqIPRYDnqwanjcooRC6v4REHchFeWMSn2CvbjCpWLMGb7aml16MyXwMcWet3jxzA&v=1___.YzJlOmFncmlzdG86YzpvOjk4OGIyNDc0MjhmOWZiNzg2YmVmZTcyYWEzMzU3NWU1OjY6MzFkZTpkNDlmYTRkNjJmNzNjMTgwYmM4MTFkNmFhM2VlODBlOThjOWQ1NmYzNWQyNmRjYzc1OGFlM2YwNzVkOGM3MDg5Omg6VA>

Subject: RE: Setup Gelcampo brand - Labels NOK
TextBody: Hello Patricia Thank you for raising the issue here below regarding the non conformity of the nutritional table printed on the packaging. Based on the clear image you were able to provide us, we were able to perform an investigation regarding this matter. Product : Gelcampo Batata Pré-frita Pal. 10x10 mm 2 kg Lot: L C05 24 111 01:31 Production date: 20/04/2021 Every hour different quality checks are performed by the operator on the packaging line. The check of the printing quality of the bag stamp is also included in these quality checks. All of these checks are registered. I have consulted the corresponding packaging and quality records of that day and no remarks were made. Both our quality and packaging workers have not registered any anomaly. I therefore can assure you that this concerns an isolated case and this is not spread over the other stock to be loaded next week. Please understand that the nutritional information is printed to the packaging by inkjet. This printing quality is less sharp than the preprinted information on the packaging. To avoid similar remarks in the future I have made the table lines of the nutritional table thicker. As per your last request we removed importer 'Gelcampo' and replaced it by 'Super Rede'. Can you confirm if this information can be printed during the next production run? Without mistake I didn't receive your approval on this latest amend? Hope to have informed you sufficiently. If you have any other doubts do not hesitate to reach out.

Subject: FW: bingo gradačac došlo otvoreno
TextBody: Dear Ana Žaja, Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. We have promptly registered it in our system under ticket number 00031552. We are sorry to hear that your customer was not satisfied with the quality of this batch. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. Batch information: Lotcode : G022411711 Packaging day : 26/04/2024 I would like to reassure you that during the packing process, we conduct quality checks. Our team tests the seals of the bags on an hourly basis. A box is removed from the packaging line, and all bags are meticulously inspected to ensure that the seals are properly closed. These inspection results are recorded in our Quality documents. In light of the concerns you raised, we have conducted an investigation into the packaging checks for the particular batch. You will receive an electronic credit note shortly. We regret any inconvenience this issue may have caused you or your customer. We take this matter seriously and are committed to preventing such incidents in the future. Should you require any further information or assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Subject: Asda Straight Cut Chips - Nutrition Out of Spec
TextBody: Hi Marlies, Thanks for this. Do you have any recent nutrition testing for this product that supports the on-pack data? For the other OOS investigations we have provided verification certs from testing completed earlier this year, so do you also have something for the Straight Cut Chips please? Subject: Referenz #GeVo2003612677: PRIO-1 Complaint metal, Issue: 2003612484, [GUT&GÜNSTIG, 4.2026, A02 24 113 12:49]
TextBody: EDEKA Kunden- und Ernährungsservice GUT&GÜNSTIG Backofenfrites Finschnitt 1000g Issue Number: 2003612484 URGENT! Dear sir or madam, we received the following customer’s complaint through our customer service. We expect you to review the incident immediately and send a first detailed statement within two hours after receiving this mail. Please see below for the reason for complaint and product details. Product: Article: Backofenfrites Finschnitt 1000g Brand: GUT&GÜNSTIG BBD: 4.2026 Lot: A02 24 113 12:49 Issue: Good day "See attached photos. According to the customer, the wire in the small bag was in the bag of chips. I have photographed the batch number. I also have the wire and bag here on site. The customer has not suffered any damage, but will ask again next week again next week to find out how this could have happened." _________ Guten Tag „siehe Fotos Anhang. Der Draht in der kleinen Tüte befand sich laut Kunde in der Pommestüte. Chargennummer hab ich fotografiert. Draht und Tüte habe ich auch hier vor Ort. Der Kunde hat keinen Schaden erlitten, fragt aber nächste Woche nochmal nach, ob es Erkenntnisse gibt, wie das passieren konnte.“ ________________________________ We expect a detailed and comprehensive statement regarding this complaint. Please carry out a thorough investigation and provide us the result of the investigation within the a.m. timeframe. Please include answers to the following questions as well: 1. When was the production of the product? 2. Did you notice any entry of metallic foreign bodies in the relevant production period? 3. Have you received any further complaints? 4. What preventive measures against the entry of metallic foreign bodies exist in the production facility? 5. Are metal detectors used in your production facility? At what point(s) are they installed (detailed description including photos required)? What sensitivity do the detectors have for different types of metal? By whom are checks of the metal detectors carried out and how often is it done? What do you use as reference for a successful detection test? How and at which point on the line are the products discharged in the event of a successful detection? Are there any technical devices that indicate a failure of the detector or of the discharge? Who has access to the metal detectors and the black box? 6. Do you know the exact compositions of all metal objects used in the production plant? 7. Are all metal items in your production facility detectable by X-ray or metal detectors? 8. To what extent is there a possibility of the introduction of metallic foreign bodies through raw materials or packaging materials? 9. Are the production lines completely covered? 10. Are all employees trained regarding the risk of foreign bodies? 11. Are there any contract workers employed in your production facility? 12. Were there any service workers or engineers working during production? Please send us an excerpt of your HACCP concept regarding metal and foreign body and your current IFS-certificate. Please let us know what quantities of the relevant production lot have been shipped and to which warehouses. When were the goods delivered? Were any further goods delivered after this particular batch/lot (when, and in what quantities)? Please send your statement solely by email, maintaining the original subject to reklamation@edeka.de<mailto:reklamation@edeka.de> and the whole mailing list of this email. If you are missing any product details, please let us know. Nevertheless we ask you to answer all questions where possible. Please send us the missing details once you received the missing product details. Thanks! Should you have further documents or information available that might help resolving the complaint, please add these as well. Should you require any further information, please do not hesitate to contact us.
