Subject: Referenz #GeVo2003612677: PRIO-1 Complaint metal, Issue: 2003612484, [GUT&GÜNSTIG, 4.2026, A02 24 113 12:49]
TextBody: Dear Sir or Madam, Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. I have promptly registered it in our system under case number 31755. We are sorry to hear that your customer was not satisfied with the quality of this batch. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. Batch information: Batch code: A02 24 113 12:49 Packing day: 22/04/2024 Besides the steps that are already taken during the production process (optical sorters for example), to eliminate the presence of metal foreign bodies, there is a metal detector installed on each packaging line. This in-line metal detector is positioned after the product is packed. When metal is detected, the product is automatically rejected and falls into a closed container. The detection of metal is carefully recorded and analyzed. We investigate the cause and origin of potential contamination and take the necessary corrective actions. The functioning of these metal detectors is tested every hour using test bars with sizes Ø2mm Fe, Ø 2mm Non Fe and Ø 3.5mm Stainless steel. We have a detailed metal detection procedure in place, and our packing line operators undergo annual training. A bag is taken out of a box after passing through the metal detector to insure there is no metal inside. The Ø 2mm Fe test bar is attached with tape to the bag and placed on the conveyor before the metal detector. When the bag is detected, this is repeated for Non Fe and Stainless steel. If the bag is not rejected, the packaging line is stopped and the packed products are blocked until the last positive control. These blocked bags are then rechecked using a properly functioning metal detector. Based on the batch code, I have conducted an investigation into our production records and quality documents for this particular batch. As you can see on the results enclosed, I can confirm that the metal detector on the packing line in question (A02) was working correctly at the time the product was packed (test that were done before and after the product was packed are highlighted in green). Could you please send the metal piece to the address provided below for further examination? This will allow us to determine if the metal was rejected during the online inspection and if anyone can recognize the piece. Agristo nv For the attention of Jeroen Perseyn Waterstraat 40 8531 Harelbeke Belgium with reference to our case number 31755 I added the answer to your questions in blue in your e-mail below and added the requested documents enclosed. If you need any further information, please do not hesitate to contact me. We apologize for any inconvenience that you may have suffered.

TextBody: Hi Ciara, I just received following feedback from our production site in Tilburg: Yesterday 13/6/2024, we tested the FB on the optical sorter "Triplus" at Tilburg. Initially, the FB was not recognised by the camera. The settings of the camera have been adjusted slightly so that the FB is recognised and ejected. This has been tested and agreed.

Subject: Your Sainsbury's Product Related Customer Complaints - Daily Email 14.06.2024
TextBody: Dear Supplier, These are all the customer complaints for your product that we received in store, were logged via our Careline or were allocated to you by our Oscar Trading Team yesterday 14.06.2024. These complaints may be in a status of approved (approved for charging), rejected (rejected from charging) or pending review (awaiting review by the Oscar Trading Team). This report should be used as an ‘early warning’ of any issues relating to your products. This report may not list all the complaints for your products or all those that you will be charged for at the end of the period. This is because cases are still being checked by the system at the time that the report is generated and these cases, once checked and assigned, will report either in the next weekly report, or the period end report. The period end report will be the full and final list of all trading cases generated and allocated to your supplier number for this financial period. ***Please note, upon opening the attachment you may be presented with a popup stating that the file is corrupt or unsafe. This popup appears as a precaution because this email is generated automatically, however you can trust that the attachment is neither corrupt nor unsafe. To dismiss the popup and open the file, click ‘Yes’ on the popup.*** Please note that this mailbox (Trading.service) is not manned; please do not respond to it. If you have any queries, please contact Oscar.Trading@sainsburys.co.uk, quoting the Trading Case Number as soon as possible after receipt of this email.

Subject: dark color, broken - item 308955 (P 12/02/2024)
TextBody: Dear Kathleen, I sent you a video which shows one carton has 9 bags (1 bag shortage). I am waiting for JY to provide more information and the total affected quantity. Jack Lo From: Agristo Claims <claims@agristo.com> Sent: Thursday, June 13, 2024 8:06 PM To: taiwanfood@seed.net.tw Cc: beau.declerck@agristo.com Subject: RE: dark color, broken - item 308955 (P 12/02/2024) Dear Jack Lo, We are very sorry to hear you have reason to complaint. Based on the given lot code D05 24 043 1643, I could trace back production date and I could check our quality and production records. According to our QC log files and production files, there were no issues reported. The colour was within spec and we did not struggle with broken product. We check the product after it has been packed in bags. If a lot of waffles would get broken during packaging, we definitely would have noticed. As our QC results are within spec, we believe that this will be related to some individual waffes (we assume that one or some indiviudal waffle was/were blocked in the oven, with a darker colour as result and some individual may have broken during packaging (but will not be widespread) or during transport. How many dark waffles has your customer found till now and how many broken waffles has your customer found till now? And shortage in cartons: do you mean bags were missing in cartons? Please inform me how many bags were missing and how many cartons. We have a carton weight checker and if bags are missing, the boxes must be rejected. My what's App number is 0032 473 5572 29

TextBody: Dear, Thank you for your continuous support as always. Regarding the subject, how is the progress? I am contacting you to confirm. I am sorry to trouble you, but I would appreciate it if you could let me know. Thank you for your continued support. ----------------------------------------------- Kohei Nishimura Quality Assurance Department KOBE BUSSAN CO., LTD. 125-1 HIRANO, KAKOGAWA-CHO, KAKOGAWA-CITY HYOGO 675-0063 JAPAN quality-improvement@kobebussan.co.jp<mailto:quality-improvement@kobebussan.co.jp> From: quality-improvement(kobebussan) Sent: Monday, June 10, 2024 11:54 AM To: Agristo Claims <claims@agristo.com> Cc: Neviani Ilaria(kobebussan) <neviani@kobebussan.co.jp>; Atsushi Karita(kobebussan) <karita@kobebussan.co.jp>; Mamiko Okutani(kobebussan) <okutani@kobebussan.co.jp>; Noriyoshi Miki(kobebussan) <miki@kobebussan.co.jp>; Kenji Inada(kobebussan) <k.inada@kobebussan.co.jp>; Makoto Nakahara(kobebussan) <nakahara@kobebussan.co.jp>; Takuya Sakai(kobebussan) <sakai@kobebussan.co.jp> Subject: RE: [Request for confirmation] Claim Report 386556 [597:Agristo(ヘ゛ルキ゛ー)] Dear, Good morning to you. I am sorry. I forgot to send you an email due to business trips and holidays. ・Thank you for the graph data. I think it is a correlation chart of complaint number and Expiration date number. Do you have statistical data such as complaint number for each potato harvest season? ・How long does it take to process harvested potatoes in your company? I think it depends on the farmland, so please tell me roughly. ・I think there is storage after harvest in the farmland, but is it possible to trace when the potatoes were harvested?

Subject: FW: Feedback - Fries colour
TextBody: Hello Rachel, We have received your complaint and are sorry for this inconvenience. Lot code: A04240390901 Production date: 08/02/2024 We have investigated this code from both our process sheets and the library samples, tasting sheets and daily management panel. We can confirm that the fried colour was showing some variation between darker chips and also lighter chips, but all within spec. We allow a colour variation between Agtron 60-70 and at 09h the Agtron was 60, so at the darker site of the range, but still acceptable. According to the photo's of you customer, we see fries with sugar points or glassy potatoes. Sugar points occur more at the end of the season when starch converts to sugars in the potato as it is stored for longer. We have very detailed checks for the sugars on potato intake and during production. But even within the potatoes from one delivery, from part of a field, the sugars can vary and not be detected. We adjust our blanchers based on the intake records to reduce the sugars and colour. If it is extreme we reject a full load of raw potatoes. Our QC records show that we did not struggle with sugar points or glassy potatoes. We know for sure from our regular checks throughout the run that this was a good run. This makes us believe that only a small pocket of potatoes will be affected by a higher level of sugars. We hope that this letter has reassured you as to the precautions that we take with our products and to the good general quality of our products. We thank you for bringing this to our attention. Please do not hesitate to contact me in case of further questions.

Sophie François <Sophie.Francois@agristo.com <mailto:Sophie.Francois@agristo.com> > Cc: Jeff Preston <jeff.preston@ardo.com <mailto:jeff.preston@ardo.com> >; Julia Melnyk <Julia.Melnyk@ardo.com <mailto:Julia.Melnyk@ardo.com> > Subject: RE: PO 754084 - Damages Reddy Raw Importance: High Hi Louise, Sophie, Yes, please issue credit 1 short + 4 damages cases. The customer is also going to take the deduction for no empty cartons $1000 USD. Was this container loaded in Tilburg? Did we not switch all of Reddy Raw loadings back to Wielsbeke specifically because that site understands that empty carton requirement and attention to the quality of the pallets and boxes upon loading? Customer said it’s been at least 3 containers this week that they did not receive the empty cartons. And that its mostly on the following SKUS missing the boxes. Subject: WAI out of limit on COA and at Mechelen plant

Overview Complaint: - Company name: KELLOGG EUROPE TRADING LTD- Reason for complaint: Nutritional-- Details for complaint: NC analyse-- Customer description: WAI OOL- Responsible party: Tilburg (P012) - AT3 Request from CX: Ter info, WAI OOL voor kellogs batch 8800515CX Owner: Françoise De VriezeLink to complaint: 00031897 Thanks for taking up this further investigation.

Subject: Réclamation AC 519/2024
TextBody: Bonjour, Je tenais à vous informer de l'évolution de cette plainte. Nous avons fait une investigation avec notre department de qualité. Basé sur l'investigation, le produit a été emballé et produit le 11/03/2024. Basé sur les photos, il semble que les corps étrangers ne semblent pas être passés par une friteuse, de sorte que les chances qu'ils soient arrivés avec eux depuis le champ et qu'ils aient traversé l'ensemble du flux de production sont pratiquement inexistantes. Pour nos clients en vrac, nous préparons et remplissons nos cartons en interne. Normalement, un sac bleu est toujours inséré, rempli et fermé. Le bois n'est peut-être pas détecté, mais il est interdit dans la production. Sur la base des informations contenues dans votre document supplémentaire, nous avons appris que les corps étrangers se trouvaient entre la palette et le vrac et non dans le produit. Cela aurait pu se produire pendant le transport ou à la réception. Bien à vous, Françoise Françoise De Vrieze Technical Sales Officer P +32 56 54 10 63 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Agristo Claims [claims@agristo.com] Sent: 14/06/2024 10:02 To: marine.catherin@mousquetaires.com Cc: francois.trannoy@mousquetaires.com; melanie.jeuland-vallee@mousquetaires.com Subject: RE: Réclamation AC 519/2024 Bonjour madame Catherin, Nous avons bien recu cette plainte concernant les corps étranger. Nous l'avons enrégistré dans notre système d'assurance de qualité comme réference 31577. Nous sommes désollées que vous avez eu ce problème. Nous allons examiner cette question avec notre service qualité et notre service d'emballage. Je vous tiendrai au courant de l'évolution de la situation. Je vous remercie pour votre patience. Subject: CMPL0049132 - Klacht - ART 22160 BONI aardappelkroketten oven 1kg 05569 AGRISTO NV
TextBody: Dag Inez en Joke, Ik krijg deze info door. Dit zal vermoedelijk dezelfde klant zijn aangezien de colruyts dicht bij elkaar zijn (ik vraag nog voor zekerheid na) Is het nog interessant voor jullie om de andere stukjes te verkrijgen? Van de tweede klacht of FAVV heb ik nog niets gehoord. Ook heeft Colruyt geen info meer gegeven over de withdrawal. Groeten Sandrine Van Bockstael Technical Sales Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 44 --------------- Forwarded Message --------------- From: CSMGT [customer.servicemanagement@colruytgroup.com] Sent: 17/06/2024 15:34 To: sarah.segers1@colruyt.be; wouter.claerhout@agristo.com; claims@agristo.com; veerle.vanhecke@colruytgroup.com Cc: servicenow.confidential@colruytgroup.com Subject: CMPL0049132 - Klacht - ART 22160 BONI aardappelkroketten oven 1kg 05569 AGRISTO NV Beste leverancier, Op 12-06-2024 18:02:53 CEST ontvingen wij onderstaande klacht: Klachtinformatie: CLP-Aankoop Klachtnummer: CMPL0049132 Artikel: 22160 - BONI aardappelkroketten oven 1kg Lotcode: D02 24 082 Klacht: Blauwe stukjes in kroketten > Klant heeft de resterende kroketten binnen gebracht in haar Colruyt winkel te Ninove. Wij wachten nog op bevestiging van het filiaal of deze goed zijn aangekomen. Wensen jullie, na onze bevestiging, terug een koerier te sturen voor ophaling? Zoals bij CMPL0046381. Wij vragen u om op basis van de doorgestuurde gegevens na te gaan welke oorzaken van uw kant mogelijks aan de basis liggen van deze klacht. Gelieve ook de preventieve maatregelen mee te geven die door u worden genomen om deze klacht in de toekomst te vermijden. Indien u meent dat er een risico bestaat voor de algemene (voedsel)veiligheid, vragen we u om meteen over te gaan tot een risicoanalyse en ons de besluiten ervan mee te delen. Op die manier kunnen ook wij direct de nodige maatregelen treffen en de betrokkenen correct informeren. Graag hadden wij een eerste reactie uiterlijk binnen de 48u ontvangen na ontvangst van deze klacht. Met vriendelijke groeten, Vanessa Verkens Quality Officer Service Center Quality Product vanessa.verkens@colruytgroup.com T +32 (0)2 363 55 45 Edingensesteenweg 196 - 1500 Halle www.colruytgroup.com LinkedIn Twitter Ref:MSG29168753_Y8HpcsQ1dHxVKxSoO6i

Subject: SERIOUS 2503002 Tesco FB Complaint - Spicy Potato Wedges 750g 600413
TextBody: Hi, As the FB was not detected and rejected by the optical sorter originally this suggests the complaint is justified. Due to the nature of the complaint we need to establish the root cause and corrective actions. Please could you respond to the below: * Why was the FB not rejected by the optical sorter originally? Could you provide some detail on the parameter changes that resulted in the FB being detected? * Your response previously mentioned sorting checks not related to the optical sorter. Could you elaborate on these checks? * Has this complaint been communicated with relevant personnel? * Have the operators carrying out the sorting checks been retrained?

Subject: BRF Claim - Protocolo 2950973
TextBody: Dear, Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. We have promptly registered it in our system under ticket number 00031593. We are sorry to hear that your customer was not satisfied with the quality of this batch. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. Batch information: Lotcode : C04233390538 Packaging day : 5/12/2023 I would like to reassure you that during the packing process, we conduct quality checks. Our team tests the seals of the bags on an hourly basis. A box is removed from the packaging line, and all bags are meticulously inspected to ensure that the seals are properly closed. These inspection results are recorded in our Quality documents. In light of the concerns you raised, we have conducted an investigation into the packaging checks for the particular batch. No remarks were made. We regret any inconvenience this issue may have caused you or your customer. We take this matter seriously and are committed to preventing such incidents in the future. Should you require any further information or assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us.

TextBody: Hello, We have received a new complaint, please see the below details: Fullers Reference 600605 Customer Reference 2574022 Product Tesco Roast Potatoes 800g Date Code Requested Batch Code Requested Complaint Category FB Complaint Detail block of something in potatoes. Customer has described this as looking like a spine bone with vertebrae and discs on it but a very small one (possible from a small animal) it was pale brown in colour and firm to the touch. FB requested. Please start a full investigation into this matter and respond in the usual way. We require your report in 5 days.

We definitely aren’t going to be able to achieve an FTP of 28/6 but I will relay this information and see where we get to with this. Aldi have indicated that they would have to look at a revised launch and volumes if this was not achievable. Out of interest though – I can see we executed a fat-track printer amend for this product to move to Siva following some issues on the line (project attached). It may not change anything time-wise but just want to be sure we are all aligned in this respect.

Subject: RICHIESTA CLIENTE DIREZIONALE
TextBody: Gentilissima società, Sono Monica Garofoni e faccio parte dell'ufficio acquisti della Costruzioni Generali Italia Srl. Le faccio una breve presentazione aziendale. Amministriamo sul territorio nazionale diverse strutture come: mense, attività ricettive e ristorative, Pasticcerie e laboratori di panificazione, bar, tabacchi presso importanti strutture. Siamo presenti anche nella Pubblica Amministrazione e nel portale CONSIP, quindi vantiamo una solida esperienza e una consistente schiera di Partners. Non possiamo, quindi, non rivendicare la nostra posizione di leadership in Italia. Gradirei ricevere, con cortese sollecitudine, il catalogo dei Vs prodotti e il relativo listino prezzi. Vi prego di informarmi, successivamente, di eventuali soglie di acquisto in modo tale da raggiungere una maggiore scontistica. Desidererei conoscere, inoltre, condizioni commerciali, termini di consegna della merce, eventuali assicurazioni per il trasporto, schede tecniche per prodotto che intendiamo acquistare e se vi occupate dell'assistenza alla clientela. In attesa di un Vs riscontro, Vi porgo i miei più cordiali saluti. [X] Dr.ssa Monica Garofoni Ufficio acquisti Costruzioni generali italia Srl Sede legale: Via Cremona, 71 00161 Roma Sede operativa e uffici: Via Dell'orso, 68 20121 Milano Sede logistica e magazzino: Via Galileo Galilei, 5 00012 Guidonia P.iva: 09728511008

Merci [Inline image URL : https://marketpro.ma/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/Screenshot-2024-02-20-at-12.11.06.png] OMAR RHEFIR CEO https://goodeats.ma Le 23 mai 2024 à 15:49, Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> a écrit : ﻿ Bonjour Omar Nous avons également du stock pour charger 7x7 a semaine prochaine. Cela signifie-t-il que nous chargerons 3 commandes la semaine prochaine ? (1 conteneur 10x10, 1 camion 10x10 et 1 camion 7x7) ? Si ce n'est pas le cas, n'hésitez pas à me dire ce que nous chargerons la semaine prochaine. Seuls le coated et le crinkle ne peuvent pas encore être chargés. Bien à vous, [Inline image URL : https://agristo.file.force.com/sfc/dist/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Png&versionId=068QD000003ZWL7&operationContext=DELIVERY&contentId=05TQD000004VmT3&page=0&d=/a/QD000000i75p/mBqmUTdidPGO_AlNUDe0j0v2oqxyHAXf4bJ4LtEAAr0&oid=00D7Q0000091K0D&dpt=null&viewId=?] Lauren De Baets Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 52 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Omar RHEFIR [orhefir@good-eats.ma] Sent: 23/05/2024 16:25 To: service@agristo.com Subject: Re: Coated crinkle urgent Nous somme dont le besoin de la 7x7 mm coated et crinckle dans un premier temps pour la f 10 ça peut attendre merci de faire votre mieux pour nous charger au moin la 7x7 mm la semaine prochaine c urgent svp. Merci [Inline image URL : https://marketpro.ma/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/Screenshot-2024-02-20-at-12.11.06.png] OMAR RHEFIR CEO https://goodeats.ma Le 23 mai 2024 à 15:14, Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> a écrit : ﻿ Bonjour Omar Veuillez envoyer tous votre mails à service@agristo.com svp. C'est avec regret que j'ai appris aujourd'hui qu'aucune production de les coated ne pourrait avoir lieu cette semaine. Il n'y a pas assez de film. Il faudra donc attendre encore quelques semaines avant que nous puissions produire les coated..... J'essaierai de vous faire savoir dès que possible la semaine exacte où ils seront prêts. Comme je vous l'ai indiqué précédemment, les 2,5 kg crinkle ne seront pas prêts à être chargés avant la semaine 25. Puisque la commande de 10 pal 7x7 + 10 pal coated ne peut être réalisée la semaine prochaine, devons-nous charger seulement le camion 10x10 + le conteneur 10x10 la semaine prochaine ? Subject: AG2572 - SHIPPING REQUEST
TextBody: Hello Thank you for your feedback. I have asked Remant to make these adaptations to the document. I will send you a revised version as soon as it's available.

Dear, Thank you for your interest in our company. To evaluate your request, we want to get a better picture of your company. Could you inform us and give some detailed information regarding: Do you already purchase frozen (potato) products? What is your experience in this field? If yes, with what brands or companies do you already work? Why do you wish to change? What volumes of fries per SKU do you do annually? Do you have your own distribution channel or partners? And warehouses? Could you provide me some more information concerning your company? What is your market strategy? Who are your customers? If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. With

Subject: RE: Asda Business Confirmation and Next Steps - Cheesy Mashed Potato
TextBody: Hi Marlies, I’m wondering what the latest is on the Cheddar cheese though – is it that they aren’t willing to provide the suppliers or there’s just no response from them at all? Unfortunately not, no. This has been picked up by Asda’s legal advisory team and they won’t let the specification progress until we demonstrate it is compliant with Asda’s policy requirements (regardless of whether this influences the artwork).

Subject: RE: Aldi Critical Path
TextBody: Hi Paula, my first Aldi project and I already had to pull some strings ;) But happy to do so! If you want to have product in depot by 02/09, we need to load W35. I have requested they put a production into W34 to give us as much time as possible. The printer is Segers & Balcaen for Aldi, and they are closed 1 week during summer holiday + 1 week with lower capacity. This is why ideally I would work with a FTP date of 28/06/2024. This is still tight, but we can make it work! Would Aldi be able to meet this FTP date? Shorten the period is very hard, as we are in the most challenging period of the year.

Subject: Bookings - POs 201/24 - 416/24 - 422/24 - 424/24 -  Copacol
TextBody: Dear Isadora, Below you will find the reply from Maersk Antwerp. Please urgently arrange this with Maersk Brazil, goods are planned to be loaded on Friday May 30th. Without correct PU depot, we cannot ship the orders. “ Dear Sandra, I'm checking with my colleagues to see why these were released wrongly. However, please note these bookings and customer belong to Brazil, for which it is the Brazil office who needs to amend them. I suggest your customer requests the necessary amendments to the Brazil office. Please remind them as well of the correct empty container release, as these releases are being done in the wrong depot and also requested too early. In these cases, containers weren't picked up last week, so the release is cancelled for the week after.

Dear, Thank you for your email and your interest in our company. To evaluate your request, we want to get a better picture of your company. Could you inform us and give some detailed information regarding: Do you already purchase frozen (potato) products? What is your experience in this field? If yes, with what brands or companies do you already work? Why do you wish to change? What volumes of fries per SKU do you do annually? Do you have your own distribution channel or partners? And warehouses? Could you provide me some more information concerning your company? Do you have a website? What is your market strategy? Who are your customers? Which country are you working in? If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. With

Merci de votre retour pour confirmation Restant à votre disposition pour toute information complémentaire Cordialement [cid:image005.png@01DAB11F.8722D380] Céline BOUYER Coordinatrice Achats 37 bis rue Saint Romain CS 52803 69373 LYON CEDEX 08 Tel : 06 20 61 81 76 Mail : celine.bouyer@lustucrufrais.fr<mailto:celine.bouyer@lustucrufrais.fr> De : Agristo Sales <sales@agristo.com<mailto:sales@agristo.com>> Envoyé : mercredi 3 avril 2024 09:31 À : Bouyer, Céline <celine.bouyer@lustucrufrais.fr<mailto:celine.bouyer@lustucrufrais.fr>> Objet : [EXTERNAL] demande Agristo Bonjour Mme Bouyer, Je vous remercie pour votre intérêt. Nous avons bien reçu vos données à travers notre site web. J'aurais quand-même besoin de quelques informations supplémentaires. J'ai regardé sur votre site web et j'ai vu que vous traitez surtout des produits fraiches? Nous fournissons que des produits à base de pomme de terre surgelés. si vous traitez aussi des PDT surgelés, puis-je vous demander de voir les questions ci-dessous, s'il vous plait? je vous remercie. - Avez-vous de l'expérience avec des PDT surgelés? - comme estimation de volume, vous avez mis 2000 ton par an. De quels produits s'agit-il? Surtout des frites ou aussi des spécialités (comme p.ex dauphines, duchesses, croquettes, ...) je vous remercie d'avance. bien à vous Ine Wille

Subject: Redesign Sadia Gourmet Film
TextBody: Hi All, To ensure we can continue packing skin-on fries in Harelbeke, I have developed a proposal. Attached, you will find the film without an address, but with the cooking instructions. My proposal is to use this film directly for the skin-on chips produced in Harelbeke. We will stop ordering film with the Wielsbeke address and switch to the film without an address once the current stock is depleted. The only change needed for the bag stamp is to add the country of origin, as shown in the attached example. The box label will still include the full address. Please let me know if this is acceptable for you. If not, we will not be able to produce any new skin-on chips for you. Thank you for your advise.

Subject: QA Harmonization of French Fries
TextBody: Hi Tereza, My apologies for the delay. Please find the completed file on the French fries included. As explained, Double AA for retail is the same grade as our article for foodservice (Metro chef articles) I have marked this in green. If you have any further questions, don't hesitate to ask.

Subject: Next production FF 616.001 in Branded foil
TextBody: Dag Rinus, ik verneem van onze masterplanning dat de initiële run inderdaad naar voor werd gebracht, en de nodige pallets dus werden geproduceerd. Op vandaag is dus geen bijkomende run in W24 meer voorzien. Kan u hiermee verder? Mvg, Michèle Michèle Vandenbroucke Technical Sales Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 44 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Agristo Service [service@agristo.com] Sent: 28/05/2024 13:55 To: rinustanis@farmfrites.com Subject: RE: Next production FF 616.001 in Branded foil Dag Rinus, klopt, afgelopen weekend (25/05) stonden een 100-tal pallets op de planning. Er werden, om precies te zijn, 111 pallets geproduceerd. Mvg, Michèle Michèle Vandenbroucke Technical Sales Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 44 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Rinus Tanis [rinustanis@farmfrites.com] Sent: 28/05/2024 11:37 To: service@agristo.com Subject: RE: Next production FF 616.001 in Branded foil Hi Michele, Vorige week begreep ik van Zoe dat er nog 168T op voorraad stond bij jullie. 345 pallets = 248T, hebben jullie al een eerste productie met branded folie gedaan? Groeten, Rinus

Subject: Re: PICKUP W20
TextBody: Bonjour, Je suis navré pour ce retard car c’est difficile de trouver des camions en ces périodes le 1er va arriver jeudi 7x7 le 2 eme f10 vendredi. Bien cordialement [https://marketpro.ma/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/Screenshot-2024-02-20-at-12.11.06.png] OMAR RHEFIR CEO https://goodeats.ma Le 28 mai 2024 à 15:19, Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> a écrit : ﻿ Bonjour Omar Le camion pour votre commande n'est pas encore arrivé ici. Un autre camion est prévu pour demain. Quand arriveront-ils tous les deux ? Veuillez respecter l'heure de votre réservation. Bien à vous, [image] Lauren De Baets Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 52 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Agristo Service [service@agristo.com] Sent: 24/05/2024 15:04 To: orhefir@good-eats.ma Subject: Re: Coated crinkle urgent Bonjour Omar Pour les 7x7 le premier créneau disponible est le 28/05 à 9h00, je l'ai donc réservé pour vous. <Image_2024-05-24_14-54-30.png> Pour le 10x10, votre réservation est le vendredi 31/05 à 11:00. <Image_2024-05-24_15-02-24.png> Bon weekend et bien à vous, [image] Lauren De Baets Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 52 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Omar RHEFIR [orhefir@good-eats.ma] Sent: 24/05/2024 10:51 To: service@agristo.com Subject: Re: Coated crinkle urgent Bonjour Lauren, 7x7 mm début de la semaine prochaine si possible lundi première heures, le second fin de semaine vendredi apr exemple. Pouvez-vous me dire svp par rapport la coated est ce qu’elle sera disponible pour chargement la s23. Bien à vous [https://marketpro.ma/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/Screenshot-2024-02-20-at-12.11.06.png] OMAR RHEFIR CEO https://goodeats.ma Le 24 mai 2024 à 09:31, Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> a écrit : ﻿ Bonjour Omar Pouvez-vous me dire quand vous voulez charger le camion 10x10 et le camion 7x7 ? Je pourrai alors réserver un créneau pour vous. Bien à vous, [image] Lauren De Baets Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 52 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Omar RHEFIR [orhefir@good-eats.ma] Sent: 23/05/2024 17:38 To: service@agristo.com Subject: Re: Coated crinkle urgent Parfait. Merci [https://marketpro.ma/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/Screenshot-2024-02-20-at-12.11.06.png] OMAR RHEFIR CEO https://goodeats.ma Le 23 mai 2024 à 15:49, Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> a écrit : ﻿ Bonjour Omar Nous avons également du stock pour charger 7x7 a semaine prochaine. Cela signifie-t-il que nous chargerons 3 commandes la semaine prochaine ? (1 conteneur 10x10, 1 camion 10x10 et 1 camion 7x7) ? Si ce n'est pas le cas, n'hésitez pas à me dire ce que nous chargerons la semaine prochaine. Seuls le coated et le crinkle ne peuvent pas encore être chargés. Bien à vous, [image] Lauren De Baets Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 52 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Omar RHEFIR [orhefir@good-eats.ma] Sent: 23/05/2024 16:25 To: service@agristo.com Subject: Re: Coated crinkle urgent Nous somme dont le besoin de la 7x7 mm coated et crinckle dans un premier temps pour la f 10 ça peut attendre merci de faire votre mieux pour nous charger au moin la 7x7 mm la semaine prochaine c urgent svp. Merci [https://marketpro.ma/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/Screenshot-2024-02-20-at-12.11.06.png] OMAR RHEFIR CEO https://goodeats.ma Le 23 mai 2024 à 15:14, Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> a écrit : ﻿ Bonjour Omar Veuillez envoyer tous votre mails à service@agristo.com svp. C'est avec regret que j'ai appris aujourd'hui qu'aucune production de les coated ne pourrait avoir lieu cette semaine. Il n'y a pas assez de film. Il faudra donc attendre encore quelques semaines avant que nous puissions produire les coated..... J'essaierai de vous faire savoir dès que possible la semaine exacte où ils seront prêts. Comme je vous l'ai indiqué précédemment, les 2,5 kg crinkle ne seront pas prêts à être chargés avant la semaine 25. Puisque la commande de 10 pal 7x7 + 10 pal coated ne peut être réalisée la semaine prochaine, devons-nous charger seulement le camion 10x10 + le conteneur 10x10 la semaine prochaine ? Le conteneur 10x10 a déjà une réservation. <Image_2024-05-23_16-14-10.png> Bien à vous, [image] Lauren De Baets Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 52 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Omar RHEFIR [orhefir@good-eats.ma] Sent: 23/05/2024 15:54 To: Lauren.DeBaets@agristo.com Subject: Re: Coated crinkle urgent Aimable relance dites moi juste svp quand la coated et la cri Cole seront prêt pour chargement. Merci d’avance [https://marketpro.ma/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/Screenshot-2024-02-20-at-12.11.06.png] OMAR RHEFIR CEO https://protect.checkpoint.com/v2/___https://goodeats.ma___.YzJlOmFncmlzdG86YzpvOjZjODU4MWUwZjg0Y2RhZWZiOTI3MmYxNzI0MjhlODdkOjY6MmQxYjo2ZTg2Yjk5NjdhYjc4NWNhNWJjZGU3NzA2NWIwOWQ5YmFhZWM5YzBkOTc2ODE1YzIzZjQ5NDMyN2Y4MjZhYTJmOnQ6VA Le 23 mai 2024 à 12:00, Omar RHEFIR <orhefir@good-eats.ma> a écrit : ﻿Bonjour Lauren, Pouvez vous m’envoyer la référence de chargement de la semaine prochaine ainsi me répondre sur la disponibilité de la coated 9x9 mm. Bien à vous [https://marketpro.ma/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/Screenshot-2024-02-20-at-12.11.06.png] OMAR RHEFIR CEO https://protect.checkpoint.com/v2/___https://goodeats.ma___.YzJlOmFncmlzdG86YzpvOjZjODU4MWUwZjg0Y2RhZWZiOTI3MmYxNzI0MjhlODdkOjY6MDgxNToxNjEzOTE1YWZmMDE1NzIyYmM5MDRlNGM0ZmNmNjY3OTY2YzAwMTQzNTJlZmVmZjc3NTE5NjlmZmViMDE0ZWQ1OnQ6VA Le 21 mai 2024 à 10:04, Omar RHEFIR <orhefir@good-eats.ma> a écrit : ﻿Bonjour Lauren, J’espère que vous allez bien. Subject: FW: Agristo Prices February 2024
TextBody: Hello Mohamed Our bank hasn't received the LC yet, so I don't have any further information from them yet. In the meantime I went over the LC myself and I already have the following remarks: - 59 -> Please change to AGRISTO NV (Instead of Agristo NO) - 43P: Partial Shipments -> Please change to allowed - 46A - 6. -> Inspection: These requirements are not workable for us. For other customers in Libya we do not appoint an inspection company ourselves. Please appoint an inspection company from your side that meets the necessary requirements, also please note that costs for this inspection will be for Hitun -47A 1 -> We send one set of original documents per courrier to the bank, not a set with duplicates via airmail. Please remove this line 10 -> What is meant by 3rd party documents? (is the chamber of commerce who issues the certificate of origin considered a 3rd party) 13 -> Please remove this, we do not sent original BL directly to the customer, only 2 originals to the bank Looking forward to hearing your feedback

Subject: PF-KOFF1394 - MPW Crinkle Cut Fries
TextBody: Hi Sean, I'm sorry to inform you we have a shortage of 4 pallets of the MPW Crinkle Cut Fries on your order mentiond in subject (scheduled for delivery on Friday, 31st of May). Can we add 4 pallets of another article to fill up the truck? Our apologies for the inconvenience!

Regards Muhammed Hashim From: Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> Sent: Monday, May 27, 2024 7:46 PM To: Muhammed Hashim <MHashim@iffco.com> Subject: Agristo Shipping schedule CAUTION: This email is originated from outside of IFFCO. Please don’t click on any links, open or download attachment/s, unless you are aware about the sender and content, as it can cause harm to your computer and company as well. In case of doubt, please report using “Report Phishing” button in your Outlook. Dear Hashim, Please find an updated shipping schedule attached. I have marked some notable changes in green. I noticed that MSC has transshipped the containers from "MSC MARGRIT" in Abu Dhabi and some are now arriving on "MSC DAR EL SALAAM" and others on "MSC ANNA" with different ETA Jebel Ali. This was an MSC decission, nothing Agristo could do about this.

Subject: WG: Iglo Transport Wielsbeke --> Reken wk 14/2024 Promotion Week 23
TextBody: Hello Anastasija, Below you’ll find PO for loading 8 trucks in the following next weeks. Pls try to load at least two on 30. of May. Subject: Kenya Food Expo
TextBody: [https://exportdir.com/covr.jpg] It is indeed our great pleasure to invite your esteemed organization to participate at our forthcoming specialized B2B trade show which is 12th Kenya Food Expo an Int'l Trade Show for the entire Food industry going to be held at Nairobi Kenya, starting from 1 - 3 September 2024. Kenya is the Gateway to reach East African Counties and it's 7th Biggest populated country in Africa. 120 Companies are Participating from 12 Countries Over 55% of visitors are potential buyers coming from: Ethiopia, Kenya, & Uganda. Product Profile:- Agro Commodities, Pulses, Flour, Food ingredients & chemicals, Food Packaging, FMCG, Beverages, Energy Drinks, Juices, Catering & Hospitality, Hygiene & Cleaning, Spices & Herbs, Home Appliances, Printing Machinery & Packaging Machinery Kenya Food Expo is a comprehensive and dynamic Food platform that celebrates the rich and diverse Food heritage of the East African region. This multifaceted initiative encompasses various components. Kenya Food Expo brings together chefs, food enthusiasts, industry professionals, and businesses from across East Africa and beyond. It showcases a vibrant array of Food experiences, from traditional dishes to modern gastronomic innovations. The expo serves as a platform for networking, knowledge exchange, and discovering the latest trends in the world. The Kenya Food Expo is an annual gathering of thought leaders, experts, and professionals. This Expo offers panel discussions, workshops, and seminars on a wide range of topics, including sustainable food practices, cultural preservation through cuisine etc. It provides a space for meaningful conversations and collaboration within the Food community. For 3 Days you will have direct access to quality attendees & a buyer profile unmatched by any other event industry. Kinya is the gateway to East African Countries and mostly neighboring landlocked countries such as Uganda, Rwanda, Burundi, Congo & Ethiopia depend on Kenya. COST OF SHELL STAND - US$ 375 sq.m 9 m2 ( 3m x 3m ) COST - US$ 375 x 9 = US$ 3375 12 m2 ( 4m x 3m ) COST - US$ 375 x 12 = US$ 4500 15 m2 ( 5m x 3m ) COST - US$ 375 x 15 = US$ 5625 18 m2 ( 6m x 3m ) COST - US$ 375 x 18 = US$ 6750 In the link you will find complete information such as; • Booking Application Form • Hotel Accommodation Packages specially designed with 4* & 5* Hotels • Useful Information & Products Profile • Floor Plan with available stand locations for your selection • Last year Participant's list • Photo Gallery enable you to understand how the stands will be look alike. Click Here To Download Booking Form <https://inexpos.us22.list-manage.com/track/click?u=741126994153c31e999db440f&id=c79711a283&e=3adc8060ec> Why to Invest in Kenya? 1. Macroeconomic Stability: Kenya is the third largest economy in Sub-Saharan Africa. Kenya's economy is projected to grow by 5.5 percent in 2023 and above 6.0 percent over the medium term. The Government's Bottom-Up Economic Transformation Agenda will reinforce this growth, which is geared toward an economic turnaround and inclusive growth. The economic stability will boost the investment climate in the country. 2. Infrastructural Development: Kenya has a well-developed physical infrastructural facility including, four international airports, an extensive road and railway network, a modern deep sea port at Mombasa and Lamu capable of handling liquidbulk and other containerized cargo, an expanding, liberalized energy sector, and digital telecommunication. 3. Availability of highly skilled human resource In Kenya, the proportion of the youth (18-34 years), constitutes 25%. The youthful skilled population economically implies, there are lots of potential workers for the future in various areas of investment and a wider market for goods meant for the youth. The flexibility and adaptability to high technological changes will easily make the goods and services produced locally highly competitive. This in turn will act as an enabler for investment because of the availability of skilled affordable labour. 5. Improved Governance: Kenya enjoys a stable political environment and investors are guaranteed repatriation of capital and profits, constitutional protection against expropriation, and investment guarantee against non-commercial risks: ICSID, MIGA, and ATIA. We look forward to welcome you at the show! For Booking & more info kindly contact: [https://www.inexpo.ae/images/direct.jpg] Mr. Inaam Salman Project Director INEXPO GROUP IN EXHIBITION ORG & MGMT LLC Dubai - UAE Mob: +971 - 55 - 5506187

Subject: Only one Remnant Space Available June 2024 Top Products for Summer
TextBody: It has been a few months since we have had any extra pages available. We have a few discounted remnant spaces available today for the upcoming June 2024 issue focused on Top Products for Summer! What is remnant space? Remnant space is extra unassigned space we have available in our monthly digital publication. These are full page advertisements and are discounted down to $2500 from $6500. This means a full page ad in the most current issue of Food & Beverage Magazine will only cost a total of $2500. This space doesn't come with the added value other packages may come with. Don't delay! These spaces get reserved very quickly. Here is a link to our other assets, including banners, buyer guides, and geo-targeting options: https://email.cloud2.secureclick.net/c/33536?id=6395820.1472.1.c593df11a77350d407d596ca07d19973 If there is any interest or question, please email me back right away We look forward to your interest, Michael Politz

Subject: Project & Business Financial Services.
TextBody: Hello, Thanks for connecting. I am Jean Clutch, I work as a financial investment consultant and currently represent a good Investment Group as their financial consultant. We are expanding our global presence by investing in viable projects across the globe. We will be willing to inject from $1,000,000 to $1 Billion and more in a viable project(s). We are focused on financing companies and individuals that require capital funding to expand and sustain growth. We grant our funding at a 3.95% ROI per annum for 10 years and 1months moratorium. If you have a viable project that needs funding, kindly revert back with your business plan and executive summary for our review and possible funding. I await your response. Sincerely yours Jean Clutch.

Subject: Agristo 319 Purchase Order
TextBody: Hi Elynn, good morning😊 I am attaching our purchase order # 1847, representing Agristo 319, which is schedule to sail onboard the vessel, CMA-CGM Fort De France, on Thursday, June 27th, 2024, and arrive in Kingston, Jamaica on Monday, July 15th , 2024 . We would appreciate if you would send us your order confirmation, confirming shipping details, also, a draft copy or copies, of the EUR.1 Certificates for our review, at your earliest convenience. Just a reminder to remove any mention of Holland or Netherlands from certain items on your invoices, as being the country of origin and replace it with EU. Please request that customs enter the container number, or the invoice number(s) on the EUR.1 Certificate’(s), as this is a requirement to qualify as a valid document in Jamaica. Stay safe, be blessed.

Subject: Agencia de promociones 360° COGNOS MKT Promotoría Compartida
TextBody: Hola , Gusto en saludarte, soy Karina y represento a Cognos MKT<https://www.cognosmkt.com/>, es una Agencia de Promociones 360° con presencia en todo México, contamos con más de 23 años de experiencia y estamos certificados como agencia especializada por la Secretaría del Trabajo (REPSE), AMAPRO, PWC, EY, Amedirh y Dun & Bradstreet. Ver video Cognos - ¿En qué somos los mejores?<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TlerXvwmOyk> Estoy interesada en ofrecerles nuestros servicios, principalmente Promotoría Compartida, "mercadeo de producto", te invito a ver un breve video del servicio, Ver video - Promotoría Compartida, Ver video - Promotoría Compartida<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f8rehLsAHm0>, Promotoría Compartida<https://compartida.cognosmkt.com/> Estamos en mas de 4,500 tiendas en 80 ciudades del país, todas las cadenas de autoservicios nacionales y regionales. Estamos también en las cadenas especializadas de Sodimac y The Home Depot con excelentes resultados. Servicios adicionales: * Planes de Mercadeo dedicados. * Planes de demostración, asesoría y venta. * Auditorias PDV y/o Mistery Shoper * Sampling * Centros de Canje * Actividades BTL: Edecanes y GO * Entre otros. Quedo atenta y mil gracias, ¡Saludos! [photo] Karina Trejo Aragón Ejecutiva Comercial de Trade Marketing

TextBody: Hi Emeil, Good day! Actually Beau already contacted me about our requirements and other details needed for the project but is quite unresponsive for a while now and series of follow up has been made both Email and WhatsApp. Let us have an online meeting to futher discuss our inquiry although Beau was able to summarize it with me last time. Hope we can have an avenue to discuss. Our website is oleofats.com<http://oleofats.com>. You may view it in the meantime. Looking forward to hear from you soonest! Thank you and Have a nice day! Best, ANDREA NICOLE S. ANDRADA Business Development and Technical Services Head Mobile/WhatsApp/Viber: +63 998 964 4033 https://oleofats.com/ On Tue, May 21, 2024 at 3:08 PM Agristo Sales <sales@agristo.com<mailto:sales@agristo.com>> wrote: Dear, Thank you for your email and your interest in our company. To evaluate your request, we want to get a better picture of your company. Could you inform us and give some detailed information regarding: * Do you already purchase frozen (potato) products? What is your experience in this field? * If yes, with what brands or companies do you already work? Why do you wish to change? * What volumes of fries per SKU do you do annually? * Do you have your own distribution channel or partners? And warehouses? * Could you provide me some more information concerning your company? Do you have a website? * What is your market strategy? Who are your customers? If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. With

Subject: 【IE士インタビュー：レゾナック 1】二社の強みを融合させ、化学の力で社会を変える！（生産革新プロフェショナルコース）
TextBody: 画像が表示されない場合はこちらをクリック<http://s1673224453.t.en25.com/e/es?s=1673224453&e=1167093&elqTrackId=20f49e6a7ff34e609f310c9929b85f0e&elq=6fa0d22950384ff8bece1b972f00e1d7&elqaid=36185&elqat=1> [http://img03.en25.com/EloquaImages/clients/JMAEloqua01/{5a6ff22d-9a06-49b5-943e-e00a5f7cd3bd}_img-logo.gif] 【IE士 インタビュー】レゾナック その１ 二社の強みを融合させ、化学の力で社会を変える！ 株式会社レゾナック モノづくり改革推進部 グローバル改善推進グループ 国内業務推進チーム プロフェッショナル 古室 松美（こむろ しょうみ）様に、 「生産革新プロフェッショナルコース」受講の背景やご活用についてお伺いしました。 （※敬称略、所属・役職は2024年4月16日時点） [http://img03.en25.com/EloquaImages/clients/JMAEloqua01/%7Baf3ce244-e846-414f-8dd8-e598400847fb%7D_Resonac_1.jpg] IT・IoT技術の進展により、昨今は海外の工場と国内のマザー工場をオンラインで繋ぎ、現地の困りごとを解決し得るマザー工場の改善事例や設備の姿を橋渡ししています。加えて、オンライン会議で現地から改善活動の進捗状況を報告してもらい、称賛したりコメントを送ったりしながら海外メンバーのモチベーション向上や改善活動のスキルアップを･･･ インタビュー記事はこちら 〉<https://s1673224453.t.en25.com/e/er?utm_campaign=3618536185240529_%E7%94%9F%E7%94%A3%E3%83%97%E3%83%AD%EF%BC%9A%E3%83%AC%E3%82%BE%E3%83%8A%E3%83%83%E3%82%AF_%E3%82%A4%E3%83%B3%E3%82%BF%E3%83%93%E3%83%A5%E3%83%BC%201&s=1673224453&lid=22511&elqTrackId=58612656BB0F7825EECA90679D8A78F0&elq=6fa0d22950384ff8bece1b972f00e1d7&elqaid=36185&elqat=1> IE士資格取得講座 [http://img03.en25.com/EloquaImages/clients/JMAEloqua01/%7B4d1aaadc-15f2-4675-a896-dbd9712c7f7b%7D_seisan-pro_logo.png]<https://s1673224453.t.en25.com/e/er?utm_campaign=3618536185240529_%E7%94%9F%E7%94%A3%E3%83%97%E3%83%AD%EF%BC%9A%E3%83%AC%E3%82%BE%E3%83%8A%E3%83%83%E3%82%AF_%E3%82%A4%E3%83%B3%E3%82%BF%E3%83%93%E3%83%A5%E3%83%BC%201&s=1673224453&lid=5372&elqTrackId=7F8EBFDD31ADB803CACB56EA49567F2A&elq=6fa0d22950384ff8bece1b972f00e1d7&elqaid=36185&elqat=1> 参加お申込み受付中！ お得な早期割引は6月28日まで！ ◆バリューチェン全体を俯瞰したものづくりを推進したい… ◆現場サイドから、デジタル化を見極め促進する人材が欲しい… ◆全社・グローバルで生産革新ができる人材を育てたい… 上記のようなお悩みや課題には、IEのプロ『IE士』育成をお勧めします！ 本コースの詳細はこちら 〉<https://jma-iepro.com/?utm_campaign=3618536185240529_%E7%94%9F%E7%94%A3%E3%83%97%E3%83%AD%EF%BC%9A%E3%83%AC%E3%82%BE%E3%83%8A%E3%83%83%E3%82%AF_%E3%82%A4%E3%83%B3%E3%82%BF%E3%83%93%E3%83%A5%E3%83%BC%201&elqTrackId=01B6D42635EC6B5F9FA39FC06418ABCA&elq=6fa0d22950384ff8bece1b972f00e1d7&elqaid=36185&elqat=1&elqCampaignId=23190> お問い合わせはこちら 〉<https://s1673224453.t.en25.com/e/er?utm_campaign=3618536185240529_%E7%94%9F%E7%94%A3%E3%83%97%E3%83%AD%EF%BC%9A%E3%83%AC%E3%82%BE%E3%83%8A%E3%83%83%E3%82%AF_%E3%82%A4%E3%83%B3%E3%82%BF%E3%83%93%E3%83%A5%E3%83%BC%201&s=1673224453&lid=2752&elqTrackId=0F552C095661A787CF186EAB909CDD9C&elq=6fa0d22950384ff8bece1b972f00e1d7&elqaid=36185&elqat=1> お申込みはこちら 〉<https://s1673224453.t.en25.com/e/er?utm_campaign=3618536185240529_%E7%94%9F%E7%94%A3%E3%83%97%E3%83%AD%EF%BC%9A%E3%83%AC%E3%82%BE%E3%83%8A%E3%83%83%E3%82%AF_%E3%82%A4%E3%83%B3%E3%82%BF%E3%83%93%E3%83%A5%E3%83%BC%201&s=1673224453&lid=2104&elqTrackId=2D7168C45FD869D504EC0C53B0FAE609&elq=6fa0d22950384ff8bece1b972f00e1d7&elqaid=36185&elqat=1> 本コースの特長 ①ものづくり・現場の原理原則をIEから学ぶ IEの概念論だけでなく、実践的かつベーシックな改善手法を体系的に学び直します。 現場経験のみでIEを学習したことのない方も安心してご活用いただけます。 ②単なる工程改善（部分最適）から生産革新（全体最適）の視野へと広げる 生産・製造だけでなく、開発・購買・物流などサプライチェーン全体を俯瞰した知識や、 経営・現場の管理・評価手法やマネジメント、競合との差別化等の経営戦略なども学び、 目先の現場改善ではなく、工場そして企業全体の改善活動へ視野を広げます。 ③社内のIEを指導・育成するキーパーソンに必要な教育内容を学ぶ IE基礎テクニックの教え方や、すぐに使える分析シート等を収録した IE教育の虎の巻「IEインストラクターマニュアル」は、 社内研修でも利用でき、講師としてのスキルアップが図れます。 『IE士資格』取得ができるのは、生産革新プロフェッショナルコースだけ 50年に渡る開催実績と750名以上のIE士を輩出してきた伝統あるコースです。 開 催 概 要 会 期： 2024年10月7日（月）～12月13日（金） 全7回 参加方法： 会場参加 および オンラインLIVE受講 の組み合わせ 会場参加は、日本能率協会研修室での開催を予定 ⇒ 他の参加者・講師との直接交流により、情報・視野が格段に拡がります！ オンラインLIVE受講は、Zoomを使用 ⇒ 移動・出張を伴わず、勤務先・ご自宅から参加いただけます！ ※各回の日時、参加方法は下記ご参照ください。 ⇒ https://jma-iepro.com/schedule<https://s1673224453.t.en25.com/e/er?utm_campaign=3618536185240529_%E7%94%9F%E7%94%A3%E3%83%97%E3%83%AD%EF%BC%9A%E3%83%AC%E3%82%BE%E3%83%8A%E3%83%83%E3%82%AF_%E3%82%A4%E3%83%B3%E3%82%BF%E3%83%93%E3%83%A5%E3%83%BC%201&s=1673224453&lid=10676&elqTrackId=32D9092546C5585D4C51F0B611B771BF&elq=6fa0d22950384ff8bece1b972f00e1d7&elqaid=36185&elqat=1> 参加料（税込）：※お得な早期割引（6月28日まで）実施中！ 【通常料金】 日本能率協会法人会員：693,000円/人 会員外：748,000円/人 のところ 【早期割引料金（6月28日まで）】 日本能率協会法人会員：671,000円/人 会員外：726,000円/人 参加対象： ●生産・製造部門のマネジャー、リーダーとその候補者 ●社内研修講師、ものづくり教育担当 ◆このような課題・ニーズをお持ちの方がご参加しています ・現場でIEを実践できる人材を育てたい ・IEの知識を学ぶだけでなく、社内に伝えていきたい ・デジタル人材を育成する前に、ものづくりの「原理原則」を学びたい ・勘・コツ・経験の職人作業を脱し、生産体系を確立したい ・「SCM/ECMの改善・連携のヒント」を体系的に学びたい ・工場全体の目標数値や指標を見直し、改善・改革・投資の立案と実行をしたい ・IEを学び、海外拠点の生産性向上を目指したい ◆主な参加部門（実績） 生産企画、生産技術、生産管理、品質保証、品質管理、生産革新推進、 研修センター、ものづくり塾、SCM、物流、購買、資材… など ※その他の部署、また製造業以外の企業からもご参加があります ※過去の参加企業はこちら⇒ https://jma-iepro.com/program<https://s1673224453.t.en25.com/e/er?utm_campaign=3618536185240529_%E7%94%9F%E7%94%A3%E3%83%97%E3%83%AD%EF%BC%9A%E3%83%AC%E3%82%BE%E3%83%8A%E3%83%83%E3%82%AF_%E3%82%A4%E3%83%B3%E3%82%BF%E3%83%93%E3%83%A5%E3%83%BC%201&s=1673224453&lid=8450&elqTrackId=186337B4BE60BACA04AF5A544D0A5889&elq=6fa0d22950384ff8bece1b972f00e1d7&elqaid=36185&elqat=1> ◆過去の参加者の声（抜粋） ・IEの各種知識・手法を自分の中で体系的に整理できたのが良かった。 ・単なる工程改善だけはなく『サプライチェーン全体で改革する』ということを学べた。 ・「現場の効率性を評価するための各ツールを学ぶ」という以上に 「マネジメントの部分で必要とされること」に多くの気づきがあった。 ・企業のトップ、これからを担う人材は絶対に受けたほうが良いと思った。 ・新しい学びを得られただけでなく、他社との人脈もできた。 『IE士』の資格認定 当研修を修了し、所定の成績を修めた方は「IE士」の資格を認定・付与されます。 さらに、参加特典として ◆オンラインセミナー無料受講つき（コース終了まで何度でも受講可） ・IE基礎テクニック習得コース（約24時間分） ご参照⇒ https://www.jma-online.com/course/course01/<https://s1673224453.t.en25.com/e/er?utm_campaign=3618536185240529_%E7%94%9F%E7%94%A3%E3%83%97%E3%83%AD%EF%BC%9A%E3%83%AC%E3%82%BE%E3%83%8A%E3%83%83%E3%82%AF_%E3%82%A4%E3%83%B3%E3%82%BF%E3%83%93%E3%83%A5%E3%83%BC%201&s=1673224453&lid=4246&elqTrackId=9E08379C80BFA289DA1608D0BC22B030&elq=6fa0d22950384ff8bece1b972f00e1d7&elqaid=36185&elqat=1> ・IE基礎分析手法習得セミナー（約2.5時間分） ご参照⇒ https://www.jma-online.com/course/course14/<https://www.jma-online.com/course/course14/?utm_campaign=3618536185240529_%E7%94%9F%E7%94%A3%E3%83%97%E3%83%AD%EF%BC%9A%E3%83%AC%E3%82%BE%E3%83%8A%E3%83%83%E3%82%AF_%E3%82%A4%E3%83%B3%E3%82%BF%E3%83%93%E3%83%A5%E3%83%BC%201&elqTrackId=ED384DE820E69A7C587AF0AF05269449&elq=6fa0d22950384ff8bece1b972f00e1d7&elqaid=36185&elqat=1&elqCampaignId=23190> 本コースの詳細はこちら 〉<https://jma-iepro.com/?utm_campaign=3618536185240529_%E7%94%9F%E7%94%A3%E3%83%97%E3%83%AD%EF%BC%9A%E3%83%AC%E3%82%BE%E3%83%8A%E3%83%83%E3%82%AF_%E3%82%A4%E3%83%B3%E3%82%BF%E3%83%93%E3%83%A5%E3%83%BC%201&elqTrackId=10DE01F513F1098C8DB6D90F8CC4C59B&elq=6fa0d22950384ff8bece1b972f00e1d7&elqaid=36185&elqat=1&elqCampaignId=23190> 〉<https://s1673224453.t.en25.com/e/er?utm_campaign=3618536185240529_%E7%94%9F%E7%94%A3%E3%83%97%E3%83%AD%EF%BC%9A%E3%83%AC%E3%82%BE%E3%83%8A%E3%83%83%E3%82%AF_%E3%82%A4%E3%83%B3%E3%82%BF%E3%83%93%E3%83%A5%E3%83%BC%201&s=1673224453&lid=2104&elqTrackId=487D80D2CDF4DBADE549E211B78940FC&elq=6fa0d22950384ff8bece1b972f00e1d7&elqaid=36185&elqat=1> Subject: RAS Leadership Symposium at Restaurant Asia ️
TextBody: Secure your spots with the early bird tickets today! View this email in your browser<https://mailchi.mp/iegasia/sigep-ra-eventoverview-12695223?e=ac08d24560> [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/756ced41-c46c-1417-788d-5be7973fc715.png]<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=625c833091&e=ac08d24560> [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/a7745531-1294-3570-b109-101344de71fb.png]<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=0447da7a52&e=ac08d24560> Dear Moustafa Dessouki, Join us at the RAS Leadership Symposium for a day filled with insightful activities led by Will Scott, the Author & Founder of The Culture Fix®. Will has helped hundreds of businesses fulfil their corporate culture dreams. Secure your spot today with the exclusive Earlybird Promo - https://www.eventbrite.sg/e/904444396537?aff=oddtdtcreator Key in RASEARLYBIRD at checkout for 10% OFF (Valid until 31May) *Bundle pricings for 8pax (full table) and 4pax (half-table) are available. [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/113c1cd3-1a79-c809-b3a6-be31bc773086.png]<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=a7ad80ef3c&e=ac08d24560> [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/39f44b48-d5eb-76fa-d1e8-3489a765d2f7.png]<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=ad0c1b1f2d&e=ac08d24560> An excellent opportunity to bring your business to new heights by building the right culture and improving the workspace environment. Learn how to: * Secure a 10X return in the first 12 months and increase your employee NPS score by 30%-50% * Understand the difference between having core values and having a valued culture * Empower everyone to handle difficult conversations and create the healthiest environment * Know how to hire and unhire™ for cultural alignment * Create the perfect culture communication tool * Teach your team to live your values and make decisions the way you would * Discover the simple joy of leading with values In great cultures, your people: ✅ Are more accountable and motivated to fight for the company’s vision; ✅ Make decisions the same way leadership would; ✅ Are more engaged and drive your profitability. We highly encourage you to sign up with your leadership team for the best results! [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/113c1cd3-1a79-c809-b3a6-be31bc773086.png]<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=a95e159a12&e=ac08d24560> Exclusive for International Travellers Announcing Our Official Travel & Accommodation Partners Enjoy up to 11% off* your ticket when you fly with our Official Airlines [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/a1a871e4-7036-8402-ac1c-3d67f2a34d7f.png]<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=de28e0b083&e=ac08d24560> PROMO CODE: SIGEPA24<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=e01797c730&e=ac08d24560> *Terms and conditions apply. In the meantime we have produced enough pallets for order 240402A (6 pallets, best before 27/05/2026) and we should be able to load the container as requested in your latestest update as mentioned below. These pallets will have Country of Origin Belgium. Subject: RE: updated order 240402C
TextBody: Hi Jeroen, In past email as attached, it was mentioned that there were stock of crinkle cut for PO 240402A and PO 240402C with BBD 11.04.2025. Please advise if you mean there’s no old stock for these 2 orders and have to wait for new production. Thank you, Joseph From: Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> Sent: Monday, May 27, 2024 7:53 PM To: josephtseng@glfoods.com.tw Cc: glfoods@ms45.hinet.net; glimp@glfoods.com.tw; beau.declerck@agristo.com Subject: RE: Good Land_re-revised order 240402A Hi Joseph, I have modified your order to the first option and I hope we can still adjust to these quantities. I will adjust to the other options when needed to keep the shipment on the same vessel. I must say it's difficult to change the order so close to the shipment, but we are right at the production weeks of the Rustic fries (312035) and the Crinkle Cut fries (313324), so maybe we can make it work. I'm hoping we can still deliver as requested by you. The shoestring fries are alraedy in stock, so where needed I can use these to fill the container. We currently have no stock on the Crinckle Cut fries, so I'm hoping we have enough base materials to provide the 6 pallets requested. I will keep you posted as soon as I have final production numbers.

Subject: Blocked orders
TextBody: Hello Ilse, Can you please unblock the loadings planned for May 31? Delay in payment is connected to EDI issues I mentioned this week – we don’t know yet why your invoices aren’t delivered via EDI. All these invoices need to be upload from emails in pdf form what causes a longer time for processing invoices. I’m working with IT to solve this case asap. I have confirmation from finance that all invoices will be paid as soon as they will appear in the system (this week). As loadings in May 31 are the last in location Tilburg we won’t have possibility to send trucks to load them in June. Agreement between our companies was to move all loadings to Wielsbeke from June 1st so our carriers also have new agreements from June 1st. I will appreciate your support.

Nuestra capacidad actual es la siguiente: 1 contenedor en junio 1 contenedor en julio 2 contenedores en agosto Para septiembre, no podemos añadir más contenedores porque ya tenemos los tres contenedores de ARO programados. Dado que tenemos capacidad limitada, solo podemos cargar volumen en línea con el volumen promedio desde octubre, que es de aproximadamente 30 toneladas por mes. ¿Podrías reenviar los pedidos conforme a lo que menciono arriba? Puedes llamar a Anton si necesitas más información. Muchas gracias por tu comprensión. Saludos, Alexia​​​​ Lacombe Customer Service Officer Export T +32 56 54 10 44 Ridder de Ghellinckstraat 9 • 8710 Wielsbeke • Belgium • www.agristo.com

Subject: Spontane sollicitatie als jobstudent
TextBody: Geachte heer/mevrouw, Mijn naam is Lisette Lecluse en ik ben momenteel student Bedrijfskunde aan de Vrije Universiteit Brussel (VUB). Ik vroeg me af of er bij Agristo mogelijkheden zijn voor een vakantiejob waar ik mijn theoretische kennis in de praktijk kan brengen. Ik heb al een diploma behaald in Global Business Management en Design Thinking and Innovation. Ik ben vooral geïnteresseerd in functies binnen uw bedrijf, met name in de afdelingen marketing, sales, supply chain, accounting & finance of R&D. Dankzij mijn opleiding en eerdere studies voel ik me bekwaam om waardevol werk te leveren. Mijn beschikbaarheid is van 22 juli tot en met 30 augustus van dit jaar. Tijdens deze periode kan ik flexibel worden ingezet en ben ik bereid verschillende taken en verantwoordelijkheden op me te nemen. Ik kijk er echt naar uit om mijn vaardigheden en kennis toe te passen binnen Agristo en bij te dragen aan uw organisatie. Graag zou ik de gelegenheid krijgen om mijn profiel persoonlijk toe te lichten. Ik geloof sterk dat ik een waardevolle bijdrage kan leveren aan uw team en ik ben enthousiast om mijn motivatie verder te bespreken. In de bijlage vindt u mijn curriculum vitae voor een gedetailleerder overzicht van mijn achtergrond en ervaringen. Ik waardeer uw tijd en overweging enorm. Met vriendelijke groet, Lisette Lecluse

Subject: Vind nu de perfecte jobstudent voor de zomervakantie!
TextBody: Je hebt nog drie dagen om van onze korting (75%) te genieten! ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ Beste Agristo, Heb jij al onbeperkte toegang tot onze database van jobstudenten in jouw regio? Dit is jouw laatste kans om te profiteren van 75% korting! De komende dagen zijn cruciaal, want dit is hét moment dat studenten actief op zoek zijn naar een studentenjob voor de zomer. Waar wacht je nog op? Wat kunnen we voor jou betekenen? Onze (web)applicatie maakt het eenvoudig om de perfecte (job)studenten te vinden. Met ons matchingsalgoritme selecteren we de studenten die het beste aansluiten bij jullie voorkeuren. Je kan het volledige profiel bekijken, inclusief hun interesses, voorkeuren en competenties. Interessante kandidaten kan je een gepersonaliseerd contactverzoek sturen, waarna je meteen ontdekt of er een wederzijdse match is. Waarom kiezen voor onze (web)applicatie? * Directe toegang tot een grote database aan stagiairs, jobstudenten en recent afgestudeerden die klaar staan om aan de slag te gaan. * Een indrukwekkende responsgraad van 82% op onze contactverzoeken. * Meer dan de helft van de studenten beantwoordt de contactverzoeken positief en volgt er een (sollicitatie)gesprek. Wat is het aanbod? Ga voor 31/05/2024 aan de slag en ontvang 75% korting op onze licentie die maandelijks opzegbaar is! Voor slechts €75 per maand heb je onbeperkte toegang tot onze (web)applicatie. We hopen zo een win-win situatie te creëren voor zowel de studenten als jouw organisatie. Klaar om te beginnen? Maak vandaag nog jouw profiel aan en gebruik de voucher voor de korting (JMEI75). Wacht niet te lang, want deze unieke kans verdwijnt snel! Je hebt nog maar 3 dagen om te beslissen. Ga nu aan de slag!<https://wefynd.cmail19.com/t/y-l-mcdya-hlookhlu-r/>

Just wanted to double check to avoid problems afterwards :) Concerning the orders below, I was able to confirm them, however only for loadng from 24/6 onwards. 755871 755872 755778 755870 756082 756214 756215 I just sent an seperate emails with a list of all the PO's of which we had to postpone the loading. I'm also taking this up with Sophie and the production planning team to see if there is anything we can try to have the product available sooner.

Subject: 123182 stock shortage
TextBody: Hi Michael, Maria It seems we were able to produce less of article 315227 (steakhouse) then we thought. Instead of 14 pallets, we were able to make 11. Can we replace the 3 additional missing pallets with 314457 (TCF 12x12) also? We have 13 pallets of that article. Our apologies for the inconvenience.

Could I replace this with one pal. of another article? If so, which article would you prefer? Thank you in advance. ​​​​​​​

Subject: 新規事業としての結婚相談所
TextBody: ― 婚活ビジネス説明会 ― いつもお世話になります。 新規事業として低リスクでスタートできる “ 結婚相談所ビジネス ” の説明会ご案内につきご連絡差し上げました。 設備投資もいらず、本業のスタッフが兼務も できるので、個人の独立開業だけでなく 新規事業として取り組む企業も増えています。 説明会では詳しいビジネスモデルや 収益性などをお伝えします。 新たな事業をお考えの方は この機会に是非ご参加ください。 ▼ セミナー詳細情報＆申込はこちら ▼ https://ibj-kekkon.site/2300/ 5月・6月度 全国 各会場開催 ――――――――――――――――――――― ◇ 婚活ビジネス 説明会 設備投資ゼロ／本業スタッフ兼務 ミニマムスタートできる「 結婚相談所 」 ◇ 主催 株式会社IBJ (加盟相談所数:4,125社／登録会員数:85,854名) ◇ 5月・6月度 会場 北海道 青森県／秋田県／山形県／福島県 東京都／神奈川県／茨城県／栃木県／長野県 石川県／福井県 愛知県／岐阜県 大阪府 岡山県／広島県／鳥取県／島根県 徳島県／香川県 福岡県／熊本県／大分県／宮崎県／鹿児島県 ※ 全日程・会場とも内容は同じです。 ※ 日程・会場の詳細情報は セミナーページにてご確認ください。 ▼ セミナー詳細情報＆申込はこちら ▼ https://ibj-kekkon.site/2300/ ――――――――――――――――――――― 参加費： 無料 対 象： 法人／個人 どちらでも可能です ――――――――――――――――――――― ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━ 株式会社IBJ セミナー事務局 東京都新宿区西新宿1-23-7 新宿ファーストウエスト 12F ‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥‥ 本メールのご不要な方には大変 ご迷惑をおかけいたしました。 今後、ご案内が不要な方は、お手数ですが 「配信不要」とご返信いただくか、 下記URLより配信停止登録を承っておりますので お手続きをお願いいたします。 https://ibj-kekkon.site/mail/ ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

Subject: Documents for driver
TextBody: Hello Serhii Could you please send me the signed and stamped CMR by your warehouse? We need it as proof to our customs. Thank you in advance Liesbeth Soubry Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 59 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Service Request [service@agristo.com] Sent: 4/04/2024 13:17 To: sbayuka@gmail.com Subject: RE: Documents for driver Hello Serhii Attached the full set of documents, signed and stamped: - Invoice - Certificate of origin - Packing list - Export document - Health certificate Certificate of origin and Health certificate were not given to the driver. Do we need to send you the originals, or are the copies attached enough? Regarding the CMR, I don't understand. It is the same document as for the last shipment, so how come the CMR is not ok now? Unfortunately there is nothing we can do to change it. This is an automatich document.

Subject: Purchase Order No PUR960502 from JJ Food Service Limited
TextBody: Please find attached our purchase order PUR960502 . The purchase order can be confirmed by clicking on the following link and using the below details. Please be aware that the Vendor Self Service Portal (VSS) is not compatible with Microsoft Internet Explorer 11 (IE11) or older versions. You will need to use an up-to-date browser to use our portal such as Chrome, Safari, Edge and Firefox. https://vss.jjfoodservice.com/login/PUR960502/701815 Purchase order : PUR960502 PIN: 701815 Please be aware that Fraudsters are using the name JJ Food Service to fraudulently source goods.Suppliers to JJ Food Service be especially aware. * JJ Food Service will never order goods without a period of negotiation and a formal trading agreement would be issued requiring you to supply product details etc. * Never send goods if the address is different to our published distribution sites. * Only dispatch upon receipt of a formal order and be aware that we do not collect our orders from your premises. * Only dispatch if formal confirmation of your order is sent, after using the recognised booking-in procedure, which will be given to you via the JJ Purchasing team. If in any doubt please bring to our urgent attention. Contact: 00 44 1992 701710 P.S. To open the attached file, Adobe Acrobat Reader version 7 or greater must be installed on the system. TextBody: Hi Moustafa, It will be very difficult to provide a proof of the war risk surcharges which Oh-sung is asking for. I guess the war risk surcharges are also not exact and come with an average? Over the past few months, the war surchages have evolved as well. If we need to provide evidence, then we should check with Remant if they can send us the invoice per container which they have received from the shipping company but this will be very time consuming to check this for all containers (December, January, February loadings). Can't they just accept these costs?

Subject: Registration is now open to join our NEW Mediterranean Food & Beverage event in November 2024
TextBody: Dear AGRISTO nv, I hope you're doing well. I'm reaching out to you from Stamegna Retail Management with an exciting opportunity for your company to enter or expand in the European market with focus on the mediterranean area. We invite your team to our NEW Stamegna Network - Mediterranean Food & Beverage event that will be held in the beautiful city of Athens! This event is perfect for Food & Beverage manufacturers looking to connect with key retailers and distributors in the mediterranean mass market segment. Event Details: * Date: November 10-11, 2024 * Location: Athens, Greece * Venue: 5 star Hotel (to be confirmed) Benefits of Participation: * Pre-scheduled 20-minute meetings with Mediterranean, East & Central European, North African and Middle Eastern retail and distribution leaders. * Opportunity to set up 15 to 22 tailored meetings based on your preferences. * Exclusive access to expand your brand's presence in the Mediterranean area. With over 16 years of experience, our team at Stamegna Retail Management ensures successful B2B connections. This is a unique chance to explore new opportunities and grow your business in Europe. For more details and to reserve your spot, reply to this email or contact us at this email or WhatsApp. We look forward to partnering with you at this event.

Subject: VIETNAM - EU | TRUSTANA | 32-Day Pure Rail Freight
TextBody: Dear AGRISTO NV | ANUGA, Please be introduced to Trustana - a rail logistics expert based in Vietnam. Asia-Europe trade is facing the issue of container crunch and slot squeeze. Hence, Trustana Vietnam is thrilled to offer our swift and reliable rail freight solution. Here’s what sets us apart: Space commitment: Yeb, we can guarantee your cargo space on our trains to tackle the above issues Optimal transit time: Our recent train from Vietnam to Europe took only 32 days, ensuring timely delivery Stable and frequent schedule: With our frequent rail schedule, you can expect predictable departures and on-time deliveries. Door-to-door deliveries: We handle everything from pick-up to final destination with trucking and other value-added services Global cargo tracking device: Peace of mind comes from monitoring your shipment's journey. All thanks to our GPS device! Please see the attached infographic for more details. Feel free to contact me if you have any questions or concerns. Thank you, – Dara Duong Marketing Team Lead | (+84) 376 573 835 dara.duong@trustana.vn | trustana.vn TRUSTANA VIET NAM CO., LTD

Subject: Agristo Nazareth Orders for Wisbech.xlsx
TextBody: Hi Aamir, Becky, First of all apologies for the delay in getting back to you. I was in a meeting the whole morning. We have well received the updated files yesterday and this morning. We are checking them at this moment and will get back to you shortly. In the meantime I have also been able to get a closer look on the situation with the croquettes. After making the puzzle, I acutally have some goods news for you: We do no longer have stock on our article 307905, but have already produced our new article 314309. The difference between the two articles is an updated recipe (new breadcrumb). The codes did not change though, so I believe we can easily add the new article to your orders. We have 36 pallets on stock, so please do not hesitate to let me know on what order we can foresee this article. Thank you very much.

Subject: FW: Agristo Tilburg - Boroughbrigde
TextBody: Good morning I’m sorry, but we tried to load earlier, goods were only ready to load yesterday afternoon. We really tried to ship. What we can offer you to do if the goods are really urgent is to ship them from Zeebrugge into Hull instead of Ghent. Then we can deliver as from Friday 18h. Would that be a help for you? Met vriendelijke groeten, Salutations distinguées,

Subject: Purchase Order No PUR960491 from JJ Food Service Limited
TextBody: Please find attached our purchase order PUR960491 . The purchase order can be confirmed by clicking on the following link and using the below details. Please be aware that the Vendor Self Service Portal (VSS) is not compatible with Microsoft Internet Explorer 11 (IE11) or older versions. You will need to use an up-to-date browser to use our portal such as Chrome, Safari, Edge and Firefox. https://vss.jjfoodservice.com/login/PUR960491/900414 Purchase order : PUR960491 PIN: 900414 Please be aware that Fraudsters are using the name JJ Food Service to fraudulently source goods.Suppliers to JJ Food Service be especially aware. * JJ Food Service will never order goods without a period of negotiation and a formal trading agreement would be issued requiring you to supply product details etc. * Never send goods if the address is different to our published distribution sites. * Only dispatch upon receipt of a formal order and be aware that we do not collect our orders from your premises. * Only dispatch if formal confirmation of your order is sent, after using the recognised booking-in procedure, which will be given to you via the JJ Purchasing team. If in any doubt please bring to our urgent attention. Contact: 00 44 1992 701710 P.S. To open the attached file, Adobe Acrobat Reader version 7 or greater must be installed on the system. Please note that any URLs or links shared by Coupang are provided for reference purposes only as per your request to confirm product information and that such information may be subject to real-time changes. [Warning]: This email originated from an external source. Do not open links or attachments unless you know the content is safe. ?? [경고]: 본 이메일은 회사 외부에서 유입되었습니다. 내용이 안전한지 확인하기 전까지는 링크나 첨부파일을 열지 마십시오. Dear Kendrik, Unfortunately, for your order GS-009922 who will be loaded next week 05.06, we have a shortage of 1 pal of item 45407432 (Single coated shoestring potato 2kg). Would it be possible to replace with 1 pallet of item 15648513 (Skin-on Crunch Potato 2,5kg) of your order GS-010034, please? Please advise, thanks in advance.

TextBody: Bonjour Nansifou, Votre commande ORCUN est libérée. Merci de libérer la commande ORCUN svp. Restant à votre disposition. Subject: Order flakes + return order
TextBody: Hello, Do you have any information for me please, about the below? Many thanks. BR Vanessa Ronsse Customer Service Officer UK & Europe P +32 56 54 11 85 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Agristo Service [service@agristo.com] Sent: 28/05/2024 12:44 To: geral@gac.pt Subject: Order flakes + return order Hello Mrs. Callimaci, Let me introduce myself first. I'm Vanessa and I will be your dedicated customer service officer, from now on. I was informed, that goods need to come back to Agristo, as they are non-conform. Can you please advise me your order number and the total amount of PAL for the goods that need to come back? Once received, I can arrange the return order, which I would like to do this week if possible. As Agristo, we want to deliver you a good quality product. Friday 31/5 we have new production planned for you. We can load a full truck on Monday 3/6, to be delivered at your warehouse next Thursday or Friday at latest. Can I use order 222/2024 as attached for the delivery next week? Please advise. Looking forward to our cooperation.

Subject: POTATO EUROPE 2024 - Uw offerte
TextBody: Beste, Met de komende editie van beurs POTATO EUROPE 2024 in het vooruitzicht bied ik u graag onze expertise als ervaren standenbouwer met meer dan 25 jaar ervaring. Kunnen wij voor u een vrijblijvende offerte opmaken, voor het ontwerp en de realisatie van uw beursstand? Hoe wij u als standenbouwer kunnen ontlasten: 1. Creatieve en op maat gemaakte beursstanden: Van standaard tot naadloos maatwerk, ons getalenteerde ontwerpteam zet uw visie omzetten in een uniek en indrukwekkend 3D-ontwerp. 2. Korte responstijden en snelle interventies: Dankzij ons sterk team op de beursvloer kunnen wij snel reageren en indien nodig snelle interventies leveren. 3. Jarenlange ervaring op vakbeurzen in de Benelux: Wij zijn al meer dan 25 jaar actief in de standenbouw voor de B2B sector en hebben een solide reputatie opgebouwd, zowel in België, Nederland, maar ook de omliggende buurlanden. Wij kennen de hallen en hebben de nodige technische kennis voor een vlotte afhandeling. 4. Kwaliteit en professionaliteit: Ons team combineert kennis en ervaren, en zorgt ervoor dat uw stand voldoet aan de hoogste normen zodat uw bedrijf opvalt tussen de concurrentie. Ik ben ervan overtuigd dat wij met onze expertise de ideale partner zijn om voor uw bedrijf een opvallende én effectieve beursstand te bouwen. Om een creatief en vrijblijvend voorstel te kunnen samenstellen, mag u simpelweg mijn email beantwoorden met de afmetingen van uw stand en eventuele belangrijke zaken waar we rekening mee moeten houden. Dan ga ik meteen voor u aan de slag. Benieuwd naar wie we zijn en wat we doen? Neem een kijkje in ons portfolio via onze website gm-productions.be<https://gm-productions.odoo.accomodata.net/r/lmR/m/27313>. Ik sta klaar om uw vragen te beantwoorden, ideeën te bespreken en een geweldige beursstand te realiseren. PS: Onze vroegboekkorting loopt nog tot 21 juni 2024. Wilt u dus graag nog van dit voordeel genieten, reageer dan snel! :) Vriendelijke groeten, Nele T +32 (0)51 24 53 30<tel:+32%20(0)51%2024%2053%2030>

The following national holidays in Denmark will affect your deadline for returning the Goods Ready confirmation: Pick up outside DK: National Holiday 5/6: Pick up Thursday 6/6 - Deadline Monday 3/6 before 2.00 PM CET Pick up Friday 7/6 - Deadline Tuesday 4/6 before 2.00 PM CET Pick up in DK: National Holiday 9/5: Pick up Thursday 6/6 - Deadline Tuesday 4/6 before 12.00 PM CET If the order contains dangerous goods, the necessay documents and UN number(s) must be sent to the carrier or transport@coop.dk. Subject: TR: Facture 0090610207
TextBody: Bonjour, La commande 24001794 devait normalement contenir 29 palettes, mais en raison d'un problème technique avec une grue dans notre entrepôt, seulement 26 palettes ont pu être chargées (les 3 autres palettes étaient bloquées dans notre grue). Le prix de transport n'était donc plus correct, car ce prix avait été introduit pour 29 palettes. J'ai donc annulé la facture initiale (ce qui explique la note de crédit) et j'ai créé une nouvelle facture pour un prix de transport de 26 palettes. Cordialement, Zoë Zoë Feys Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 67 --------------- Original Message ---------------
