Questa evoluzione promette di rivoluzionare il settore industriale, ponendo l’accento su una produzione che valorizza tanto l’efficienza quanto l’elemento ambientale. Caratteristiche dell'Industria 5.0 [https://47ad2.img.ag.d.sendibm3.com/im/sh/quedeSXkwvF4.jpg?u=2BpAyz2gMiWncgNhtz4mY3cmvauvLoshMY]<https://47ad2.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/7nVU1aA2nfwFS2CMt1liw28XjpMmUMc/qFr4ROCdwEsD> ­ ECOSOSTENIBILITÀ ­ L’ecosostenibilità è un concetto cardine dell’Industria 5.0, che invita le imprese a minimizzare l’impatto ecologico. ­ [https://47ad2.img.ag.d.sendibm3.com/im/sh/AiAg6KpHvx8K.jpg?u=2BpAyz2gMiWnciGhQUNl7I4pHuj5iJfRJ4]<https://47ad2.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/7nVU1aA2nfy8RYhfrb0AyOSLuBrZEJ8/tPtup3g--xrS> ­ ECONOMIA CIRCOLARE ­ Questo nuovo modello industriale incoraggia l’uso di risorse rinnovabili e l’adozione di un’economia circolare. ­ [https://47ad2.img.ag.d.sendibm3.com/im/sh/NkvPI3ytxlvM.jpg?u=2BpAyz2gMiWnck9gwzgjgWWreEXG4oSBFa]<https://47ad2.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/7nVU1aA2ng01R5CyqAEd0kmA4YMLyFe/GYG-AKJ1uBmu> ­ INNOVAZIONE TECNOLOGICA ­ Le tecnologie come l’Intelligenza Artificiale, la robotica di nuova generazione, l’Internet delle Cose (IoT) e la Realtà Aumentata sono le protagoniste. ­ [https://47ad2.img.ag.d.sendibm3.com/im/sh/T8UDzXrirGay.jpg?u=2BpAyz2gMiWncm2gTUziFkyu0YLQRJEvC6]<https://47ad2.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/7nVU1aA2ng1uQbiHojT5375yEur8iCA/fn3MQAeFwlWZ> ­ BINOMIO UOMO-MACCHINA ­ La sinergia tra l’uomo e i robot collaborativi, mira a unire la destrezza e l’intelligenza dell’uomo con la costanza e la precisione delle macchine. ­ SCOPRI DI PIU'<https://47ad2.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/7nVU1aA2ng3nQ8DanIhX5TPmPHLvS8g/Pp0Izaw7Euyi> Cerchi una soluzione personalizzata?

Subject: We have received your goods ready confirmation of PO 4506216846
TextBody: Dear NV Agristo, We have received your goods ready confirmation of PO 4506216846 with the following information: Purchase Order 4506216846 The order is ready for pick up at the orignal handover date, 2024-06-07 00:00:00: Yes New handover date - requested by the supplier (if any) The order can be picked up at the address stated in the order, NL, 5047 SX, Tilburg, Heieinde 10: Yes New permanent adress (if any) Loading reference and portal (if needed) 460462 Total weight in kg 12207 Temperature control required Yes - NB! If the item is not already registered as temperature-regulated goods via Coop's VI form (Item registration form), please contact your Category Planner/Buyer to coordinate the necessary master data. Number of euro-/cheppallets Number of half pallets Number of quarter pallets Number of extra pallets (due to different batches) Number of pallet spaces 33 Loading instructions to the hauler Please contact order_ready@coop.dk for questions or comments regarding the goods ready confirmation.

Subject: TFC Fries Dimer
TextBody: Hello Michael We would like to remind you that we still have 45 pallets of article 312085 (the TCF 7x7 fries for Dimer). These pallets have an expiry date between August and September of 2024. Please inform us on what to do with these pallets. Will they still be ordered? Are they okay to load? We need to know.

Subject: Updated Tesco COP
TextBody: Hi All Please see attached a new updated Tesco COP for Micro Testing. Tesco have confirmed the below Key Dates Audits that Start before 01.06.24 – Any audits before this date must be able to demonstrate that they have the policy (Attached) and have a plan to review and implement before 29.07.24 – No NC or Recommendation should be issued 01.06.24 - Any audits from this date must be able to demonstrate that they have the policy (Attached) and have a plan to review and implement before 29.07.24, actions will be as follows * Plan in place to implement but not yet actioned – Recommendation in report * No plan in place to action and or new policy not downloaded by site – Minor NC to be raised 29.07.24 – Go live, from this date you must have dome the following – Normal audit procedures will be in place that could dependant on Severity give you a Minor, Makor or Critical NC if the below are not implemented * Reviewed the procedure and implemented the increased testing into your testing matrix * All products produced on or after the 29.07.24 must be tested against the new COP * You need to have accepted the new document, by signing and returning the above I will collate a list for the relevant TM of acceptance * You need to update all your specs, however the Tesco TM`s are aware the this may not from their point all be actioned by 29.07.24 so there as is an agreement as below (in addition to the above): * Send an email with what updates required to @Joanne Surley <mailto:joanne.surley@fullersfoods.com> and Myself including the suites, tests and limits you are now operating to * @Joanne Surley <mailto:joanne.surley@fullersfoods.com> will start to work on these with the TM and we will share a plan for activation * Any audit that is due from 29.07.24 will be expected to have an updated live spec so will prioritise those with audits in July, Aug and September If you have an audit NC raised that is outside of the above please let myself or Stuart know during the audit and we can see if we can assist via the TM Please can you return the attached signed ASAP, any question please let me know Many Thanks Carl Subject: MPW Tater Tots
TextBody: Hi Sean, As I had feared, I have been informed that we have no capacity on our hash brown line to be able to increase the volume of the MPW Tater Tots to 7/8 pallets per week. Subject: Explore more opportunities when you book in advance
TextBody: If you are having trouble reading this email, read the online version<https://app.campaign.rxjapan.jp/e/es?s=12511217&e=1875965&elqTrackId=49bd961a5a0d4c9aab8b5d9dc0d7e78f&elq=a0aad9311dcc4d85a956e35721077796&elqaid=1688085&elqat=1>. [Japan Int’l Food & Beverage Expo (JFEX)]<https://app.campaign.rxjapan.jp/e/er?utm_campaign=JFEX2024_Visit_Consi_Acqui_E_29_May_7_Appointment_System&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Eloqua&querytoken=COC4lwHnZKlu0TMu%2BkeVUfvfjXa0Llp4MKd%2F1BBp96m8OW795C33DSwPKbr6d%2FZsz4iWkEqMgYoDqiCRC38bog%3D%3D&s=12511217&lid=33693&elqTrackId=2DA5EC67CC2BE34876F519A98ABD99BA&elq=a0aad9311dcc4d85a956e35721077796&elqaid=1688085&elqat=1> Jun 19-21, 2024 at Tokyo Big Sight Dear Steven, Exciting perks are coming your way! On top of the benefits you’ll get from attending this year’s JFEX<https://app.campaign.rxjapan.jp/e/er?utm_campaign=JFEX2024_Visit_Consi_Acqui_E_29_May_7_Appointment_System&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Eloqua&querytoken=COC4lwHnZKlu0TMu%2BkeVUfvfjXa0Llp4MKd%2F1BBp96m8OW795C33DSwPKbr6d%2FZsz4iWkEqMgYoDqiCRC38bog%3D%3D&s=12511217&lid=33693&elqTrackId=93BE52429797A50F8A4A73317A7DDF92&elq=a0aad9311dcc4d85a956e35721077796&elqaid=1688085&elqat=1>, we’re making your show experience better with the enhanced appointment booking system. This innovation connects exhibitors and attendees with ease. To maximise your time, you can now schedule appointments with exhibitors in advance. How To Use Appointment Booking System * Search the exhibitors/exhibits * Request onsite meeting appointments with exhibitors * Send messages to exhibitors Remember, though, that the use of the appointment booking system requires a registered visitor badge. So, don’t forget to sign up and experience JFEX Summer with ease and excitement! Subject: Order flakes + return order
TextBody: Hi Vanessa: First, we would like to thank you for your email, and nice to meet you. I would also like to take this opportunity to introduce myself. My name is Sérgio Gomes, and I am the General Manager of GAC. Gloria Callimaci is traveling and asked me to give you an answer. As for the attached purchase order, it must be canceled, and a new one made. Colleague Filipe Vieira, copied on this email, will place the new purchase order, and send it to you. Regarding the pallets, we have in stock of non-conforming product, there are a total of 26 pallets. We leave the caveat that there is a product that can be returned by some customers. Then we are waiting for the product to be sent according to the specifications we sent and that conformity, on Monday as stated, but, if possible, send us a photo of the production carried out and a sample of the same product by fast courier (Fedex, DHL...), for us to analyze and test. Thanks. Melhores cumprimentos/

Subject: Remittance advice
TextBody: Hi Wais, Olive, Could you please urgently send me a remittance for at least 93,000 GBP? We have 3 orders (PF-KOFF1389, PF-KOFF1388 and PF-KOFF1389) that are scheduled for loading tomorrow, but cannot be loaded for the moment as they are blocked by our credit control. Shall we set up a call to discuss the way forward? Personally, I have the feeling that we are constantly pushing against the limit and that this causes daily follow-up and stress. I would like to tackle this structurally, so that this is more workable for both parties and we don't have to deal with this every day. Looking forward to hearing how you feel about this. Thanks a lot!

Subject: Contract 07052024
TextBody: Hello Ali In the meantime I have gone over the draft, please note my remarks: F59 -> Name and Address: AGRISTO nv Ridder de Ghellinckstraat 9 8710 WIELSBEKE BELGIUM Account: BE53738417044953 F41D: Available with -> bank should be KBC Belgium F43P: Should be set to allowed F44C: please change latest date of shipment to July 15th 2024 to allow us enough time to arrange the shipment F45A: Please change CFR Shanghai to CFR Karachi, as agreed F46A A. -> 8 copies of the invoice is excessive, we issue 5 as an absolute maximum, please change this B. -> please remove "Clean" and just state "Shipped on board" Freight to collect -> change to "Freight prepaid" C. -> Since insurance is not arranged by Agristo, please have this document removed from the required documents list E. 3.SHELF LIFE CERTIFICATE (a)HEALTH CERTIFICATE (b)HALAL CERTIFICATE -> what is meant by this? We issue a health certificate and a halal certificate -> is a shelf life certificate a separate document? is this really needed? F. Is it possible to remove the validty for 6 months and change it to 3 months? H. Please remove this statemen, we will not paste packing list and invoice on each pallet F47A: +1: HS code will be noted as follows: "1105200000" +6. Can the requirement about the shelf life be removed? +8. Please remove this -> we will not attached packing list and invoice to the pallets +17. Please specify the date +18. Please clarify 3rd party documents -> health certificate, certificate of origin and Halal certificate are not issued by Agristo Please let me know your feedback

Subject: Orders 547.002
TextBody: Goede namiddag Marjolein, Bedankt voor uw orders. Op dit moment hebben wij 31 pallets op stock van uw referentie 547.002. De volgende productie is voorzien in week 24. De reden hiervoor is dat wij de productie van kroketten zoveel als mogelijk bundelen, waardoor er maar om de zoveel weken kroketten kunnen geproduceerd worden. U kan order 4500099077 dus volgende week komen afhalen, maar dan met 31 pallets in plaats van 33. Order 4500099102 wenst u af te halen in week 24, maar het artikel wordt pas in die week opnieuw geproduceerd en op dit moment kon de productieplanner mij nog niet zeggen of de productie aan het begin of het einde van die week zou vallen. De productie heeft mij dus gevraagd of u uw order kan aanpassen naar laden week 25. Is dit oké voor u? Alvast bedankt voor uw begrip! Met vriendelijke groeten, Zoë Zoë Feys Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 67 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Marjolein Abbo [marjoleinabbo@farmfrites.com] Sent: 29/05/2024 09:30 To: service@agristo.com Subject: FW: Orders 547.002 Goedemorgen, Zie de bijlages voor juni. Met vriendelijke groeten, Marjolein Abbo Supply Chain Planner

Subject: Remittance advice
TextBody: Good Afternoon Pieter, Please could you advise what our current credit limit is with Agristo ,as we are paying you in 30 days from invoice date, and you are also holding 700k on account. I have just sent across the remittances as per your request. Thanks Olive. [cid:image067169.png@10B697E8.92696AA6] Olive Tanner​​​​ Director T: 0207 720 9012 E: olive.tanner@premierfoodswholesale.com<mailto:Olive.Tanner@premierfoodswholesale.com> W: premierfoodswholesale.com<https://premierfoodswholesale.com/> D36‑49 New Covent Garden Market Nine Elms Lane, Battersea, London SW8 5JJ [Facebook]<https://en-gb.facebook.com/premierfoodswholesale> [Linkedin]<https://www.linkedin.com/company/premier-fruits-ltd/?originalSubdomain=uk> [Instagram]<https://www.instagram.com/premierfoodswholesale/?hl=en> [Twitter]<https://mobile.twitter.com/PFoodsWholesale> [www.premierfoodswholesale.com]<https://premierfoodswholesale.com/> From: Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> Date: Wednesday, 29 May 2024 at 14:34 To: Wais Mohammad <Wais.Mohammad@premierfoodswholesale.com>, Olive Tanner <Olive.Tanner@premierfoodswholesale.com> Subject: Remittance advice Hi Wais, Olive, Could you please urgently send me a remittance for at least 93,000 GBP? We have 3 orders (PF-KOFF1389, PF-KOFF1388 and PF-KOFF1389) that are scheduled for loading tomorrow, but cannot be loaded for the moment as they are blocked by our credit control. Shall we set up a call to discuss the way forward? Personally, I have the feeling that we are constantly pushing against the limit and that this causes daily follow-up and stress. I would like to tackle this structurally, so that this is more workable for both parties and we don't have to deal with this every day. Looking forward to hearing how you feel about this. Thanks a lot!

I am afraid we will have to keep it as it is for the moment (2 pallets per week) until the new season. Thank you for your understanding!

TextBody: Bonjour, Je reviens de nouveau vers vous. Je viens de recevoir la communication que les commandes ne seront que chargées demain soir et ne peuvent être livrées que lundi à partir de 8:00. Livraison demain n'est donc pas faisable et il y a un nouveau retard. Merci de donner un nouveu rendez-vous et nos excuses pour l'inconvénient. Subject: Thank you for showing interest in the MSM trading platform
TextBody: We believe that our platform could greatly benefit you as it is designed to provide buyers with access to macadamias of the highest standards. View this email in your browser<https://us8.campaign-archive.com/?e=982dc5b08e&i=*|ITERATION_UNIQUE_ID|*&u=6729522a8581934ce98e49011&id=0081085a7d> [Logo]<https://macsm.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=6729522a8581934ce98e49011&id=66f0edf7e5&e=982dc5b08e&i=a410c697e7> Thank you for considering the digital platform to enhance your macadamia trading experience I hope this email finds you well. My name is Gerhard Potgieter, and I am reaching out to you on behalf of the Macadamia Sales Market (MSM). We are excited to introduce you to the possibilities offered by the MSM Trading Platform for Macadamias. We are grateful your interest in macadamia trading after our first correspondence, and believe that our platform could greatly benefit you and your business. The MSM Trading Platform is designed to provide buyers like you with access to macadamias of the highest standards, all while ensuring transparency, safety, and efficiency in every transaction. The platform consolidates products of similar quality and give buyers access to a much larger footprint of macadamia kernels and products, and transparency with regards to disclosure of price, volumes and trends. With our platform, you can: * Access a diverse range of macadamia products and styles with stringent quality standards. * Facilitate transactions securely through our transparent and user-friendly interface. * Gain insights into market trends and pricing to make informed purchasing decisions. * Enjoy a seamless experience from procurement to delivery, with dedicated support every step of the way. We understand that not all buyers purchase macadamias in bulk quantities. If you prefer smaller LCL quantities, there’s the option to consolidate smaller consignments. You can also bring this platform to the attention of your bulk import suppliers, and so benefit from their bulk-break-consignments. By utilising the MSM platform, you can streamline your transactions, access a wider network of trusted suppliers, and ensure continuity of supply. I would like to extend an invitation to you or your relevant procurement team/supplier to join us for a discussion on the prospects of the MSM Macadamia Trading Platform at your earliest convenience. During this meeting, we can provide you with a detailed demonstration of our platform and address any questions or concerns you may have. Please let us know a date and time that works best for you, and we will ensure to accommodate your schedule accordingly. Alternatively, if you have any immediate inquiries or would like more information before the meeting, feel free to reach out to us directly at gerhard@macsm.org<mailto:gerhard@macsm.org?subject=null&body=null>. Alternatively, please visit our website at macsm.org<https://macsm.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=6729522a8581934ce98e49011&id=e458595d05&e=982dc5b08e&i=a410c697e7> for more information. Book a Meeting<https://macsm.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=6729522a8581934ce98e49011&id=f85aaf0fe1&e=982dc5b08e&i=a410c697e7> We look forward to the opportunity to connect with you and explore the potential of the MSM Trading Platform for Macadamias. Thank you for considering our invitation.

Subject: Shipment Rejection Reason by China Customs
TextBody: Hello, If your shipments are rejected by China Customs or could not be declared, there are usually several main causes, 1, No GACC number: If your company hasn’t applied for a GACC number, then you cannot export food products to mainland China. 2, Incorrect HS code: When you filed application for GACC registration, you used the incorrect HS code. Please be aware you cannot make declaration using HS code and products that do not match. 3, Wrong category: You identified the wrong categories when you applied for a GACC number, either general application categories or special application categories. 4, Not register on China Custom Website: If you are first time to export products to China, you need also register on China Custom Website, otherwise, you cannot clear China Custom. Application for GACC registration can be complicated with many details and potential pitfalls that will affect your food exports to mainland China. We have helped many food industry clients with exporting their products and their GACC registrations. Please do not hesitate to contact us If you like to utilize our expertise. Best wishes, Jane Wang 北京环资伟业管理咨询有限公司 Beijing One-Stop Consultation Co., Ltd. 电话/Tel: 0086-10-53656050 手机/Mob: 0086-13671359868 (同微信） WhatsApp: +86-17600330769 邮件/E-mail: info@onestop-consultation.com 网址/Website: www.onestop-consultation.com

Subject: 【Food Taipei Sponsorship】Chiayi City Food Distributor Matchmaking Meeting
TextBody: Read this email in your browser Dear Company, Greetings, We are Special-Creative International Design Company and are currently collaborating with the Chiayi City Government to promote the excellence of local food products. As part of our efforts, we are excited to inform you about our upcoming initiative at the 2024 Taipei International Food Show. Our objective is to assemble a diverse array of local businesses to participate in a food distributor matchmaking event during the food show. We aim to showcase at least fifteen businesses and numerous products, with a focus on highlighting several key items endorsed by Chiayi City. These exhibitors represent esteemed establishments with significant expertise in both product manufacturing and sales. We are eager to recommend these exceptional businesses to your esteemed company and anticipate the opportunity to explore potential collaborations with you. Moreover, we cordially invite your company to partake in the Chiayi City Food Distributor Matchmaking Event, an integral component of this year's food show. For your convenience, please find attached a list detailing the brands and products expected to be showcased. We extend a sincere invitation for your company to join us at the food distributor matchmaking meeting, orchestrated by the Chiayi City Government in conjunction with the international food exhibition. This meeting serves as a platform to introduce our high-quality, locally distinctive products from Chiayi City to your esteemed organization. Below are the specifics of the food distributor matchmaking meeting: Chiayi City Food Distributor Matchmaking Meeting Meeting Venue: ELITE room and CHATTER Room, GRAND HILAI TAIPEI Meeting Time: June 26, 2024, at 2:30 PM Address: 6th Floor, No. 168, Jingmao 1st Road, Nangang District, Taipei City RSVP: https://forms.gle/zrjJ1kP7Ar8fYdty5 Kindly complete the RSVP form provided in the link above if you are interested in participating. Thank you for considering our invitation, and we eagerly anticipate your involvement. Warm

Subject: Re: Customized your own brand Outdoor Beach umbrella & Parasol
TextBody: Hello Business Development manager, I’d share the following Beach umbrella we’ve done for your reference. For more details please find the attached videos. If you need any further details, please let us know. Hope we cross paths in the future. [说明: cid:image001.jpg@01DA930A.8EA53A40][说明: cid:image002.jpg@01DA930A.8EA53A40][说明: cid:image008.jpg@01DA930D.241A6B20][说明: cid:image007.jpg@01DA930A.8EA53A40][说明: cid:image010.jpg@01DA930A.8EA53A40] [说明: cid:image012.jpg@01DA930A.8EA53A40] [说明: cid:image011.jpg@01DA930D.241A6B20] [说明: cid:image009.jpg@01DA930B.C99501C0] [说明: cid:image013.jpg@01DA930D.241A6B20] Outdoor Beach umbrella & Parasol Improve customer satisfaction: Providing beach umbrellas and parasols for customers to use can increase their comfort and satisfaction at the business premises. Customers can rest, dine or relax in a shady area and enjoy the pleasant outdoor environment, which helps improve customers' favorability towards the business. Increase customer flow: Businesses providing beach umbrellas and parasols can become one of the highlights to attract customers. In hot weather, many people will look for places that provide shade and shade. If businesses can provide such convenience, they may attract more customers to come and spend money. Extend their stay: Providing beach umbrellas and parasols can make customers more willing to stay in your business’s outdoor areas. In a cool and comfortable environment, customers may spend more or engage in other activities, extending their stay at the merchant, thereby increasing consumption opportunities. Increase sales opportunities: Merchants can set up additional sales points or promotional activities around beach umbrellas and parasols. For example, set up drink stalls, snack stalls or product display areas under the umbrella. Customers can also conveniently purchase the merchant's products or services while using the umbrella, increasing sales opportunities. Enhance brand image: Providing beach umbrellas and parasols can show that businesses care about customer comfort and satisfaction, thereby enhancing brand image. Customers will perceive the merchant as paying attention to details and customer experience, have a positive impression of the merchant, and are likely to recommend the merchant to others. Thanks &

Subject: FW: Seasons Pride Frozen Hash Browns 1kg 823471
TextBody: Hi team, Thank you for your support to reschedule the Hash Browns while ALDI adjusts the revised loading details for the new reference. After discussion with Michelle last night and ALDI today, we are aligned on the next steps: * Week 24 – artwork to be finalised and released to printer * Week 31 – latest we can receive film from printer (allow 2 additional weeks due to Summer Holiday closures) * Week 32 – reschedule production (this could be pushed forward or backward for a week, depending on capacity) * Week 33 – Send first production samples to ALDI * Week 35 – Loading date [cid:image002.png@01DAB288.19D3FAB0] Packaging: * I have calculated that the MOQ equals approx. 1.6 weeks of stock (see below for working) * We need to produce enough stock in existing packaging to cover loadings until week 34, as first production cases of new packaging need to be supplied to ALDI/ * This is a soft cutover, however we should still try and manage as tightly as possible to ensure minimal packaging stock remaining [cid:image015.png@01DAB291.0E7128B0] Please let me know if you have any questions or feedback.

View it in your browser.<https://campaign-statistics.com/browser_preview/QU1Q4L6UXm_LwXCh> [Image description] Good Day agristo ﻿ How to make Saffron Rice [Image description] To make saffron rice, you will need the following ingredients: - 1 cup of long-grain white rice - 2 cups of water or chicken broth - A pinch of saffron threads - Salt to taste - 2 tablespoons of butter or olive oil Here's how you can make saffron rice: 1. Rinse the rice in a fine-mesh strainer under cold water until the water runs clear. This helps remove excess starch and prevents the rice from becoming sticky. 2. In a small bowl, crush the saffron threads with your fingers and then pour 2-3 tablespoons of hot water over the saffron. Let it steep for about 10-15 minutes to release its flavor and color. 3. In a medium-sized saucepan, heat the butter or olive oil over medium heat. Add the rinsed rice and sauté for 2-3 minutes until the rice becomes slightly translucent. 4. Pour in the water or chicken broth, along with the saffron and its soaking liquid. Add salt to taste. 5. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low, cover the saucepan with a lid, and let it simmer for about 15-20 minutes or until the rice is tender and has absorbed all the liquid. 6. Once the rice is cooked, fluff it with a fork to separate the grains and distribute the saffron evenly. Your saffron rice is now ready to be served as a flavorful and aromatic side dish! Saffron Rice<https://campaign-statistics.com/link_click/QU1Q4L6UXm_LwXCh/52ddbc3b72abe47cff4df4a0057a9e37> IF YOU ARE NOT INTERESTED TO RECEIVE EMAIL REPLY ONLY NUMBER < 1 >, , Also you can click on below tab. unsubscribe<https://campaign-statistics.com/unsubscribe/QU1Q4L6UXm_LwXCh> PRODUCT LIST Saffron [Image description] [Image description] [Image description] [Image description] [Image description] [Image description] [Image description] [Image description] Pistachios [Image description] Raisins [Image description] Ddried fruit [Image description] Dried rose buds [Image description] Cumin [Image description] TOP GEM Company is a key supplier of agricultural products, active mainly in Saffron, Pistachios and other spice & nuts. ﻿

Subject: Detention/demurrage costs returns Kafuzan
TextBody: Hi Shani, OK. Discussed with Pieter. Go ahead with the credit in XLS once returned and we will discuss further. Sarah Detailleur Customer Experience Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 65 M + 0498 74 13 14 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Shani [shani@kafuzan.co.il] Sent: 23/05/2024 14:04 To: service@agristo.com Subject: RE: Detention/demurrage costs 7 return containers Kafuzan Hi Sarha, All cost is being forwarded from our customs agent to Zior while we are doing export. since the containers are still in the imported containers this should be calculated as well, please advise. Please note that when we complete the export, we also calculate all import cost and send to you in excel files for credit request. import cost, storage, transportation, demurrage, etc. except the customs we paid, which we claim it back from the customs office.

Subject: Nobredo / Vessel info / Week 21 21
TextBody: Hi Isadora, Don’t forget we are keeping stock for them since months now… I am quite disappointed in this customer I must say… First hassles with Hapag, we switch them to MSC on our costs and now we are even punished more by storage costs. There is about 10 containers to go.

Subject: E-commerce Domination at WORLDEF
TextBody: Scroll down to read more Can't read or see images? View this email in a browser<https://wabe-zgph.campaign-view.com/ua/viewinbrowser?od=3ze6181cf770f60bba74456d061ec9db2215f22c194fbc4437f3248c25715d4d3c&rd=1a0952b6b10183&sd=1a0952b6b0dec1&n=11699e4c25c57f2&mrd=1a0952b6b0dead&m=1> [talabat sourcing day] Dear , Calling All E-commerce Powerhouses: Showcase Your Brilliance at WORLDEF Istanbul! Attention e-commerce focused manufacturers and suppliers! This is your golden opportunity to shine at WORLDEF Istanbul, happening June 6th-8th at the Istanbul Yenikapı Event Area! WORLDEF, in collaboration with Wabel, is your one-stop shop to dominate the e-commerce landscape! Showcase your cutting-edge production and supply power to a network of potential customers eager to expand their online offerings. Here's what awaits you: * Connect with a sea of engaged buyers: Forge lucrative partnerships that propel your brand to the top! * Unleash your e-commerce expertise: Network with industry leaders and fellow innovators. * Gain a global edge: WORLDEF is your platform to conquer new markets! Spots are filling up fast! Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your e-commerce presence! Subject: Montélimar/Agristo - Cdes 71706719 71706720 – Litige
TextBody: Bonjour, Le soucis c’est que la réception passe de Nuit à partir du mois de juin, je peux vous proposer du coup le 04/06 à 00h57 Est-ce Ok pour vous ? Bonne Journée à vous. Cordialement, [cid:image001.png@01DAB26E.8D84D390]https://teams.microsoft.com/l/chat/0/0?users=quentin.hugues@mousquetaires.com [cid:image002.png@01DAB26E.8D84D390] De : Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> Envoyé : mercredi 29 mai 2024 16:47 À : Quentin HUGUES <quentin.hugues@mousquetaires.com> Cc : alain.coulmeau@gxo.com Objet : RE: Montélimar/Agristo - Cdes 71706719 71706720 – Litige Bonjour, Je reviens de nouveau vers vous. Je viens de recevoir la communication que les commandes ne seront que chargées demain soir et ne peuvent être livrées que lundi à partir de 8:00. Livraison demain n'est donc pas faisable et il y a un nouveau retard. Merci de donner un nouveu rendez-vous et nos excuses pour l'inconvénient. Cdt, Sarah [image] Sarah Detailleur Customer Experience Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 65 M + 0498 74 13 14 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Quentin HUGUES [quentin.hugues@mousquetaires.com] Sent: 29/05/2024 13:04 To: service@agristo.com<mailto:service@agristo.com> Cc: alain.coulmeau@gxo.com<mailto:alain.coulmeau@gxo.com> Subject: RE: Montélimar/Agristo - Cdes 71706719 71706720 – Litige Bonjour, Livraison demain à 10h58 pour ces 2 Cdes du coup. TextBody: Click here<https://s418238.t.en25.com/e/es?s=418238&e=159345&elqTrackId=9a42947388a84f0e8d0267239dc5ddbd&elq=acbdf34e5789433c985daf635dd78db1&elqaid=2937&elqat=1> to view the online version [https://img07.en25.com/EloquaImages/clients/InformaAsia01/%7Bd74f3fe1-17b0-484d-aafe-ac4479ff1913%7D_2010_edm_headers-4b.jpg]<https://s418238.t.en25.com/e/er?s=418238&lid=10368&elqTrackId=2C70EF7A547917FC15C5BAD060869C74&elq=acbdf34e5789433c985daf635dd78db1&elqaid=2937&elqat=1> 0 0 Saladplate Media Kit and Branding Opportunities Dear 0, We are thrilled to introduce to you our latest media kit, designed to provide comprehensive information about Saladplate<https://s418238.t.en25.com/e/er?s=418238&lid=10368&elqTrackId=F2D8191F8041D0A37A23D692F9950ACB&elq=acbdf34e5789433c985daf635dd78db1&elqaid=2937&elqat=1> and its offerings. Beemsterboer Food Traders Tel: +310226396408 Mobiel: +31610946168 Mail: william@jpb.nl<mailto:william@jpb.nl> J.P. Beemsterboer Food Traders Op al onze aanbiedingen, op alle aan ons en door ons gegeven opdrachten en op alle met ons gesloten overeenkomsten zijn uitsluitend van toepassing onze Algemene Handelsvoorwaarden (hierna aangeduid als “AHV”), gedeponeerd bij de Griffie van de Rechtbank Noord-Holland, locatie Alkmaar op 3 september 2013. Kopieën van onze AHV liggen ter inzage bij ons op kantoor en kopieën daarvan zullen op uw eerste verzoek kosteloos aan u worden gestuurd. Voorts kunnen onze AHV kosteloos worden gedownload van onze website: www.beemsterboer.nl. Wij wijzen algemene voorwaarden gehanteerd door onze contractuele wederpartij uitdrukkelijk van de hand, tenzij wij uitdrukkelijk schriftelijk de toepasselijkheid van algemene voorwaarden van onze contractuele wederpartij hebben aanvaard. All our quotations, all orders placed with and by us and all contracts concluded with us are exclusively subject to Dutch law and our General Conditions of Trade (hereafter also referred to as “GCT”) including the The Hague Uncitral Arbitration Clause included therein (article 4.3), filed with the court Noord-Holland, location Alkmaar on 3 September 2013. Copies of our GCT are available at our offices and will be sent to you free of charge at your first request. Moreover, our GCT can be downloaded from our website: www.beemsterboer.nl. We explicitly reject any and all general conditions of trade from our contractual counterparts, unless we explicitly agree in writing with the applicability of such general conditions of trade. Toutes nos offres, toutes les commandes qui nous sont confiées, toutes les commandes que nous passons, tous les contrats et toutes les conventions conclus avec nous sont régis de manière exclusive par le droit néerlandais et nos Conditions Générales (nommées dessous aussi “CG “), assortie de sa clause compromissoire et attributive de juridiction exclusive à l'article 4.3 (arbitrage à La Haye Pays-Bas conformément au règlement d’arbitrage de la CNUDCI), qui ont été déposées au greffe du tribunal de Noord-Holland, dépendance à Alkmaar le 3 septembre 2013. Il peut être pris communication de nos CG en nos bureaux et un exemplaire peut être gratuitement obtenu sur simple demande. Par ailleurs, nos CG peuvent être gratuitement téléchargées à partir de notre site Internet www.beemsterboer.nl. Nous excluons formellement l’application des conditions générales de notre cocontractant, à moins que nous en ayons formellement accepté l’application. En todas nuestras ofertas, en todas las órdenes hechas por o a nosotros y en todos los contratos celebrados con nosotros son de aplicación exclusiva el derecho holandés y nuestras Condiciones Mercantiles Generales (en adelante denominadas como "CMG"), incluida la cláusula de UNCITRAL Arbitraje de la Haya ahí incluida (artículo 4.3), depositadas en la Secretaría Judicial del Juzgado de Noord-Holland, localidad de Alkmaar el 3 de septiembre 2013.Las copias de nuestras CMG se encuentran para su consulta en nuestras oficinas y a la primera solicitud le enviaremos gratuitamente copias de las mismas.Además, nuestras CMG pueden ser bajadas gratuitamente de nuestro sitio en Internet: www.beemsterboer.nl. Subject: Remittance advice
TextBody: Morning Pieter, Hope you are doing well. This week I received a statement from your accounts department mentioning invoices pending that goes back to February that is not correct. The below invoices are paid. 0090590475 Paid 05/04/24 0090601740 Paid 0090601873 Paid 22/05/24 0090601908 Paid 22/05/24 0090601950 Paid 22/05/24 0090602645 Paid 0090602750 Paid 0090602884 Paid 0090603046 Paid 0090603058 Paid 009063068 Paid 009063388 Paid 009063411 Paid Total 417366.00 This is a huge figure considering Credit limit, usually you will be getting the money right away. Can we please get this issue sorted right away? We will set up a phone call next week ones the above payments allocated. Thanks [cid:image113121.png@BA8961C5.C7D9647C] Wais Mohammad​​​​ T: 0207 720 9012 E: wais.mohammad@premierfoodswholesale.com<mailto:Wais.Mohammad@premierfoodswholesale.com> W: premierfoodswholesale.com<https://premierfoodswholesale.com/> D36‑49 New Covent Garden Market Nine Elms Lane, Battersea, London SW8 5JJ [Facebook]<https://en-gb.facebook.com/premierfoodswholesale> [Linkedin]<https://www.linkedin.com/company/premier-fruits-ltd/?originalSubdomain=uk> [Instagram]<https://www.instagram.com/premierfoodswholesale/?hl=en> [Twitter]<https://mobile.twitter.com/PFoodsWholesale> [www.premierfoodswholesale.com]<https://premierfoodswholesale.com/> From: Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> Sent: 29 May 2024 14:35 To: Wais Mohammad <Wais.Mohammad@premierfoodswholesale.com>; Olive Tanner <Olive.Tanner@premierfoodswholesale.com> Subject: Remittance advice Hi Wais, Olive, Could you please urgently send me a remittance for at least 93,000 GBP? We have 3 orders (PF-KOFF1389, PF-KOFF1388 and PF-KOFF1389) that are scheduled for loading tomorrow, but cannot be loaded for the moment as they are blocked by our credit control. Shall we set up a call to discuss the way forward? Personally, I have the feeling that we are constantly pushing against the limit and that this causes daily follow-up and stress. I would like to tackle this structurally, so that this is more workable for both parties and we don't have to deal with this every day. Looking forward to hearing how you feel about this. Thanks a lot!

Subject: 62213 T2L
TextBody: Hey Charlotte, die versie heb ik niet ontvangen hoor denk ik: Bonte Maarten Customer Service Officer Agristo nv P +32 485 134 330 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Charlotte D'haeyere [charlotte.dhaeyere@agristo.com] Sent: 30/05/2024 09:51 To: service@agristo.com Subject: RE: RE: 62213 T2L Dag Maarten, versie met PLDA nr kan je vinden in de douane inbox als je zoekt op delivery nr: Da’s het document dat we via douane doorkrijgen (zie blauw gemarkeerd) en dus niet de versie via C4T: Zijn er nog andere klanten van jou die dit opvragen? Ik pols eens bij andere collega’s met T2L ladingen in BE of ze dit vaak manueel moeten doorsturen naar de klant/Remant. Zoja, pols ik eens bij IT hoeveel effort het zou zijn om dit op te zetten (dus dat de T2L met PLDA nr gelinkt wordt in SAP en die dan via instellen ZEXP in nieuwe customer app automatisch kan uitgestuurd worden naar de klant.) Hadden we nog niet nagevraagd, omdat volume niet hoog was en omdat er nog wijzigingen aankomen mbt opzet T2L … maar blijft aanslepen … en als het te veel effort is momenteel om dit manueel te doen, polsen we ms toch nog best eens bij IT of dit kan opgezet worden.:) Groetjes, Charlotte Charlotte​​​​ D'haeyere Customer Service Officer UK & Europe T +32 56 54 11 51 • M +32 474 76 65 02 Ridder de Ghellinckstraat 9 • 8710 Wielsbeke • Belgium • www.agristo.com

Pouvez-vous, s'il vous plaît, réserver un nouveau créneau pour venir chercher cette commande ? Merci d'avance. Si vous avez d'autres questions, n'hésitez pas à me contacter. Subject: Restaurant Asia Exhibitor Highlight: Scotsman
TextBody: 26 - 28 Jun 2024, Sands Expo & Convention Centre, Singapore View this email in your browser<https://mailchi.mp/iegasia/restaurant-asia-scotsman?e=ac08d24560> [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/824127a8-553e-6183-5eb3-6fa7b837a9c8.png]<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=aafcf145ab&e=ac08d24560> Held in conjunction with [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/61182a97-2c9f-f46c-b94b-fb5c872fad1c.png]<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=c4cb2c03db&e=ac08d24560> Co-located with [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/5509c4f2-6dab-9531-aeee-e2666c6b077d.png] 26 - 28 June 2024 Halls D, E & F - Basement 2 Sands Expo & Convention Centre, Singapore Exhibitor Spotlight [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/41040f15-74ce-4c47-3546-cea5d3ce8d1b.jpeg] Scotsman Industries Singapore Pte Ltd RJ20 | Singapore & Italy Welcome to Scotsman Ice Home of the industry’s only complete solution for highly efficient, superior-performing ice systems. Partner and Official Ice Supplier of World Coffee Championship and International Bartender Academy, and Official Ice Sponsor of the Singapore National Coffee Championships 2024. Instagram<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=92f48b21ac&e=ac08d24560> Facebook<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=290b895463&e=ac08d24560> LinkedIn<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=8442d69469&e=ac08d24560> YouTube<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=230cca9242&e=ac08d24560> TikTok<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=89bdcc749f&e=ac08d24560> [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/27880034-9bee-7c0f-386a-933d0bb70bc2.jpeg] For decades, Scotsman has been one of the world’s leading manufacturers of ice machines and ancillary products. Today, the brand offers literally hundreds of model variations, with more machines producing more varieties of ice than any other manufacturer, from compact back bar gourmet cubes for hospitality, to huge industrial machines making scale ice for the fishing and food manufacturing sectors. Ice is our passion. It is at the heart of everything we do. * World’s No. 1 Ice Manufacturer with over 1 million machines installed worldwide * Distributors in 100+ countries throughout the world * Widest range of ice varieties with production capacities to suit any application * EcoX series of machines are fully compliant with 2022’s revisions to the F-Gas regulations * Continuous R&D ensures Scotsman equipment remains a leader in the ice production market * Long lifecycle delivering great value with industry-leading warranty provision. [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/ba74c941-1a5f-0291-e2f5-87b5981e2b30.jpeg] [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/64483d88-0542-5723-7a70-66ae366479fa.png] MXG 638 Modular ice machine producing Gourmet Ice Cubes with maximum production at 370kg/24h. Crystal-clear, pure, hard and long-lasting ice cubes are individually formed by spraying water onto a subcooled horizontal evaporator. Its fast-cooling action and slow dilution makes drinks chilled for a long time, perfect for bartenders and baristas. [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/afeae07b-15ac-45cf-4e3e-bb6af36c8c78.png] MXF New ice machine launched in 2023 for Flake Ice. It is highly versatile and suitable for multiple applications: * Fish & buffet displays * Frozen drink preparation * Wine & champagne buckets [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/5bd5930f-332d-f74c-2143-32ae26ad96e5.jpg] NU300 / NW508 Undercounter and modular ice machines for Dice Ice. Classic 6-sided ice cubes where its greater surface area for heat exchange allows for fast-chilling of all drinks. The vertical evaporator technology of this ice cube guarantees large ice production at lower operating costs. [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/0dae2471-2234-ac76-bcf7-01f04dca0a47.jpeg]<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=6a9c7c95fe&e=ac08d24560> Enjoy up to 11% off your ticket when you fly with our Official Airlines [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/a1a871e4-7036-8402-ac1c-3d67f2a34d7f.png] Promo code: SIGEPA24<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=59915e91e3&e=ac08d24560> Enjoy specially negotiated rates with our Official Accommodation Partner [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/b946ab36-fd54-943b-74d9-c07c38b448a6.png] Find out how you can take advantage of the best pricing and hotel booking experience. Book here!<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=48eeecc881&e=ac08d24560> SQ Promo Code applicable to the following countries: Australia, Brunei, Cambodia, China, France, Hong Kong, India, Indonesia, Italy, Malaysia, Netherlands, Philippines, Sri Lanka, Thailand, UAE, United Kingdom, Vietnam [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/dff33951-a7ea-a9da-3d61-339ffda2ed0f.png] Presenting 5 shows, 8 thematic zones & pavilions catering to all key aspects of the F&B industry! [SIGEP Asia, Restaurant Asia 2024]<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=be07731c05&e=ac08d24560> [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/b179ff2a-96e5-48f6-85fc-7d8378182a18.jpeg] [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/5f6e1dad-ac4f-d3e9-19ad-ef03096433ed.png] Contact our sales team to book your stand today! Click here to view the sales deck<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=146fabd02e&e=ac08d24560> [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/8c5b956d-0a76-400a-afc0-db93c11ac45a.png] IEG Asia Pte. Ltd. A company of Italian Exhibition Group S.p.A. 1 Maritime Square #09-57 HarbourFront Centre, Singapore 099253

Subject: 62213 T2L
TextBody: Dag Maarten, versie met PLDA nr kan je vinden in de douane inbox als je zoekt op delivery nr: Da’s het document dat we via douane doorkrijgen (zie blauw gemarkeerd) en dus niet de versie via C4T: [cid:image001.png@01DAB275.F2719A20] Zijn er nog andere klanten van jou die dit opvragen? Ik pols eens bij andere collega’s met T2L ladingen in BE of ze dit vaak manueel moeten doorsturen naar de klant/Remant. Zoja, pols ik eens bij IT hoeveel effort het zou zijn om dit op te zetten (dus dat de T2L met PLDA nr gelinkt wordt in SAP en die dan via instellen ZEXP in nieuwe customer app automatisch kan uitgestuurd worden naar de klant.) Hadden we nog niet nagevraagd, omdat volume niet hoog was en omdat er nog wijzigingen aankomen mbt opzet T2L … maar blijft aanslepen … en als het te veel effort is momenteel om dit manueel te doen, polsen we ms toch nog best eens bij IT of dit kan opgezet worden.:) Groetjes, Charlotte [cid:image002.png@01DAB275.F2719A20] Charlotte​​​​ D'haeyere Customer Service Officer UK & Europe T +32 56 54 11 51<tel:+32%2056%2054%2011%2051> • M +32 474 76 65 02<tel:+32%20474%2076%2065%2002> Ridder de Ghellinckstraat 9 • 8710 Wielsbeke • Belgium • www.agristo.com<https://eu.content.exclaimer.net?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.agristo.com%2F&tenantid=R5mU58TWEe6F-gAiSH-K5g&templateid=443634af22d2ee1185fa0022487f8ae6&excomponentid=E_Xg2xpZEE7COvcAHBDP1EjLNrmijgfYCtnikvl0Y9o&excomponenttype=Link&signature=iFzMwqF297Gnrm9dssB9y6ZrUX6ui-gbIW3mmKrmZFU0fKOdCY7CBRtJiGe_Spn4dNtCSo7Dz3SqIjt40FOTSKqvA4CSyfr_2rdEcKiywYfk52eQDa3TP0yee1aLPqWhlT2-VWyiSjlwfPeFC2XwjArwx6eH8DXqSxKsPDk9zRTDisnzduRzC5ojXNfUDKcsXK30zIlw0nO2bRD_7benWToceZV3s_7YbFbU3vGih3dwe7J_ewazTQT4GtDl-pg3BF4NpNhrrDUxkkXgyyy9lKCK6ZoEagBoNlU-jxW4a96QCUEXG9ZPC0VjWmDRcOTQgLwZs2UYlVAA1eRt3wY-fw&v=1> [Find your crispy challenge on our new job site]<https://eu.content.exclaimer.net/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.agristo.com%2F&tenantid=R5mU58TWEe6F-gAiSH-K5g&templateid=443634af22d2ee1185fa0022487f8ae6&excomponentid=0FtwO6H728rcYRqVjUeXx_KJWv-RPvCRW1zd8woKpSo&excomponenttype=Image&signature=iFzMwqF297Gnrm9dssB9y6ZrUX6ui-gbIW3mmKrmZFU0fKOdCY7CBRtJiGe_Spn4dNtCSo7Dz3SqIjt40FOTSKqvA4CSyfr_2rdEcKiywYfk52eQDa3TP0yee1aLPqWhlT2-VWyiSjlwfPeFC2XwjArwx6eH8DXqSxKsPDk9zRTDisnzduRzC5ojXNfUDKcsXK30zIlw0nO2bRD_7benWToceZV3s_7YbFbU3vGih3dwe7J_ewazTQT4GtDl-pg3BF4NpNhrrDUxkkXgyyy9lKCK6ZoEagBoNlU-jxW4a96QCUEXG9ZPC0VjWmDRcOTQgLwZs2UYlVAA1eRt3wY-fw&v=1>

Subject: 96020578 BE 900g Chips
TextBody: Hi Becky, We currently have 278 pallets finished products on stock of this new item. I had been informed by Michèle this article will be launched in store in July. Shall we foresee an order? What volume would you like to receive by when? (May I also ask you to send your e-mails to service@agristo.com? This makes it easier for me to handle your request.) Thanks!

Subject: VIP orders JUNE- JULY
TextBody: Dear Raul, Do you have any idea when we can expect the VIP orders from June to Sept, please? Thank you in advance.

Subject: FW: Orders for June
TextBody: Hi Maria, thank you for these orders. Is there a possibility to send them in PDF? KR Sarah Detailleur Customer Experience Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 65 M + 0498 74 13 14

Subject: PI First orders
TextBody: Dear Rizwan, Atradius is not willing to grant any credit insurance for your company as they have information on previous claims. This means that the only 2 credit insurers we are working with (Groupama and Atradius) are refusing to give us a credit limit for your company. We do not use any other credit insurers. The only way we can do business with your company is on the terms of 30% prepayment + 70% Cash Against Documents. Please confirm the payment term, so we can continue with the order.

Subject: Commande Fournisseur N° 4770Commande Fournisseur n°4771
TextBody: Bonjour, Merci pour la commande ! Elle a été enregistrée dans notre système et sera chargée selon la chronologie demandée. La commande sera prête à être enlevée à partir du 03/06. Cette commande dépasse votre limite de crédit de 1.500 euros. Quand les prochains paiements seront-ils effectués ? Cordialement, Louise Regnier Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 62 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: EMEK Distribution [contact@emekgroup.fr] Sent: 30/05/2024 09:40 To: service@agristo.com; contact@emekgroup.fr Subject: Commande Fournisseur N° 4770Commande Fournisseur n°4771 Bonjour, Vous trouverez ci-jointe notre Commande fournisseur N°4770 et N°4771 Charger en premier la commande : 4771 (livré en dernier) 14 palettes Charger en second la commande : 4770 (livré en premier) 17 Palettes Merci de nous tenir informer pour la confirmation de la commande ainsi que la date d’enlèvement. Cordialement. Ce message et toutes pièces jointes sont établis à l'intention exclusive de ses destinataires et sont confidentiels. Si vous n'en êtes pas le destinataire voulu, merci d'en avertir l'expéditeur à son adresse e-mail ou au numéro de téléphone précisés ci-dessus et d'effacer ce courrier électronique de votre système. Toute divulgation, reproduction ou autre diffusion ou utilisation de ce message totale ou partielle est strictement interdite.

Subject: FW: New customer for Libya market
TextBody: Good morning Elena I went over the instructions and everything seems ok, apart from the following: - 3 BL's -> it is standard procedure that we keep one original BL at Agristo, so we will only be able to send 2 originals - We don't take pictures of the goods before/during loading, unless this is legally required by the country of destination. I kindly ask you to delete this requirement.

Subject: Early Bird Rate for Propak East Africa Ends Soon!
TextBody: Propak East Africa visitor registration is open View this email online<https://event.montgomerygroup.com/q/13W7Q1DuHGJUwlfw8n6JO/wv> [https://event.montgomerygroup.com/i/amf_angus_montgomery/user_53/PEA/25/PROPAKL.png?size=600x0&w=BhuHZDa-Kby6Fica3FfBCFwQFLlM] <https://event.montgomerygroup.com/c/1e1P9J7BALYrDCltSE8ie0qAK> Book A Stand<https://event.montgomerygroup.com/c/1e1PdIsX1vjWBB5FKdwDWZ2Gl> [https://event.montgomerygroup.com/i/amf_angus_montgomery/user_53/PEA/25/Beige_Black_Modern_Fashion_New_Arrivals_Blog_Banner.png?size=1200x0&w=BouIVFeE9DDjJzi60s51ddcc_P80] <https://event.montgomerygroup.com/c/1e1PhHOiseFrzzPRBMUZFXELW> Brochure<https://event.montgomerygroup.com/c/1e1PlH9DSY0WxyA3tmjloWgRx> Website<https://event.montgomerygroup.com/c/1e1PpGuZjHmrvxkfkVHH7USX8> Book A Stand<https://event.montgomerygroup.com/c/1e1PxFbGba3rruOD44uozS78k> Greetings, I hope this message finds you well. As you may know, the next edition of Propak East Africa 2025, the premier B2B exhibition and conference for packaging, printing, plastics, and food and beverage processing professionals, is set to take place from May 20th to 22nd, 2025. This is your golden opportunity to showcase your products and services to a targeted audience of industry leaders, suppliers, manufacturers, and distributors from across the East African region. We have been offering an exclusive early bird booking rate to help our valued exhibitors secure their spots at a reduced cost. However, this special offer is ending soon. After June 17th, 2024, our rates will increase. Why Exhibit at Propak East Africa 2025? * Unparalleled Networking Opportunities: Connect with over 5,000 industry professionals and decision-makers. * Brand Exposure: Showcase your innovations and solutions to a highly engaged audience. * Market Insights: Gain valuable insights and stay ahead of industry trends. * Business Growth: Foster new partnerships and generate high-quality leads. Act Now - Secure Your Stand at the Best Rate! Don’t miss out on this incredible opportunity to enhance your brand’s presence in the East African market. Book your stand by June 17th to take advantage of our early bird rates and ensure you get the best possible spot on the exhibition floor.

Subject: Agristo - Gulfwest Service
TextBody: Hi Siddeeque, Please find schedule enclosed. In Column Loading Agristo, you can see the Week Commencing Date - this is the week when we will book the loading. When the vessel is confirmed, I will complete further details and adapt ETA and vessel in the schedule. We will try to follow these weeks, taking into account 7 containers per week and starting next week. Please note that 4500004418 and 4500004410 already shipped, so I will delete them out the schedule. Kindly confirm if stated otherwise. For the new orders, I have put in the 99- proforma number in the first column and fit them into the schedule. Also please find all pdfs enclosed. Kindly provide me your pdfs/ordernumbers so I can adapt these in the schedule. KR, Sarah Sarah Detailleur Customer Experience Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 65 M + 0498 74 13 14 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: [siddeeque@gulfwest.com] Sent: 29/05/2024 14:03 To: sarah.detailleur@agristo.com; mohamed.elhawary@agristo.com; service@agristo.com Cc: sadiq@gulfwest.com; logistics@gulfwest.com; saif.basheer@gulfwest.com; shihab@gulfwest.com; moustafa.dessouki@agristo.com; leena@gulfwest.com Subject: RE: Agristo - Gulfwest Service Dear Mohamed, Thank you for your prompt response and for providing clarification regarding the situation with the EVER CRISP 10X10 SKIN ON STRAIGHT CUT FR containers, However, we would like to bring to your attention the significant potential stemming from the additional leads we obtained at the recent Food Show. These leads present a promising opportunity for increased sales, and we believe that with your support, we can capitalize on them effectively. In the past, we have encountered similar situations with our battered products, and your(Agristo) assistance has been instrumental in navigating through them successfully. Hence, we are reaching out to you once again, confident that together, we can achieve even greater results @Sarah Detailleur, as per our standard procedure, we typically issue POs based on the PI provided by your end. Therefore, we kindly request you to share the PI with us at your earliest convenience Thank you

Zal er hier wel een redesign voor volgen voor de Duitse vertaling? Subject: Take a sneak peek at the amazing features for Smart Manufacturing & Engineering Week 2024!
TextBody: 150+ sessions, live music, demos and loads more [ITâ€™S ALMOST HERE..-2] <https://bit.ly/3WV7Q29> Dear colleague, With just one week remaining until Smart Manufacturing & Engineering Week<https://bit.ly/3UV005U> 2024, we are thrilled to welcome you to an event packed with innovation, insights, and networking opportunities. >> FREE TICKETS << <https://bit.ly/3WV7Q29> VISIT WEBSITE <https://bit.ly/3UV005U> Hereâ€™s a glimpse of what awaits you next Wednesday & Thursday: [BEST OF BRITISH SHOWCASE!-4] 2024 Content Agenda Free-to-attend presentations are delivered by manufacturing and engineering experts covering Design & Innovation, Maintenance, IIoT & Connectivity, Digital Transformation, Data & AI, Fluid Power & Air-Tech. Check out the agenda >> <https://bit.ly/4e1WdfZ> Live Music & Drinks Gather round the Headline stage to hear our guest band the Shadow Monkeys play during the networking party! Enjoy a drink on us with your peers to wind down after a busy day. Kicking off from 4.30pm in hall 5! [BEST OF BRITISH SHOWCASE! (1)-3] [BEST OF BRITISH SHOWCASE! (2)-2] Guitar Legends Competition 2024 sees the return of our LIVE guitar competition! Claim your way to fame, by dropping into our music booth located in the heart of Smart Manufacturing and Engineering Week! Sign up now >> <https://bit.ly/4e9sCRQ> Dedicated Visitor Trails To help visitors navigate the presentations and exhibitors most relevant to them, we're introducing a new feature called 'Visitor Trail' to make the most out of your visit at the show! Find out more >> <https://bit.ly/4bA6Ncp> [BEST OF BRITISH SHOWCASE! (3)] [SMEW_SocialReg_1920x1080 (300 x 250 px)] Best of British Showcase Join us in a celebration of domestic manufacturing, featuring world-beating new designs, innovative modes of manufacture, products that redefine categories, and export successes that plant the flag in overseas markets. Find out more >> <https://bit.ly/4bWa9WG> IfM Masterclasses The Institute for Manufacturing (IfM) Theatre showcases research and knowledge transfer activities from the Institute for Manufacturing, University of Cambridge. Check out the masterclasses >> <https://bit.ly/452vMT7> [BEST OF BRITISH SHOWCASE! (4)] [BEST OF BRITISH SHOWCASE! (5)] FANUC WorldSkills Qualifiers Taking place at the show is an amazing opportunity for young people to compete and find their passion in the world of robotics. WorldSkills UK are working with FANUC to host qualifiers for this year's Industrial Robotics competition! Find out more >> <https://bit.ly/3wPvOBh> ThrustWSH Project The ThrustWSH team will be conducting an important survey at the show to help assist research into their next world record breaking attempt. Find out more >> <https://bit.ly/4bTuGex> [BEST OF BRITISH SHOWCASE! (6)] [BEST OF BRITISH SHOWCASE! (7)] Manufacturers of the Future Our dedicated STEM afternoon enables students and apprentices about to take the first step into their careers to engage with the rapidly evolving world of manufacturing. Find out more >> <https://bit.ly/4aJvO3n> [ITâ€™S ALMOST HERE.. (2)] <https://bit.ly/3X6agL8> Including a darts simulator, live robot from The Terminator, Spin the Wheel and Make your own smoothie bike! Charity Partner 2024 announced We are proud to announce the charity partner for 2024 - Engineers without Borders Together with a movement of over 30 Engineers Without Borders organisations across the world, they are working to inspire and empower the engineering community to uncover their potential by committing to global responsibility. Their 2021-30 strategy<https://bit.ly/4bRcHp8> sets out four key principles of global responsibility â€“ responsible, purposeful, inclusive and regenerative â€“ that they want to see embedded in the culture of how all engineering is taught and practised. We are committed to making the show a valuable and memorable event for all attendees. For more detailed information on each feature, please visit the Whatâ€™s On page on our website >> <https://bit.ly/454w4J9> Thank you for being a part of the show. We canâ€™t wait to welcome you next week! Subject: volume Belgische kroket 800g
TextBody: Goede morgen, Zoals reeds bekend zullen wij later op het jaar de Belgische kroketten wijzigen van gewicht, 800g wordt 700g. De eerste leveringen zouden wij aan onze klanten willen doen vanaf W39, beschikbaar om te laden bij Agristo ergens in W38. In bijlage de forecast in kg tem WK38 op de 800g Onze stock is momenteel = 0, we zijn OUT en er is ook geen stock meer bij jullie. Het komt erop neer dat wij nog een 140 pal nodig hebben De klassieke kroket gaan we uiteindelijk niet veranderen van gewicht, deze blijft 800g. Dank alvast. Subject: RE: Agristo service
TextBody: External: Verify the sender before clicking any link/attachment. Hi Kathleen, Thank you for your email. But I did mention to Pieter before. For Singapore, the preference is with HFCE because it has the Halal ID there. The purpose is due to halal traceability – how do we show evidence that the product is the same as the halal cert? Either by the same name on the label or the Halal ID number. I understand that Malaysia does not recognise HFCE anymore and recognises HFFIA but HFFIA does not show the traceability that is required for Food Service. I am hoping that the ones applied for Ben Foods is under HFCE or any organisation that meets the halal traceability standards. In the meantime, as we wait for the Ben Foods Halal cert to be ready, can you send me a letter like what I have attached that links the product to the HQC and HFFIA certs? Thank you.

Subject: [EDF ENR] PRO, jusqu'à 40% d'économies sur votre conso d'énergie
TextBody: Si vous ne parvenez pas à lire ce message visualisez la version en ligne<https://news.tuplanatope.>. ► <https://news.tuplanatope.> Voir en ligne <https://news.tuplanatope.> ✖ <https://news.tuplanatope.> Courrier indésirable <https://news.tuplanatope.> [https://news.tuplanatope.com/img/149448/images/2966792946658.jpg]<https://news.tuplanatope.> [https://news.tuplanatope.com/img/149448/images/9169053226658.png] TPE/PME Maîtrisez votre facture d’énergie et faites des économies jusqu’à 40% d’économies(1) sur votre consommation d’énergie électrique + 11 000€ de prime d’investissement(2) DEMANDEZ VOTRE ÉTUDE PERSONNALISÉE<https://news.tuplanatope.> Vos panneaux solaires en location avec option d’achat Pas d’investissement initial, vous préservez votre trésorerie et vos fonds propres. Pas d’impact sur le bilan ni sur votre capacité d’endettement en comptabilité sociale. Pas de TVA à avancer sur le prix de l’installation : elle est facturée sur les loyers EDF ENR supervise et maintient vos installations pendant toute la durée du contrat. [https://news.tuplanatope.com/img/149448/images/5031381406658.jpg] [https://news.tuplanatope.com/img/149448/images/8881327956658.jpg] [https://news.tuplanatope.com/img/149448/images/1705862709665.jpg] [https://news.tuplanatope.com/img/149448/images/1625527956665.jpg] DEMANDEZ VOTRE ÉTUDE PERSONNALISÉE<https://news.tuplanatope.> [https://news.tuplanatope.com/img/149448/images/7130963276658.png] (1) Le niveau de réduction de la facture dépend de plusieurs facteurs tels que le prix de l’électricité et le profil de consommation du client. Selon les configurations, cette baisse peut atteindre 40% de la facture d’énergie électrique. L’estimation est indicative et non contractuelle et basée des panels de simulations, chaque projet nécessite une analyse détaillée de votre profil de consommation ainsi que la localisation / orientation de vos panneaux photovoltaïques. Aussi, l’énergie qui est produite et non consommée localement, pourra être revalorisée par un mécanisme de soutien de l’Etat, sous réserve d’éligibilité. (2) Les installations solaires sont éligibles à une prime à l'investissement. Cette prime est fonction de la puissance de l'installation (puissance du générateur photovoltaïque <=100 kWc) [https://tracking.publicidees.com/link.php?promoid=259212&progid=8329&partid=62781&to_shootid=54406] Ce message est envoyé de la part des sociétés filiales du Groupe Dataventure, dans le cadre de la promotion de ses offres commerciales, et de celle de ses partenaires, susceptibles d’intéresser votre organisme. Ce message est envoyé sur une adresse générique professionnelle et n’implique pas de traitement de données à caractère personnel, au sens du Règlement Général sur la Protection des Données (Règlement (UE) 2016/679 ou « RGPD »). Par conséquent, les exigences requises par le RGPD ne s’appliquent pas au présent message. Pour plus d’informations, contactez-nous à l’adresse dpo@cardata.fr<mailto:dpo@cardata.fr>. Si l’organisme souhaite se désinscrire totalement de nos listes d’envoi, cliquez ici<https://news.tuplanatope.>

Subject: Indemnités logistiques ITM - avril 2024 - 82006 - AGRISTO N-V - 76
TextBody: Bonjour, A la suite des différentes commandes livrées au cours du mois de avril 2024, nous avons constaté, sur la base du contrat logistique qui nous unit, des défauts de performances logistiques de votre part. Afin de démontrer ces manquements, vous trouverez en pièce jointe, à titre de preuve, une extraction du logiciel de gestion. Conformément au paragraphe D de la Foire Aux Questions portant sur les lignes directrices en matière de pénalités logistiques, « une photographie, une capture écran du logiciel » font partie des preuves matérialisant le manquement. Le préjudice lié à ces défauts de performance logistique est détaillé dans les pièces jointes. Le respect des niveaux de performance convenus dans notre contrat logistique permet d'assurer un taux de service optimal de livraison auprès de nos Points de Vente, permettant ainsi d’éviter tout manquement engendrant un manque à gagner à la revente en raison de l’indisponibilité de la marchandise en temps et heure. Nous vous rappelons que vous disposez d'un délai de 30 jours à compter de la réception de cet avis de pénalités pour en contrôler le bien-fondé et nous transmettre vos remarques. Merci de nous retourner vos analyses contradictoires associées à cette extraction. Au retour de vos remarques, lors d’échanges contradictoires, nous prendrons en compte les éléments justifiés et documentés que vous mentionneriez afin d’obtenir un accord avant établissement d’une facturation. Nous restons à votre disposition pour toute question et pour étudier avec vous des moyens spécifiques afin d'améliorer votre performance logistique pour nos prochaines commandes. Nous vous remercions de bien vouloir adresser vos retours à l'adresse mail : itmlai_negociations_logistiques@mousquetaires.com et à votre négociateur de dossier : - Fatyne BOUFOUS - fatyne.boufous@mousquetaires.com : Frais non laitier (volailles, œuf, traiteur, charcuterie, traiteur de la mer, viandes) - Priscillia LUZOLO - priscillia.luzolo@mousquetaires.com : DPH (Parfumerie, entretien et Hygiène) & Epicerie Salée - Marylise GOBIN - marylise.gobin@mousquetaires.com : Epicerie Sucrée / PPI & Animaux - Chloé MAYALA - chloe.mayala@mousquetaires.com : Vins & Champagnes, BNA, Bière, Alcools & Gel - Faustine BOSIO - faustine.bosio@mousquetaires.com : Frais Laitier - Carine GALLETTE - carine.gallette@mousquetaires.com : Maison/Textile Cordialement, Equipe Négociation / Logistique ITM LAI ----------------------------- Disclaimer ------------------------------ --- Ce message ainsi que les éventuelles pièces jointes constituent une correspondance privée et confidentielle à l'attention exclusive du destinataire désigné ci-dessus. Si vous n'êtes pas le destinataire du présent message ou une personne susceptible de pouvoir le lui délivrer, il vous est signifié que toute divulgation, distribution ou copie, totale ou partielle, sur un quelconque support de cette transmission est strictement interdite. Si vous avez recu ce message par erreur, nous vous remercions d'en informer l'expéditeur par téléphone ou de lui retourner le présent message, puis d'effacer immédiatement ce message de votre systeme. Tout message électronique est susceptible d'altération. Le "groupement des Mousquetaires" décline toute responsabilité au titre de ce message s'il a été altéré, déformé ou falsifié.--- --- This e-mail and any attachments is a confidential correspondence intended only for use of the individual or entity named above. If you are not the intended recipient or the agent responsible for delivering the message to the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any disclosure, distribution or copying, either whole or partial, in any medium of this communication is strictly prohibited. If you have received this communication by mistake, please notify the sender by phone or by replying this message, and then delete this message from your system. E-mails are susceptible of alteration. The "Mousquetaires' group" shall not therefore be liable for the message if altered, changed or falsified.--- -----------------------------------------------------------------------

Subject: Verdubbel uw bedrijfsoppervlak zonder bij te bouwen Meneer Algemeen
TextBody: Wat dacht u van een metalen tussenvloer ? ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ Indien u deze e-mail niet kan lezen ? » klik dan hier<https://web.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/html_mail.jsp?params=hwYjlkOiaxyL1l%2BoMAfj2UJFk6xse%2BoeWbfkvCSQJVnTnCeSPBkYjL9heLBiGRP5gCZzp4zws7g9vvNEP30ZMMTZVHP5IpwfvolVXE2BhdE%3D> [Logo Storacon]<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrkq0b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000jyorfh4&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> [Logo Provost]<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrp00b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000b6fy304&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> Extra bedrijfsoppervlakte zonder bij te bouwen dankzij onze metalen tussenvloeren [https://media.inx-cdn.de/nxpml-ca0b7a6f-a976-4c68-a002-d00cac877c86/366a22b9-58a4-4c6a-abaf-6c856eeba176.jpg]<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrky0b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000fhjbs64&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> Dag beste klant, Bent u op zoek naar extra vierkante meters tegen voordelige prijs ? Wist u dat u met een metalen tussenvloer uw beschikbare ruimte kan vergroten zonder te hoeven bijbouwen of ingrijpende werken te moeten uitvoeren of bijkomend te moeten ruimte huren ? Onze LP3 tussenvloer, conform de norm EN1090 en CE goedgekeurd, is geschikt voor tal van toepassingen. Meer weten<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrl00b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000fb3k7jq&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> [https://media.inx-cdn.de/nxpml-ca0b7a6f-a976-4c68-a002-d00cac877c86/2a30dd15-c53a-4a8e-9fe8-4f0c443497fd.jpg]<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrli0b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000j642iqq&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> Tussenvloer voor opslag Benut de volledige hoogte van uw gebouw om uw ruimte voor opslag te verdubbelen of verdriedubbelen. Onze regioverantwoordelijken helpen u graag bij de keuze van het type tussenvloer : met grote overspanning, met gangpaden tussen rekken of een extra verdieping bovenop rekken. Ik ontdek<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrli0b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000j642iqq&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> Industriële tussenvloer Creëer extra ruimte bovenop werkplaatsen. Een schaalbare oplossing die gemakkelijk aan veranderende behoeften kan worden aangepast. Ook ideaal voor onderhoudsruimtes. Ik ontdek<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrlq0b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000bjidwtu&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> [https://media.inx-cdn.de/nxpml-ca0b7a6f-a976-4c68-a002-d00cac877c86/2084889b-130f-4341-84aa-bf6adf6d391d.jpg]<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrlq0b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000bjidwtu&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> [https://media.inx-cdn.de/nxpml-ca0b7a6f-a976-4c68-a002-d00cac877c86/d6da0222-c39f-4846-bc5e-356e5c07947b.jpg]<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrly0b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000nwptbku&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> Tussenvloer voor kantoren In uw werkplaats of magazijn een zone inrichten als kantoor, dat kan heel snel dankzij onze combinatie van scheidingswanden en tussenvloer. Een budgetvriendelijke oplossing met een stijlvolle afwerking. Ik ontdek<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrly0b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000nwptbku&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> Een project op maat ? Een van onze 4 regioverantwoordelijken in België begeleidt u graag. Ik heb een project<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrm00b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000f3shju0&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> [https://media.inx-cdn.de/nxpml-ca0b7a6f-a976-4c68-a002-d00cac877c86/0fc4971b-6d8e-44c5-a954-c8555078762c.png] [https://media.inx-cdn.de/nxpml-ca0b7a6f-a976-4c68-a002-d00cac877c86/b5ebfdf9-e47e-4075-a998-56de72239da5.png]<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrmi0b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000jevx6n0&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> Veilig betalen Gratis levering* vanaf aankoop van € 100 [https://media.inx-cdn.de/nxpml-ca0b7a6f-a976-4c68-a002-d00cac877c86/b724d785-4f2e-45b0-8840-2240374fdd04.png]<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrmq0b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000btbo0oe&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> [https://media.inx-cdn.de/nxpml-ca0b7a6f-a976-4c68-a002-d00cac877c86/8fef2500-7825-48b2-89b8-205bc7c1f778.jpg]<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrmy0b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000nmg6xxe&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> Familiebedrijf sinds 1963 4 regioverantwoordelijken in België Storacon, ontwerper en fabrikant van uw werkomgeving [X] [https://media.inx-cdn.de/nxpml-ca0b7a6f-a976-4c68-a002-d00cac877c86/95211fd8-15a0-477d-a88a-f0dfeaa53564.png] Hulp nodig ? Onze afdeling klantenservice staat voor u klaar : 056 77 58 21 [X]<tel:+33809102202> > Contact<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrmy0b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000nmg6xxe&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> > Veelgestelde vragen<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrn00b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000nkuv20i&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> [X] [X]<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrni0b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000bvtfnzi&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> [X]<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrnq0b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000jch4t2m&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> [https://media.inx-cdn.de/nxpml-ca0b7a6f-a976-4c68-a002-d00cac877c86/f75bae32-5ae1-43ff-95ce-e45b3529cf0f.png]<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrny0b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000f50medm&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> [https://media.inx-cdn.de/nxpml-ca0b7a6f-a976-4c68-a002-d00cac877c86/cb79bfe7-79ef-48a8-97df-a09469d21acc.png]<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rro00b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000jpdkiuu&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> [X]<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rroi0b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000fqe27nu&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> [X]<https://www.threads.net/@provostrayonnage?utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> *Alleen geldig voor aankopen op onze website. STORACON, ontwerper en fabrikant van opslagmogelijkheden en specialist in inrichting van werkomgevingen. STORACON biedt een breed assortiment kunststof bakken, producten voor goederenbehandeling en werkplaatsmeubilair voor de inrichting van uw bedrijfsruimten. In overeenstemming met de Europese RGPD-verordening hebt u recht op toegang, rectificatie, wijziging en verwijdering van uw persoonsgegevens. U kan dit recht uitoefenen door hier <mailto:contact@storacon.be?subject=Recht%20op%20toegang%20tot%20persoonlijke%20gegevens> te klikken. U ontvangt dit bericht omdat u zich hebt ingeschreven voor de Storacon nieuwsbrief. U kunt zich te allen tijde uitschrijven van de nieuwsbrief door deze link te volgen Uitschrijven<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rroq0b7bie00k0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000b4g356i&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> uniquement pour les achats sur notre site web.

Subject: FW: Document cost 25 eur
TextBody: Hi Kayla Thank you for your email. The €25 is for the creation of the Certificate of Origin, which costs € 50. As a gesture, this cost is being split up between Agristo and VLM. I hope this clarifies, I you have additional questions, do let me know!

Subject: Commande Fournisseur N° 4763
TextBody: Bonjour, Oui merci! Merci pour la révision de la commande ! La commande a été mise à jour dans notre système. Cordialement, Louise Regnier Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 62 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Emek Food GROUP [contact@emekgroup.fr] Sent: 30/05/2024 09:56 To: service@agristo.com Subject: RE: Commande Fournisseur N° 4763 Bonjour, Oui, ça va merci j’espère que pour vous aussi tous se passe bien. Alors on va modifier la commande, ci-joint le bon de commande modifié. Cordialement. Ce message et toutes pièces jointes sont établis à l'intention exclusive de ses destinataires et sont confidentiels. Si vous n'en êtes pas le destinataire voulu, merci d'en avertir l'expéditeur à son adresse e-mail ou au numéro de téléphone précisés ci-dessus et d'effacer ce courrier électronique de votre système. Toute divulgation, reproduction ou autre diffusion ou utilisation de ce message totale ou partielle est strictement interdite. De : Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> Envoyé : jeudi 30 mai 2024 09:17 À : Emek Food GROUP <contact@emekgroup.fr> Objet : RE: Commande Fournisseur N° 4763 Bonjour, J'espère que tout va bien avec vous ! Le planning de production est disponible. La production de l'article 312619 ne commencera pas avant le vendredi soir 07/06. Ce cycle durera 85 heures donc les articles ne seront pas prêts avant le mardi 11/06. Faites-moi savoir ce que vous voulez faire de votre commande. Cordialement, Louise Regnier Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 62 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Emek Food GROUP [contact@emekgroup.fr] Sent: 28/05/2024 10:43 To: service@agristo.com Subject: RE: Commande Fournisseur N° 4763 D’accord, c’est noté merci. Si vous n'en êtes pas le destinataire voulu, merci d'en avertir l'expéditeur à son adresse e-mail ou au numéro de téléphone précisés ci-dessus et d'effacer ce courrier électronique de votre système. Je vous tiendrai au courant au cours des deux prochains jours. J’attends votre retour dans la semaine comme ça on fait la modification si jamais la production est plus tard. Cordialement. La prochaine production de l'article 312619 n'aura lieu que la semaine prochaine, mais le planning détaillé n'a pas encore été communiqué. Dès qu'il sera en ligne demain ou après-demain, je pourrai vous communiquer la première date de chargement possible.
